title: Information Security Policies
description: Policies for information security shall be defined, approved by management, published, communicated to and acknowledged by relevant personnel
implementation_guidance: Develop and document information security policies aligned with business objectives

title: User Endpoint Devices
description: Information stored on, processed by or accessible via user endpoint devices shall be protected
implementation_guidance: Implement endpoint protection solutions and device management policies

title: Cybersecurity Governance
description: Establish cybersecurity governance framework aligned with SAMA requirements
implementation_guidance: Implement board-level cybersecurity oversight and governance structure

title: Organization's Place in Critical Infrastructure
description: Organization's place in critical infrastructure identified
description_ar: تحديد موقع المنظمة في البنية التحتية الحرجة
implementation_guidance: Determine if organization part of critical infrastructure. Understand sector-specific requirements.

title: Organization's Role in Supply Chain
description: Organization's role in supply chain is identified
description_ar: تحديد دور المنظمة في سلسلة التوريد
implementation_guidance: Identify organization's position in supply chain. Document dependencies. Understand critical suppliers and customers.

title: Cybersecurity Roles and Responsibilities
description: Cybersecurity roles and responsibilities established for workforce and stakeholders
implementation_guidance: Define security roles and responsibilities. Create RACI matrix. Assign to personnel. Communicate clearly.

title: External Information Systems
implementation_guidance: Inventory external systems and services: cloud SaaS third-party connections. Document providers and purposes.

title: Organizational Communication Flows
description: Organizational communication and data flows are mapped
implementation_guidance: Map and document communication flows. Identify data paths network topology interfaces. Update regularly.

title: Software Platform Asset Management
description: Software platforms and applications within organization are inventoried
description_ar: جرد منصات وتطبيقات البرامج داخل المنظمة
implementation_guidance: Maintain inventory of all software: operating systems applications databases. Include versions licenses.

title: Physical Device Asset Management
description: Physical devices and systems within organization are inventoried
description_ar: جرد الأجهزة والأنظمة المادية داخل المنظمة
implementation_guidance: Maintain inventory of all physical devices: servers workstations network equipment. Include location owner status.

title: Audit Tool Protection
implementation_guidance: Control access to audit tools. Segregate from operational systems. Monitor use. Protect from tampering.

title: Auditor Cooperation
implementation_guidance: Provide auditor access to systems data personnel. Respond to requests promptly. Facilitate audit activities.

title: NCA Directives
description_ar: الامتثال لتوجيهات الهيئة الوطنية للأمن السيبراني
implementation_guidance: Monitor NCA advisories and directives. Implement required actions. Report compliance. Maintain documentation.

title: NCA Reporting
description: Report incidents to National Cybersecurity Authority
description_ar: الإبلاغ عن الحوادث للهيئة الوطنية للأمن السيبراني
implementation_guidance: Report significant incidents to NCA within required timeframe. Use official channels. Provide required information.

title: Technical Compliance
implementation_guidance: Review technical compliance: system configurations security settings access controls. Use automated tools.

title: Independent Compliance
implementation_guidance: Conduct independent compliance audits. Use internal audit or third party. Cover all control domains. Report findings.

title: Alternate Site
implementation_guidance: Maintain hot warm or cold site. Ensure adequate capacity. Test failover. Keep data synchronized.

title: Redundancy
implementation_guidance: Implement redundant systems: power network storage servers. Use clustering load balancing failover.

title: Supplier Assessment
implementation_guidance: Assess supplier security posture. Review certifications policies controls. Conduct security due diligence.

title: Supplier Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Monitor supplier performance. Review SLA compliance. Conduct annual security reviews. Address issues.

title: Change Management
implementation_guidance: Require notification of supplier changes. Assess security impact. Approve before implementation.

title: Incident Procedures
implementation_guidance: Develop incident response plan. Define roles responsibilities escalation. Cover detection containment eradication recovery.

title: Incident Reporting
implementation_guidance: Establish incident reporting channels. Require timely reporting. Provide multiple reporting methods. Protect reporters.

title: Dependencies of Critical Functions
description: Dependencies and critical functions for delivery of services identified
implementation_guidance: Map dependencies for critical functions. Identify supporting systems infrastructure personnel.

title: Supplier Policy
description: Establish information security policy for suppliers
implementation_guidance: Define supplier security requirements. Cover access data protection incident reporting. Include in agreements.

title: Resilience Requirements
description: Resilience requirements to support delivery of critical services established
description_ar: تحديد متطلبات المرونة لدعم تقديم الخدمات الحرجة
implementation_guidance: Define resilience requirements for critical services. Determine redundancy backup failover needs.

title: Cybersecurity Roles Coordinated
description: Cybersecurity roles and responsibilities coordinated and aligned
description_ar: تنسيق ودمج أدوار ومسؤوليات الأمن السيبراني
implementation_guidance: Coordinate security responsibilities across organization. Align with business units. Define interfaces.

title: Asset Management
description: Assets formally managed throughout removal disposal and destruction
description_ar: إدارة الأصول بشكل رسمي طوال دورة حياتها
implementation_guidance: Manage asset lifecycle: acquisition deployment operation disposal. Sanitize before disposal. Document destruction.

title: Data-in-Transit Protection
implementation_guidance: Encrypt all sensitive data in transit. Use TLS 1.2+ for web VPN for remote access. Disable weak protocols.

title: Data-at-Rest Protection
implementation_guidance: Encrypt all sensitive data at rest. Use AES-256. Protect databases file servers backups. Manage keys securely.

title: Physical Security Awareness
description: Personnel aware of physical security and cybersecurity risks
description_ar: توعية الموظفين بالأمن المادي والأمن السيبراني
implementation_guidance: Train personnel on physical and cyber security risks. Cover social engineering tailgating device security.

title: Incident Response Training
description: Senior executives and personnel trained on incident response
implementation_guidance: Train incident responders on procedures tools. Train executives on roles. Conduct tabletop exercises.

title: Third-Party Training
description: Third-party personnel understand roles and responsibilities
implementation_guidance: Train third-party personnel on security requirements. Cover responsibilities policies. Obtain acknowledgment.

title: Privileged User Training
description: Privileged users understand roles and responsibilities
implementation_guidance: Train privileged users on their responsibilities. Cover security implications. Provide specialized training.

title: User Awareness and Training
implementation_guidance: Provide security awareness training to all users. Cover policies threats best practices. Train annually. Track completion.

title: Authentication and Authorization
description: Users devices and assets authenticated based on risk
implementation_guidance: Implement risk-based authentication. Require MFA for high-risk access. Use adaptive authentication. Monitor anomalies.

title: Identities Proofed and Bound
description: Identities proofed and bound to credentials
implementation_guidance: Verify user identities before issuing credentials. Use identity proofing. Bind credentials to verified identities.

title: Lessons Learned
implementation_guidance: Conduct post-incident reviews. Identify root causes. Implement improvements. Share lessons learned.

title: Continuity Planning
implementation_guidance: Develop BCP for critical business functions. Define RTOs and RPOs. Include IT disaster recovery.

title: Business Impact Analysis
implementation_guidance: Identify critical business processes. Assess impact of disruptions. Determine recovery priorities. Document findings.

title: Plan Testing
implementation_guidance: Test BCP and DR plans annually. Conduct tabletop exercises and full tests. Document results. Update plans.

title: Incident Response
implementation_guidance: Activate incident response team. Contain incident. Preserve evidence. Eradicate threat. Recover systems.

title: Network Integrity Protection
description: Network integrity protected incorporating network segregation
implementation_guidance: Segment networks. Use VLANs and firewalls. Isolate critical systems. Control inter-zone traffic.

title: Confidentiality Agreements
implementation_guidance: Require employees and contractors to sign NDAs. Cover confidentiality acceptable use. Obtain before access.

title: Security Requirements
description: Define security requirements for new systems
implementation_guidance: Identify security requirements early. Document functional and non-functional security needs. Obtain approval.

title: Clock Synchronization
implementation_guidance: Configure NTP on all systems. Use authoritative time source. Verify synchronization. Log time changes.

title: Backup Protection
description_ar: حماية النسخ الاحتياطية من الوصول غير المصرح
implementation_guidance: Encrypt backups. Store offsite. Control access. Separate backup admin from production.

title: Restore Testing
implementation_guidance: Test restores quarterly. Verify data integrity. Measure recovery time. Document results.

title: Backup
implementation_guidance: Backup critical systems and data. Implement 3-2-1 backup strategy. Automate backups. Monitor success.

title: Antivirus Updates
implementation_guidance: Enable automatic signature updates. Verify updates applied. Monitor update status. Alert on failures.

title: Malware Controls
description_ar: تطبيق ضوابط للحماية من البرمجيات الخبيثة
implementation_guidance: Deploy antivirus on all systems. Update signatures daily. Scan files. Block malicious sites. Quarantine threats.

title: Environment Separation
description: Separate development test and production environments
description_ar: الفصل بين بيئات التطوير والاختبار والإنتاج
implementation_guidance: Maintain separate environments. Restrict production access. Prohibit development in production. Use test data.

title: Key Management
implementation_guidance: Implement key management lifecycle: generation distribution storage rotation destruction. Use HSMs for sensitive keys.

title: Data Encryption
description_ar: تشفير البيانات الحساسة في حالة السكون
implementation_guidance: Encrypt databases file servers backups. Use AES-256. Manage keys separately from data.

title: Communications Encryption
implementation_guidance: Use TLS 1.2+ for web traffic. Use VPN for remote access. Encrypt email. Disable weak protocols.

title: Secure Areas
implementation_guidance: Establish security perimeters. Control physical access to data centers server rooms. Use locks badges cameras.

title: Entry Controls
description: Implement entry controls for secure areas
implementation_guidance: Require badge access. Maintain visitor logs. Escort visitors. Monitor entries. Review access regularly.

title: Equipment Protection
implementation_guidance: Protect against fire flood power failure. Use UPS generators fire suppression. Monitor environmental conditions.

title: Wireless Networks
implementation_guidance: Use WPA3 or WPA2-Enterprise. Change default SSIDs and passwords. Hide SSIDs. Monitor for rogue APs.

title: Equipment Siting
implementation_guidance: Site equipment away from hazards. Avoid basements ground floors. Consider physical threats.

title: Equipment Removal
description: Control removal of equipment from premises
description_ar: التحكم في إزالة المعدات خارج المبنى
implementation_guidance: Require approval for equipment removal. Log removals. Verify return. Scan for malware upon return.

title: Secure Area Work
description_ar: التحكم في العمل داخل المناطق الآمنة
implementation_guidance: Restrict unescorted access. Prohibit cameras phones. Log activities. Conduct exit inspections.

title: Delivery Points
implementation_guidance: Isolate delivery areas from secure zones. Control access. Inspect deliveries. Escort delivery personnel.

title: Access Permissions
description: Access permissions and authorizations managed incorporating least privilege
implementation_guidance: Implement least privilege. Grant minimum necessary access. Require approvals. Review quarterly. Revoke promptly.

title: Remote Access Management
implementation_guidance: Control remote access. Require VPN and MFA. Encrypt connections. Monitor sessions. Log activities.

title: Physical Access Protection
implementation_guidance: Control physical access to facilities and assets. Use badges locks cameras. Log entries. Review access.

title: Identity Management
description: Identities and credentials issued managed verified revoked and audited
implementation_guidance: Implement identity management. Manage complete lifecycle. Verify identities. Audit access regularly.

title: Supply Chain Event Response
description: Response and recovery planning and testing conducted with suppliers
description_ar: استجابة وتعافي التخطيط والاختبار مع الموردين
implementation_guidance: Include suppliers in incident response and BCP. Test coordination. Document procedures. Review regularly.

title: Supplier and Partner Assessment
description: Suppliers and third parties routinely assessed using audits test results or other evaluations
implementation_guidance: Assess supplier security regularly. Use questionnaires audits certifications. Document findings. Track remediation.

title: Legal and Regulatory Requirements
description: Legal and regulatory requirements understood and managed
implementation_guidance: Identify applicable legal and regulatory requirements. Maintain compliance register. Monitor changes.

title: Governance and Risk Management
description: Governance and risk management processes address cybersecurity risks
implementation_guidance: Integrate cybersecurity into governance and risk management. Define processes. Monitor risks.

title: Asset Vulnerabilities Identified
description: Asset vulnerabilities are identified and documented
implementation_guidance: Conduct vulnerability assessments. Scan systems. Identify weaknesses. Document findings. Prioritize remediation.

title: Cyber Threat Intelligence
description: Cyber threat intelligence received from information sharing forums
implementation_guidance: Subscribe to threat intelligence feeds. Participate in sharing communities. Analyze threats. Apply intelligence.

title: Internal and External Threats
description: Threats both internal and external identified and documented
description_ar: تحديد وتوثيق التهديدات من الداخل والخارج
implementation_guidance: Identify potential threats: external attackers insiders natural disasters. Document threat scenarios. Update regularly.

title: Potential Impact Identified
description: Potential business impacts and likelihoods identified
implementation_guidance: Assess potential impacts of security events. Evaluate likelihood. Calculate risk levels. Document findings.

title: Organizational Cybersecurity Policy
description: Organizational cybersecurity policy established and communicated
implementation_guidance: Develop comprehensive security policy. Obtain executive approval. Communicate organization-wide. Review annually.

title: Threats Vulnerabilities Impacts Used
description: Threats vulnerabilities likelihoods and impacts used to determine risk
description_ar: استخدام معلومات التهديدات والثغرات والآثار لتحديد المخاطر
implementation_guidance: Combine threat vulnerability and impact data. Calculate comprehensive risk. Support risk decisions.

title: Risk Management Process
description: Risk management processes established managed and agreed to
description_ar: تحديد وتوثيق وإدارة عمليات إدارة المخاطر
implementation_guidance: Establish risk management processes. Document methodology. Obtain stakeholder agreement. Review regularly.

title: Risk Tolerance Determined
description: Organizational risk tolerance determined and expressed
implementation_guidance: Define risk appetite and tolerance. Express in measurable terms. Communicate to stakeholders. Review annually.

title: Organization's Risk Tolerance
description: Organization's determination of risk tolerance informed by its role in infrastructure
description_ar: تحديد قبول المخاطر حسب دور المنظمة
implementation_guidance: Align risk tolerance with organizational role. Consider critical infrastructure position. Document rationale.

title: Supply Chain Risk Management
description: Cyber supply chain risk management processes identified documented and managed
description_ar: تحديد وتوثيق وإدارة عمليات سلسلة التوريد
implementation_guidance: Establish supply chain risk management. Define processes. Document third-party requirements. Monitor compliance.

title: Suppliers and Partners Identified
description: Suppliers and third-party partners identified prioritized and assessed
implementation_guidance: Identify all suppliers and partners. Prioritize by criticality. Assess risks. Document relationships.

title: Supplier Contracts
description: Contracts with suppliers and partners address cybersecurity requirements
description_ar: استخدام العقود لمعالجة مخاطر الأمن السيبراني
implementation_guidance: Include cybersecurity requirements in supplier contracts. Cover security controls incident notification audit rights.

title: Risk Responses Identified
implementation_guidance: Identify risk treatment options: mitigate transfer accept avoid. Prioritize responses. Obtain approvals.

title: Adequate Capacity
description: Adequate capacity to ensure availability maintained
implementation_guidance: Monitor capacity continuously. Plan for growth. Maintain adequate resources. Scale as needed.

title: Access Control
implementation_guidance: Restrict source code access. Use version control. Require authentication. Log access. Review permissions.

title: Vulnerability Assessment
implementation_guidance: Scan systems quarterly for vulnerabilities. Prioritize by severity. Remediate critical within 30 days.

title: Session Management
implementation_guidance: Implement session timeouts after inactivity. Require re-authentication. Lock workstations. Clear sessions on logout.

title: Multi-Factor Authentication
description: Implement multi-factor authentication for sensitive access
description_ar: تطبيق المصادقة متعددة العوامل للوصول الحساس
implementation_guidance: Require MFA for: remote access admin accounts financial systems. Use TOTP SMS or hardware tokens.

title: User Rights Review
implementation_guidance: Review user access quarterly. Verify appropriateness. Remove orphaned accounts. Document reviews.

title: Password Management
implementation_guidance: Enforce password complexity (12+ chars mixed case numbers symbols). Require periodic changes. Prevent reuse.

title: Privilege Management
description: Control granting and managing privileged access
description_ar: التحكم في منح وإدارة الصلاحيات الخاصة
implementation_guidance: Restrict privileged access. Require additional approval. Use separate admin accounts. Monitor privileged activities.

title: User Registration
implementation_guidance: Require manager approval for access. Verify identity. Assign unique user IDs. Document registrations.

title: Access Review
implementation_guidance: Conduct quarterly access reviews. Verify appropriateness. Revoke unnecessary access. Document reviews.

title: Need-to-Know Access
description: Grant access based on business need-to-know only
description_ar: منح الوصول بناءً على الحاجة للعمل فقط
implementation_guidance: Implement least privilege principle. Grant minimum necessary access. Require business justification.

title: Access Control Policy
description: Establish and enforce access control policy
description_ar: وضع وتطبيق سياسة التحكم في الوصول
implementation_guidance: Define access control policy. Cover authentication authorization privileges. Align with business needs.

title: Change of Responsibilities
description: Update access upon change of responsibilities
implementation_guidance: Review access when role changes. Grant new permissions. Revoke old permissions. Follow approval process.

title: Termination Procedures
description: Implement access termination procedures upon employment end
description_ar: تطبيق إجراءات إنهاء الوصول عند انتهاء العمل
implementation_guidance: Revoke all access immediately upon termination. Collect assets. Disable accounts. Document process.

title: Periodic Updates
implementation_guidance: Refresh security awareness annually. Provide updates on new threats and policies. Track participation.

title: Specialized Training
description: Provide specialized training for security roles
implementation_guidance: Train security team on technical skills threat intelligence incident response. Maintain certifications.

title: Security Awareness
description: Provide security awareness training to all personnel
description_ar: توفير تدريب التوعية الأمنية لجميع الموظفين
implementation_guidance: Conduct annual security awareness training. Cover policies phishing passwords incidents. Track completion.

title: Terms and Conditions
description: Define information security responsibilities in employment contracts
description_ar: تحديد مسؤوليات أمن المعلومات في عقود التوظيف
implementation_guidance: Include security responsibilities in contracts. Cover acceptable use confidentiality incident reporting.

title: Background Screening
description_ar: إجراء فحص خلفية للموظفين قبل التوظيف
implementation_guidance: Screen candidates: criminal check employment verification education. Document results. Repeat for sensitive roles.

title: Compliance Review
implementation_guidance: Conduct annual compliance audits. Verify controls meet requirements. Document gaps. Remediate issues.

title: Intellectual Property
implementation_guidance: Use licensed software only. Maintain license inventory. Prohibit piracy. Conduct software audits.

title: Personal Data Protection
description: Comply with personal data protection requirements
implementation_guidance: Implement PDPL controls. Obtain consent. Protect personal data. Respond to data subject rights.

title: Records Protection
description: Protect records from loss damage and forgery
description_ar: حماية السجلات من الفقدان والتلف والتزوير
implementation_guidance: Implement records management. Store securely. Control access. Maintain integrity. Enable retrieval.

title: Asset Inventory
description: Create and maintain comprehensive information asset inventory
description_ar: إنشاء والاحتفاظ بجرد شامل لأصول المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Identify all information assets. Document owner classification location. Update regularly. Review quarterly.

title: Asset Ownership
description: Define owner for each information asset
implementation_guidance: Assign asset owners. Document responsibilities. Obtain owner acceptance. Update upon personnel changes.

title: Network Access Control
implementation_guidance: Implement network segmentation. Use VLANs firewalls ACLs. Segregate zones (internet DMZ internal).

title: Acceptable Use
description: Define and enforce acceptable use rules for assets
description_ar: تحديد وتطبيق قواعد الاستخدام المقبول للأصول
implementation_guidance: Develop acceptable use policy. Cover computers email internet mobile devices. Obtain user acknowledgment.

title: Information Classification
description: Classify information according to sensitivity level
implementation_guidance: Define classification scheme (Public Internal Confidential Secret). Classify all information assets.

title: Information Labeling
implementation_guidance: Apply classification labels to documents systems storage. Use headers footers watermarks metadata.

title: Information Handling
implementation_guidance: Define handling procedures per classification. Cover storage transmission disposal. Train users.

title: Media Management
description_ar: إدارة الوسائط القابلة للإزالة بشكل آمن
implementation_guidance: Control use of USB drives CDs DVDs. Require encryption. Track media. Restrict unauthorized devices.

title: Media Disposal
description: Securely dispose of media containing sensitive information
description_ar: التخلص الآمن من الوسائط المحتوية على معلومات حساسة
implementation_guidance: Shred paper documents. Degauss or physically destroy electronic media. Use certified disposal services. Document.

title: Media Transfer
implementation_guidance: Encrypt data on portable media. Use secure couriers. Track shipments. Require receipts. Use tamper-evident packaging.

title: Asset Return
description: Ensure return of all assets upon employment termination
description_ar: ضمان إعادة جميع الأصول عند انتهاء العمل
implementation_guidance: Include asset return in termination checklist. Collect equipment. Disable access. Document return.

title: Test Data
implementation_guidance: Prohibit production data in test. Mask or anonymize if production data used. Delete after testing.

title: Network Authentication
description: Authenticate users and devices for network access
implementation_guidance: Implement 802.1X NAC. Authenticate before network access. Validate device compliance. Quarantine non-compliant.

title: Cryptographic Policy
description: Establish policy for cryptographic controls use
implementation_guidance: Define cryptographic policy. Specify approved algorithms key lengths protocols. Cover data at rest and in transit.

title: Penetration Testing
implementation_guidance: Perform annual penetration tests. Test critical applications. Use qualified testers. Remediate findings.

title: Code Review
implementation_guidance: Conduct peer code reviews. Use static analysis tools. Check for vulnerabilities: injection XSS authentication flaws.

title: Security Reviews
implementation_guidance: Conduct security reviews at design and pre-deployment. Perform code review vulnerability assessment penetration test.

title: Development Methodology
implementation_guidance: Adopt secure SDLC. Include security in all phases: requirements design coding testing deployment.

title: System Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Monitor systems for unauthorized access unusual activity performance issues security events. Generate alerts.

title: Log Retention
implementation_guidance: Retain logs minimum 1 year (critical systems 3 years). Archive long-term. Ensure accessibility.

title: Log Review
implementation_guidance: Review critical system logs daily. Investigate anomalies. Automate alerting. Document reviews.

title: Log Protection
implementation_guidance: Store logs on separate system. Restrict access. Use write-once media. Implement log integrity checks.

title: Event Logging
implementation_guidance: Log authentication access changes admin activities errors. Include timestamp user action result.

title: Medicines
implementation_guidance: Zero-rate medicines on approved MOH list. Apply standard rate to other medicines and medical supplies. Maintain updated list. Document medicine category.

title: Education
implementation_guidance: Zero-rate private education in Saudi Arabia. Zero-rate higher education. Apply to tuition fees. Exempt other education. Document education type.

title: Deregistration
implementation_guidance: Apply for deregistration if turnover falls below threshold. Clear outstanding VAT. Submit final return. Account for stock on hand. Obtain deregistration.

title: Agricultural Products
implementation_guidance: Apply VAT to all agricultural products. Include crops livestock products. No exemptions. Issue tax invoices. Track agricultural sales.

title: Data Anonymization
implementation_guidance: Anonymize personal data. Use techniques: masking pseudonymization aggregation. Verify anonymization. Prevent re-identification.

title: Data Analytics
implementation_guidance: Provide analytics platforms. Control access to analytics. Anonymize data for analytics. Monitor usage.

title: Automated Decisions
implementation_guidance: Identify automated decisions. Provide human oversight. Enable appeals. Explain logic. Obtain consent where required.

title: Model Transparency
implementation_guidance: Document model logic. Provide explanations for decisions. Enable model interpretability. Support auditability.

title: Training Data
implementation_guidance: Ensure training data quality. Remove bias. Protect privacy. Document data sources. Validate data.

title: AI Risk Assessment
implementation_guidance: Identify AI risks: bias privacy security. Assess impact. Implement mitigations. Monitor AI behavior.

title: AI Governance
implementation_guidance: Develop AI governance policy. Define AI ethics principles. Establish AI review board. Govern AI lifecycle.

title: Open Data
implementation_guidance: Define open data policy. Classify data for opening. Remove sensitive information. Publish appropriately.

title: Data Sharing
implementation_guidance: Define data sharing policies. Approve data sharing. Use data sharing agreements. Control third-party access.

title: Operating Procedures
implementation_guidance: Document IT operations procedures. Cover backup monitoring change management. Update regularly. Make accessible.

title: Change Management
description_ar: التحكم في التغييرات على أنظمة المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Implement formal change management. Require approval. Test changes. Document. Provide rollback capability.

title: Capacity Management
implementation_guidance: Monitor CPU memory disk network utilization. Project future needs. Plan capacity upgrades.

title: Equipment Maintenance
implementation_guidance: Follow manufacturer maintenance schedules. Use authorized service providers. Supervise maintenance. Log activities.

title: Identify Requirements
description: Identify legal regulatory and contractual requirements
implementation_guidance: Identify applicable laws and regulations. Document compliance obligations. Maintain compliance register.

title: Data Leak Protection
implementation_guidance: Implement DLP controls. Monitor data exfiltration. Block unauthorized transfers. Encrypt removable media.

title: Development and Testing Separated
description: Development and testing environments separated from production
description_ar: فصل بيئات التطوير والاختبار عن الإنتاج
implementation_guidance: Maintain separate dev test and production environments. Restrict production access. Use non-production data in test.

title: Cryptographic Key Management
description: Fully documented and implemented cryptographic key lifecycle
description_ar: الإدارة الكاملة لدورة حياة المفاتيح التشفيرية
implementation_guidance: Document complete key lifecycle. Implement all phases. Use secure cryptographic devices. Maintain key inventory.

title: Key Storage
implementation_guidance: Store keys securely. Encrypt stored keys. Use HSM or equivalent. Restrict access to keys. Separate from encrypted data.

title: Key Distribution
implementation_guidance: Distribute keys using secure methods. Encrypt during transmission. Use key-encryption keys. Limit distribution.

title: Key Generation
implementation_guidance: Generate keys using approved methods. Use cryptographically strong random number generators. Generate in secure environment.

title: Key Management
description: Documented and implemented key management procedures
implementation_guidance: Manage cryptographic keys throughout lifecycle: generation distribution storage rotation destruction. Use key management system.

title: Authentication Data Encryption
description: Do not store sensitive authentication data after authorization
description_ar: عدم تخزين بيانات المصادقة الحساسة بعد التفويض
implementation_guidance: Prohibit storage of SAD post-authorization: full track CAV2/CVC2/CVV2 PIN/PIN blocks. Implement controls to prevent storage.

title: PAN Encryption
description_ar: تشفير رقم الحساب الأساسي في جميع مواقع التخزين
implementation_guidance: Encrypt PAN in all storage locations: databases files backups logs. Use strong cryptography (AES-256). Manage keys securely.

title: Full PAN Access
description_ar: تقييد الوصول لرقم الحساب الأساسي الكامل
implementation_guidance: Limit access to full PAN. Grant only to authorized personnel with business need. Require approval. Log access.

title: PAN Masking
description_ar: إخفاء رقم الحساب الأساسي عند العرض
implementation_guidance: Mask PAN when displayed. Show only first 6 and last 4 digits. Implement masking in applications screens reports.

title: Minimize Storage
implementation_guidance: Store only required CHD. Eliminate unnecessary storage. Do not store sensitive authentication data post-authorization.

title: Data Deletion
description_ar: حذف بيانات حاملي البطاقات بشكل آمن
implementation_guidance: Permanently delete CHD when no longer needed. Use secure deletion methods: overwriting degaussing destruction. Verify deletion.

title: Data Retention
description: Implemented data retention and disposal policies
description_ar: تنفيذ سياسة الاحتفاظ بالبيانات وإجراءات التخلص الآمن
implementation_guidance: Define CHD retention periods. Implement secure deletion after retention. Delete when no longer needed. Document disposal.

title: Default Accounts
description: Removed or disabled all default accounts
description_ar: إزالة أو تعطيل جميع الحسابات الافتراضية
implementation_guidance: Remove or disable default accounts. Include vendor system application accounts. Document retained accounts and justification.

title: Default Passwords
implementation_guidance: Change all default passwords before deployment. Include systems databases applications network devices. Document changes.

title: Encrypted Admin Communications
description_ar: تشفير جميع الوصول الإداري غير المحلي
implementation_guidance: Encrypt all remote administrative access. Use SSH VPN TLS. Prohibit unencrypted admin access. Monitor compliance.

title: Protocol Management
implementation_guidance: Inventory protocols in use. Disable insecure protocols (SSLv2 SSLv3 TLS1.0). Use secure alternatives. Document usage.

title: Security Features Management
description: Managed security features built into system components
implementation_guidance: Enable and configure security features. Activate logging auditing access controls. Document configurations. Test effectiveness.

title: Inbound Traffic Inspection
description: Inspected all inbound traffic to CDE
description_ar: فحص جميع حركة المرور الواردة إلى بيئة بيانات حاملي البطاقات
implementation_guidance: Inspect inbound traffic for malicious content. Use IDS/IPS. Block attacks. Log inspection results.

title: Prevent Direct Access
description: Prevented direct access between internet and CDE
description_ar: منع الوصول المباشر بين الإنترنت وبيئة بيانات حاملي البطاقات
implementation_guidance: Block direct internet access to CDE systems. Route through DMZ and firewalls. Implement defense-in-depth.

title: Network Segmentation
description_ar: تجزئة بيئة بيانات حاملي البطاقات من الشبكات الأخرى
implementation_guidance: Implement network segmentation to isolate CDE. Use VLANs firewalls. Limit systems in scope. Test segmentation.

title: Segmentation Testing
description_ar: اختبار التجزئة على الأقل مرة واحدة سنوياً
implementation_guidance: Test network segmentation annually and after significant changes. Verify isolation. Document test results.

title: Trusted and Untrusted Zones
description: Defined trusted and untrusted network zones
implementation_guidance: Define network security zones: trusted (CDE) semi-trusted (DMZ) untrusted (internet). Document zone definitions.

title: Inter-Zone Rules
description: Implemented firewall rules between different network zones
description_ar: تطبيق قواعد جدار الحماية بين المناطق
implementation_guidance: Control traffic between network zones. Allow only necessary flows. Document zone-to-zone traffic. Review rules.

title: Key Protection
description: Protected keys from disclosure and misuse
description_ar: حماية المفاتيح من الإفصاح والاستخدام غير المصرح
implementation_guidance: Protect cryptographic keys. Restrict access to fewest necessary. Prevent unauthorized disclosure. Monitor key usage.

title: Data Leakage Prevention
description: Prevented disclosure of internal IP addresses and routing info
description_ar: منع تسريب البيانات الحساسة من بيئة بيانات حاملي البطاقات
implementation_guidance: Prevent disclosure of internal network details. Use NAT. Block information leakage. Hide internal addressing.

title: Hardening Standards
implementation_guidance: Develop system hardening standards. Address all system components. Cover OS database application network. Update with threats.

title: Hardening Implementation
description: Implemented hardening standards on all systems
description_ar: تطبيق معايير التقوية على جميع الأنظمة
implementation_guidance: Apply hardening to all systems: servers databases network devices. Remove unnecessary services. Document exceptions.

title: Secure Configurations
description: Implemented secure configurations for all system components
description_ar: تطبيق إعدادات آمنة لجميع مكونات النظام
implementation_guidance: Configure systems securely. Change default passwords. Disable unnecessary accounts services features. Document settings.

title: Configuration Standards
description: Developed configuration standards for all system components
description_ar: تطوير معايير التكوين لجميع مكونات النظام
implementation_guidance: Create configuration standards for each system type. Address security parameters. Maintain documentation. Update regularly.

title: Encryption for Insecure Services
description: Implemented strong cryptography for insecure services
description_ar: تطبيق تشفير قوي للخدمات غير الآمنة
implementation_guidance: Encrypt insecure services and protocols. Use TLS for HTTP. Use SSH for Telnet. Disable unencrypted protocols.

title: Service Inventory
description: Maintained inventory of services protocols and ports
implementation_guidance: Inventory all services protocols ports. Document business justification. Identify insecure services. Update regularly.

title: Network Security Configuration
implementation_guidance: Manage firewall and router configurations. Use version control. Track changes. Implement change management.

title: DMZ Implementation
description: Implemented DMZ to separate untrusted networks from CDE
description_ar: تطبيق منطقة منزوعة السلاح لفصل الشبكات غير الموثوقة
implementation_guidance: Implement DMZ between internet and CDE. Place public-facing systems in DMZ. Restrict DMZ to CDE traffic.

title: Transmission Encryption
description_ar: تشفير بيانات حاملي البطاقات أثناء النقل
implementation_guidance: Encrypt CHD during transmission over open public networks. Use strong cryptography (TLS 1.2+). Verify encryption.

title: No Unencrypted Transmission
description: Never sent unencrypted PANs via end-user messaging
description_ar: عدم إرسال رقم الحساب غير المشفر
implementation_guidance: Prohibit sending unencrypted PAN via email SMS instant messaging. Block transmission. Educate users. Monitor violations.

title: Insufficient Logging
description: Protected against insufficient logging and monitoring
description_ar: الحماية من السجلات والمراقبة غير الكافية
implementation_guidance: Implement comprehensive logging. Log security events. Monitor logs. Alert on suspicious activity. Protect logs.

title: Vulnerable Components
description: Protected against using components with known vulnerabilities
description_ar: الحماية من استخدام مكونات ذات ثغرات معروفة
implementation_guidance: Inventory components. Monitor vulnerabilities. Update vulnerable components. Remove unnecessary components. Track versions.

title: Insecure Deserialization
implementation_guidance: Validate serialized data. Restrict deserialization. Monitor for tampering. Use secure serialization libraries.

title: Cross-Site Scripting
implementation_guidance: Prevent XSS attacks. Encode output. Validate input. Use CSP. Sanitize user data. Test for XSS.

title: Broken Access Control
description_ar: الحماية من التحكم في الوصول المعطل
implementation_guidance: Implement proper authorization. Enforce access controls. Prevent privilege escalation. Use RBAC. Test access controls.

title: XML External Entities
implementation_guidance: Disable XML external entity processing. Validate XML input. Use safe parsers. Update XML libraries.

title: Sensitive Data Exposure
implementation_guidance: Encrypt sensitive data at rest and in transit. Minimize storage. Mask when displayed. Implement access controls.

title: Broken Authentication
implementation_guidance: Implement strong authentication. Use MFA. Enforce password complexity. Prevent credential stuffing. Secure session management.

title: Injection Flaws
implementation_guidance: Prevent SQL NoSQL OS command injection. Use parameterized queries. Validate input. Encode output. Test for injection.

title: Secure Coding Practices
implementation_guidance: Adopt secure coding standards. Address OWASP Top 10. Avoid injection XSS authentication flaws. Train developers.

title: Patch Inventory
implementation_guidance: Track all deployed patches. Document patch levels. Identify missing patches. Monitor patch status. Report compliance.

title: All Patches
implementation_guidance: Deploy all security patches. Test before production. Follow change management. Document patching. Track exceptions.

title: Critical Patches
description: Installed critical security patches within one month
description_ar: تثبيت التصحيحات الحرجة خلال شهر واحد
implementation_guidance: Deploy critical security patches within 30 days of release. Test patches. Implement in production. Document deployment.

title: Remediation Timeline
implementation_guidance: Define remediation SLAs: Critical 15 days High 30 days Medium 90 days. Track compliance. Escalate overdue items.

title: Vulnerability Classification
implementation_guidance: Classify vulnerabilities by severity (Critical High Medium Low). Use CVSS or equivalent. Consider environment context. Prioritize remediation.

title: Vulnerability Identification
implementation_guidance: Monitor vulnerability announcements. Subscribe to security bulletins. Track vendor advisories. Assess applicability. Document findings.

title: Unsupported Software
implementation_guidance: Identify unsupported software. Plan upgrades or replacements. Implement compensating controls if retention required. Document risks.

title: No Send Policy
description_ar: سياسة تمنع إرسال رقم الحساب غير المشفر
implementation_guidance: Establish policy prohibiting unencrypted PAN transmission. Communicate to all personnel. Enforce policy. Review compliance.

title: Technical Controls
description: Technical controls prevent unencrypted PAN transmission
description_ar: ضوابط تقنية لمنع إرسال رقم الحساب غير المشفر
implementation_guidance: Implement DLP to block unencrypted PAN. Scan outbound messages. Block violations. Alert security. Log incidents.

title: Anti-Malware Programs
implementation_guidance: Deploy anti-malware on all systems commonly affected by malware. Include workstations servers. Update regularly. Scan continuously.

title: Anti-Malware Updates
implementation_guidance: Update anti-malware signatures at least daily. Enable automatic updates. Verify update success. Investigate failures.

title: Periodic Scans
implementation_guidance: Scan systems for malware. Run full scans weekly. Run quick scans daily. Remediate detections. Log scan results.

title: On-Demand Scans
description_ar: القدرة على إجراء فحوصات عند الطلب
implementation_guidance: Enable on-demand anti-malware scans. Allow administrators to initiate scans. Scan suspicious systems. Document scans.

title: Network Examples
description: Provided examples of open public networks
implementation_guidance: Identify open public networks: internet WiFi cellular 3G/4G/5G. Understand transmission risks. Apply encryption.

title: Anti-Malware Logs
implementation_guidance: Log all anti-malware events: scans detections remediations updates. Retain logs 1 year (3 months online). Protect logs.

title: Suspicious Activity Detection
implementation_guidance: Monitor for suspicious activities. Detect anomalies. Investigate suspicious behavior. Block malicious activities. Alert security.

title: Phishing Protection
implementation_guidance: Implement anti-phishing controls. Filter phishing emails. Block malicious links. Train users. Simulate phishing.

title: Secure Development Processes
description: Defined and implemented secure development processes
implementation_guidance: Establish secure development lifecycle. Include security in all phases. Train developers. Review code. Test security.

title: Environment Separation
description_ar: فصل بيئات التطوير والاختبار عن الإنتاج
implementation_guidance: Maintain separate dev/test/production environments. Restrict production access. Use non-production data in test. Control migration.

title: Vulnerability Management
implementation_guidance: Establish vulnerability management program. Scan systems. Identify vulnerabilities. Prioritize. Remediate per risk.

title: Software Inventory
implementation_guidance: Inventory all software: OS applications libraries. Document versions. Identify supported/unsupported. Update regularly.

title: Advanced Protection
description_ar: تطبيق آليات حماية متقدمة من البرمجيات الخبيثة
implementation_guidance: Deploy advanced anti-malware: behavior analysis sandboxing machine learning threat intelligence. Protect against zero-days.

title: Integrity Checking
description: Integrity checking mechanisms used to verify integrity
implementation_guidance: Implement integrity monitoring. Use file integrity monitoring checksums digital signatures. Detect unauthorized changes.

title: Rule Exceptions
description: Documented all exceptions to firewall rules
description_ar: توثيق جميع استثناءات قواعد جدار الحماية
implementation_guidance: Document all firewall rule exceptions. Include business justification approval compensating controls. Review annually.

title: Inbound Rules
description: Implemented strict inbound connection rules to CDE
description_ar: تطبيق قواعد صارمة للاتصالات الواردة إلى بيئة بيانات حاملي البطاقات
implementation_guidance: Restrict inbound traffic to CDE. Allow only necessary connections. Deny all by default. Document exceptions.

title: External Service Provider Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Monitor third-party access and activities. Track vendor actions. Detect unauthorized activities. Review regularly.

title: Inspections
implementation_guidance: Prepare for municipal inspections. Maintain compliance. Address violations. Document corrections. Pass inspections.

title: Unauthorized Software Detection
implementation_guidance: Detect unauthorized software and mobile code. Use whitelisting. Scan for unapproved applications. Remove violations.

title: Malicious Code Detection
implementation_guidance: Deploy anti-malware. Detect viruses trojans ransomware. Update signatures. Scan continuously. Quarantine threats.

title: Personnel Activity Monitoring
description: Personnel activity monitored to detect potential cybersecurity events
implementation_guidance: Monitor user activities. Detect unauthorized access data exfiltration policy violations. Investigate anomalies.

title: Physical Environment Monitoring
description: Physical environment monitored to detect potential cybersecurity events
implementation_guidance: Monitor physical security. Use CCTV motion sensors. Detect unauthorized access. Alert on incidents.

title: Network Monitoring
description: Network monitored to detect potential cybersecurity events
implementation_guidance: Monitor network continuously for security events. Detect anomalies intrusions malware. Generate alerts.

title: Alert Thresholds
implementation_guidance: Define thresholds for security alerts. Set appropriate sensitivity. Balance false positives and detection. Review effectiveness.

title: Impact Determination
implementation_guidance: Assess impact of security events. Determine business impact. Classify severity. Prioritize response.

title: Event Data Aggregated
description: Event data aggregated and correlated from multiple sources
implementation_guidance: Aggregate events from multiple sources. Correlate data. Use SIEM. Detect patterns and anomalies.

title: Detected Events Analyzed
description: Detected events analyzed to understand attack targets and methods
implementation_guidance: Analyze detected security events. Understand attack vectors targets methods. Use analysis for improvement.

title: Baseline Network Operations
description: Baseline of network operations and expected data flows established
implementation_guidance: Establish baseline of normal network behavior. Document expected traffic patterns data flows. Monitor for deviations.

title: Resilience
description: Mechanisms implemented to achieve resilience requirements
implementation_guidance: Implement resilience mechanisms: redundancy failover backup. Eliminate single points of failure. Test failover.

title: Communications and Networks
implementation_guidance: Protect networks. Use segmentation firewalls encryption. Monitor traffic. Detect intrusions.

title: Least Functionality
implementation_guidance: Implement least functionality. Disable unnecessary services ports protocols. Remove unnecessary software. Document exceptions.

title: Removable Media
description: Removable media protected and use restricted
implementation_guidance: Control removable media. Restrict use. Require encryption. Track media. Scan for malware.

title: Audit Records
description: Audit/log records determined documented implemented and reviewed
implementation_guidance: Define logging requirements. Log security events. Protect logs. Review regularly. Retain appropriately.

title: Remote Maintenance
description: Remote maintenance approved logged and performed preventing unauthorized access
description_ar: الموافقة على الصيانة عن بعد وتسجيلها ومنعها
implementation_guidance: Control remote maintenance. Require approval. Use secure methods. Monitor sessions. Log activities. Prevent unauthorized access.

title: Hardware Integrity
description: Integrity checking mechanisms used to verify hardware integrity
implementation_guidance: Verify hardware integrity. Use TPM secure boot hardware security modules. Detect tampering.

title: Baseline Configuration
implementation_guidance: Define configuration baselines. Document standard configurations. Control changes. Audit compliance.

title: System Development Lifecycle
description: System development life cycle implemented to manage systems
description_ar: دورة حياة تطوير النظام لإدارة الأنظمة
implementation_guidance: Implement secure SDLC. Include security in all phases. Conduct security reviews. Document lifecycle.

title: Configuration Change Control
description: Configuration change control processes in place
implementation_guidance: Implement formal change management. Require approvals. Test changes. Document. Enable rollback.

title: Backups of Information
description: Backups of information conducted maintained and tested
implementation_guidance: Backup critical data and systems. Implement 3-2-1 strategy. Test restores quarterly. Document procedures.

title: Physical Operating Environment
description: Physical operating environment for assets managed
implementation_guidance: Manage physical environment. Control temperature humidity power. Protect from environmental threats.

title: Unauthorized Personnel Detection
description: Monitoring for unauthorized personnel connections devices and software
description_ar: مراقبة الموظفين والاتصالات والأجهزة غير المصرح بها
implementation_guidance: Detect unauthorized users devices connections. Monitor for rogue devices. Detect shadow IT. Investigate anomalies.

title: Data Destruction
implementation_guidance: Implement secure data destruction. Shred paper documents. Wipe or destroy electronic media. Document destruction.

title: Protection Technology Effectiveness
implementation_guidance: Share information on protection technology effectiveness. Participate in industry forums. Learn from others.

title: Response and Recovery Plans
description: Response plans and recovery plans in place and managed
description_ar: خطط الاستجابة والتعافي في مكانها واختبارها
implementation_guidance: Develop and maintain IR and DR plans. Test annually. Update based on tests. Train personnel.

title: Response and Recovery Plans Tested
implementation_guidance: Test response and recovery plans. Conduct tabletop and full-scale exercises. Document results. Implement improvements.

title: Cybersecurity in HR
title_ar: الأمن السيبراني في إدارة الموارد البشرية
description: Cybersecurity included in human resources practices
description_ar: الأمن السيبراني مضمن في ممارسات الموارد البشرية
implementation_guidance: Include security in HR practices: screening hiring contracts termination. Conduct background checks. Sign NDAs.

title: Vulnerability Management Plan
description: Vulnerability management plan developed and implemented
implementation_guidance: Develop vulnerability management plan. Scan regularly. Prioritize vulnerabilities. Remediate per SLAs. Track progress.

title: Asset Maintenance
description: Maintenance and repair of assets performed and logged
implementation_guidance: Maintain assets per manufacturer specs. Log maintenance. Use authorized service providers. Supervise maintenance.

title: Protection Processes
implementation_guidance: Continuously improve protection processes. Review effectiveness. Implement lessons learned. Update procedures.

title: Secure Management
description: Secured all administrative access to network security controls
description_ar: تأمين جميع الوصول الإداري لمكونات أمن الشبكة
implementation_guidance: Restrict administrative access to firewalls routers. Use dedicated admin network or jump server. Require MFA.

title: Vulnerability Scans
implementation_guidance: Scan for vulnerabilities regularly. Use authenticated scans. Scan systems applications networks. Remediate findings.

title: Detection Activities
implementation_guidance: Align detection activities with legal regulatory contractual requirements. Document compliance.

title: Outbound Rules
description: Implemented strict outbound connection rules from CDE
description_ar: تطبيق قواعد صارمة للاتصالات الصادرة من بيئة بيانات حاملي البطاقات
implementation_guidance: Restrict outbound traffic from CDE. Allow only necessary connections. Document justification. Review regularly.

title: Data Flows
description: Documented all data flows for cardholder data
description_ar: توثيق جميع تدفقات بيانات حاملي البطاقات
implementation_guidance: Document CHD data flows across networks systems applications. Update with changes. Include storage transmission processing.

title: Ruleset Reviews
description: Review all firewall and router rulesets at least every six months
description_ar: مراجعة قواعد جدار الحماية كل 6 أشهر
implementation_guidance: Review firewall rules every 6 months. Remove unnecessary rules. Document review. Update rulesets.

title: Configuration Standards
description: Defined configuration standards for network security controls
implementation_guidance: Develop firewall and router configuration standards. Define ruleset standards. Document approved services protocols ports.

title: Network Diagrams
implementation_guidance: Maintain up-to-date network diagrams showing all connections to CDE. Update within 6 months of changes.

title: Fire Safety
implementation_guidance: Install fire protection systems. Provide fire alarms. Install sprinklers. Ensure fire exits. Maintain systems.

title: Firewall Documentation
description: Documented all connections between CDE and other networks
description_ar: توثيق جميع الاتصالات بين بيئة بيانات حاملي البطاقات والشبكات الأخرى
implementation_guidance: Document all network connections to/from CDE. Include internet business partners third parties. Maintain network diagrams.

title: Recovery Activities Communicated
implementation_guidance: Communicate recovery progress to stakeholders. Provide regular updates. Share timelines. Manage expectations.

title: Reputation Repair
implementation_guidance: Rebuild reputation after incidents. Communicate recovery actions. Demonstrate improvements. Restore stakeholder confidence.

title: Public Relations
implementation_guidance: Manage public communications during incidents. Coordinate messaging. Protect reputation. Provide accurate information.

title: Recovery Strategy Update
implementation_guidance: Update recovery strategies. Incorporate new threats technologies processes. Align with business changes.

title: Recovery Plan Improvement
implementation_guidance: Update recovery plans based on lessons learned. Implement improvements from incidents and tests. Review regularly.

title: Recovery Plan
description: Recovery plan executed during or after event
implementation_guidance: Execute recovery plan. Restore systems and services. Follow documented procedures. Coordinate recovery activities.

title: Response Strategy Update
implementation_guidance: Update response strategies based on lessons learned and threat landscape changes. Review regularly.

title: Lessons Learned
implementation_guidance: Conduct post-incident reviews. Identify lessons learned. Update response plans. Implement improvements. Share knowledge.

title: Newly Identified Vulnerabilities
description: Newly identified vulnerabilities mitigated or documented
implementation_guidance: Mitigate newly discovered vulnerabilities. Patch or implement compensating controls. Document risk acceptance.

title: Incident Mitigation
implementation_guidance: Mitigate incident impact. Stop malicious activities. Prevent further damage. Restore partial functionality.

title: Incident Containment
implementation_guidance: Contain incidents promptly. Isolate affected systems. Prevent spread. Minimize impact. Document actions.

title: Detection Processes Tested
implementation_guidance: Test detection capabilities regularly. Conduct red team exercises. Verify alert effectiveness. Improve based on results.

title: Event Detection Information
implementation_guidance: Communicate detection events to appropriate personnel. Provide timely notifications. Share relevant information.

title: Detection Process Improvement
implementation_guidance: Continuously improve detection processes. Review effectiveness. Implement lessons learned. Update procedures.

title: Response Plan
description: Response plan executed during or after incident
implementation_guidance: Execute incident response plan. Follow documented procedures. Activate response team. Coordinate actions.

title: Personnel Notification
description: Personnel know their roles and order of operations
implementation_guidance: Communicate roles and responsibilities to personnel. Provide contact information. Train on procedures. Update regularly.

title: Incident Reporting
description: Incidents reported consistent with established criteria
implementation_guidance: Report incidents to appropriate authorities. Follow legal regulatory requirements. Notify affected parties. Document reports.

title: Detection Roles
description: Roles and responsibilities for detection defined
implementation_guidance: Define detection roles and responsibilities. Assign to personnel. Provide training. Document escalation.

title: Information Sharing
description: Information shared consistent with response plans
implementation_guidance: Share incident information with stakeholders. Coordinate with internal and external parties. Follow communication plans.

title: Safety
implementation_guidance: Ensure building safety. Install fire safety systems. Provide emergency exits. Meet structural safety. Conduct inspections.

title: Voluntary Information Sharing
implementation_guidance: Share threat information voluntarily. Participate in sharing communities. Contribute to collective defense.

title: Notification Investigation
description_ar: التحقيق في الإشعارات من أنظمة الكشف
implementation_guidance: Investigate all security alerts. Analyze events. Determine if incidents. Escalate appropriately. Document findings.

title: Incident Impact Understanding
implementation_guidance: Assess incident impact. Determine business impact scope affected systems data. Document assessment.

title: Forensics
implementation_guidance: Conduct forensic analysis. Preserve evidence. Maintain chain of custody. Use forensic tools. Document findings.

title: Incident Categorization
description: Incidents categorized consistent with response plans
implementation_guidance: Categorize incidents by type severity impact. Use consistent classification. Support prioritization and response.

title: Process and Improvement
description: Processes used to receive analyze and respond to vulnerabilities
implementation_guidance: Use processes to improve response. Analyze effectiveness. Implement improvements. Update procedures.

title: Stakeholder Coordination
implementation_guidance: Coordinate response with stakeholders. Include law enforcement regulators customers partners. Document coordination.

title: Risk Review
description: Review risks periodically or upon major changes
description_ar: مراجعة المخاطر دورياً أو عند التغييرات الجوهرية
implementation_guidance: Review risk register quarterly. Update after significant changes. Re-assess critical risks. Document reviews.

title: Risk Acceptance
description: Obtain management approval for residual risk acceptance
description_ar: الحصول على موافقة الإدارة لقبول المخاطر المتبقية
implementation_guidance: Document residual risks. Obtain executive acceptance. Review annually. Update based on changes.

title: Risk Treatment
implementation_guidance: Develop risk treatment plans. Implement controls. Track remediation. Verify effectiveness.

title: Safe Environment
implementation_guidance: Keep floors dry and clear. Ensure adequate lighting. Use non-slip mats. Maintain bed rails. Remove hazards. Provide assistive devices.

title: Fall Risk Assessment
implementation_guidance: Use validated fall risk assessment tool. Assess all patients on admission. Reassess after change in condition. Identify high-risk patients. Document assessment.

title: Fall Prevention
implementation_guidance: Assess fall risk on admission. Implement fall prevention interventions. Use bed alarms for high-risk patients. Keep call bells within reach. Maintain safe environment.

title: Healthcare-Associated Infections
implementation_guidance: Track HAI rates: CLABSI CAUTI SSI VAP. Investigate outbreaks. Implement prevention bundles. Report to MOH. Trend infection data.

title: Instrument Sterilization
implementation_guidance: Sterilize all reusable medical instruments. Follow sterilization protocols. Validate sterilization effectiveness. Track sterilization cycles. Maintain sterility.

title: Isolation Precautions
implementation_guidance: Identify patients requiring isolation. Implement appropriate precautions: contact droplet airborne. Provide isolation rooms. Use proper PPE. Monitor compliance.

title: Hand Hygiene
implementation_guidance: Implement hand hygiene program. Provide hand sanitizer at point of care. Monitor compliance. Educate staff on hand hygiene. Achieve >90% compliance.

title: Infection Control
implementation_guidance: Establish infection prevention program. Monitor healthcare-associated infections (HAIs). Implement isolation protocols. Track infection rates.

title: Drug Allergies
implementation_guidance: Record all drug allergies prominently in medical record. Display allergy alerts in prescription systems. Verify allergies before medication. Update allergy information.

title: Medication Reconciliation
implementation_guidance: Reconcile medications at admission transfer discharge. Compare current medications with new orders. Identify discrepancies. Resolve conflicts.

title: High-Risk Medications
implementation_guidance: Identify high-alert medications. Store separately with clear labels. Require double-check before administration. Limit access. Monitor closely.

title: Medication Error Prevention
implementation_guidance: Use computerized physician order entry (CPOE). Implement clinical decision support. Check drug interactions allergies. Verify high-risk medications.

title: Medication Safety
implementation_guidance: Implement five rights of medication: right patient drug dose route time. Verify before administration. Use barcode scanning. Document administration.

title: Identity Error Prevention
implementation_guidance: Verify identity before all procedures. Check ID band against order. Confirm with patient when conscious. Document verification.

title: Identification Bands
implementation_guidance: Apply ID bands to all patients on admission. Include name date of birth medical record number. Replace damaged bands. Verify band accuracy.

title: Patient Identification
implementation_guidance: Use at least two patient identifiers. Verify identity before procedures medications specimen collection. Use patient ID bands.

title: Safety Policies
implementation_guidance: Develop comprehensive safety policies. Cover medication safety infection prevention fall prevention. Review policies annually.

title: E-Prescribing
implementation_guidance: Secure e-prescribing systems. Verify prescriber identity. Check drug interactions. Prevent prescription fraud. Track controlled substances.

title: Prescription Verification
implementation_guidance: Authenticate prescriptions. Verify prescriber credentials. Check prescription validity. Prevent prescription forgery. Monitor unusual patterns.

title: Genomic Data
implementation_guidance: Secure genetic information. Encrypt genomic data. Control access to genetic records. Maintain genomic privacy. Obtain specific consent.

title: Genomic Privacy
implementation_guidance: Protect genetic privacy. Prevent genetic discrimination. Secure family genetic data. Control genetic data sharing. De-identify genetic information.

title: Medical Imaging Security
implementation_guidance: Secure DICOM images. Encrypt image storage and transmission. Control radiologist access. Maintain image integrity. Enable secure image sharing.

title: Image Archiving
implementation_guidance: Implement PACS for image archiving. Ensure image quality. Enable long-term storage. Provide image retrieval. Backup medical images.

title: Surgical Safety
implementation_guidance: Use WHO Surgical Safety Checklist. Perform time-out before incision. Verify correct patient procedure site. Count instruments and sponges. Mark surgical site.

title: Medical Billing Systems
implementation_guidance: Secure billing systems. Protect billing information. Prevent billing fraud. Ensure billing accuracy. Maintain billing records.

title: Health Systems Integration
implementation_guidance: Secure health IT integrations. Use secure APIs. Authenticate integrated systems. Encrypt integration data. Monitor integration points.

title: Medical APIs
implementation_guidance: Secure healthcare APIs. Implement OAuth for health apps. Control API access to patient data. Rate limit API calls. Log API activity.

title: Emergency Access
implementation_guidance: Implement break-glass access for emergencies. Log all emergency access. Review emergency access post-event. Prevent abuse.

title: Emergency Systems
implementation_guidance: Ensure 24/7 availability of critical clinical systems. Implement redundancy for emergency systems. Enable failover. Test emergency procedures.

title: Patient Safety Governance
implementation_guidance: Establish patient safety governance framework. Create patient safety committee. Define safety objectives. Assign safety responsibilities.

title: Safety Culture
implementation_guidance: Build just culture for safety reporting. Encourage error reporting without blame. Learn from incidents. Recognize safety champions.

title: Billing Privacy
implementation_guidance: Protect patient billing privacy. Limit access to billing data. Secure payment information. Maintain billing confidentiality.

title: Medical Access Logs
implementation_guidance: Review patient data access logs regularly. Detect unauthorized access. Investigate suspicious access. Report violations.

title: Pre-Surgical Verification
implementation_guidance: Conduct pre-surgical verification. Confirm patient identity. Verify surgical procedure and site. Check consent. Review imaging. Ensure equipment availability.

title: Surgical Site Marking
implementation_guidance: Mark surgical site before procedure. Involve patient in marking. Use indelible marker. Mark correct side for laterality. Verify mark in OR.

title: Suicide Prevention
implementation_guidance: Screen for suicide risk on admission. Implement suicide precautions for high-risk. Provide one-to-one observation when needed. Remove ligature points. Document interventions.

title: Mental Health Safety
implementation_guidance: Assess suicide risk. Implement safety precautions. Remove dangerous items. Provide close observation. Create therapeutic environment.

title: Neonatal Safety
implementation_guidance: Identify newborns correctly. Prevent newborn abduction. Monitor for sepsis. Provide appropriate resuscitation. Ensure mother-baby matching.

title: Maternal Safety
implementation_guidance: Monitor obstetric patients closely. Recognize obstetric emergencies. Provide timely interventions. Prevent maternal hemorrhage. Ensure safe delivery.

title: Pediatric Dosing
implementation_guidance: Use weight-based pediatric dosing. Verify calculations independently. Use pediatric-specific medication concentrations. Double-check high-risk medications. Document weight.

title: Pediatric Safety
implementation_guidance: Implement pediatric-specific safety measures. Use weight-based dosing. Provide age-appropriate equipment. Prevent abduction. Ensure child-safe environment.

title: Pain Assessment
implementation_guidance: Use age-appropriate pain scales. Ask about pain regularly. Observe for pain signs in non-verbal patients. Document pain assessment. Believe patient reports.

title: Pain Management
implementation_guidance: Assess pain regularly using pain scales. Provide pain relief. Reassess after intervention. Document pain scores. Address inadequate pain control.

title: Rapid Response Team
implementation_guidance: Establish RRT for deteriorating patients. Define activation criteria. Respond within minutes. Provide immediate intervention. Review RRT calls.

title: Patient Deterioration
implementation_guidance: Implement early warning scores (EWS/MEWS). Monitor vital signs regularly. Escalate concerning changes. Activate rapid response team. Document interventions.

title: Crash Carts
implementation_guidance: Stock crash carts with emergency supplies. Check daily. Seal after checking. Replace after use. Track expiration dates.

title: Emergency Response
implementation_guidance: Establish code blue system. Train staff in CPR/ACLS. Maintain crash carts. Ensure defibrillator availability. Conduct emergency drills.

title: Equipment Maintenance
implementation_guidance: Schedule regular equipment maintenance. Keep maintenance records. Calibrate equipment per manufacturer. Test safety features. Document maintenance.

title: Equipment Safety
implementation_guidance: Maintain medical equipment. Conduct preventive maintenance. Test equipment regularly. Remove defective equipment. Train staff on proper use.

title: Aspiration Risk
implementation_guidance: Assess swallowing ability. Implement aspiration precautions. Position patients upright during feeding. Modify diet consistency. Monitor for aspiration signs.

title: Nutrition
implementation_guidance: Assess nutritional status on admission. Identify malnutrition risk. Provide nutritional support. Monitor nutritional intake. Consult dietitian when needed.

title: Sentinel Events
implementation_guidance: Identify sentinel events: unexpected death/injury. Conduct immediate investigation. Perform comprehensive RCA. Implement improvements. Report externally.

title: Pressure Ulcers
implementation_guidance: Assess pressure ulcer risk. Implement prevention measures: repositioning special mattresses skin care. Monitor skin condition. Document interventions.

title: Pressure Ulcer Risk
implementation_guidance: Use Braden Scale or similar tool. Assess on admission and daily for high-risk. Identify risk factors: immobility malnutrition moisture. Document scores.

title: Physical Restraints
implementation_guidance: Use restraints only when necessary for safety. Obtain physician order. Monitor restrained patients frequently. Document rationale. Seek alternatives.

title: Restrained Patient Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Monitor every 15-30 minutes. Check circulation skin integrity comfort. Provide range of motion. Offer fluids toileting. Remove restraints when safe.

title: Blood Transfusion Safety
implementation_guidance: Verify blood type compatibility. Use two-person verification. Check patient identity at bedside. Monitor for transfusion reactions. Document transfusion.

title: Blood Type Verification
implementation_guidance: Confirm blood type before transfusion. Match blood unit to patient. Use two identifiers. Verify ABO/Rh compatibility. Document verification.

title: Surgical Time-Out
implementation_guidance: Conduct time-out before incision. Involve entire surgical team. Verify patient procedure site laterality. Confirm antibiotic administration. Check allergies. Document time-out.

title: Informed Consent
implementation_guidance: Obtain informed consent for procedures. Explain risks benefits alternatives. Ensure patient understanding. Document consent. Verify before procedure.

title: Care Handoff
implementation_guidance: Standardize handoff communication. Use SBAR (Situation Background Assessment Recommendation). Allow questions. Document handoff. Minimize interruptions.

title: Effective Communication
implementation_guidance: Implement structured communication tools. Read back verbal orders. Clarify unclear information. Document critical conversations. Use closed-loop communication.

title: Incident Reporting
implementation_guidance: Implement incident reporting system. Encourage all staff to report. Report near misses and actual events. Protect reporter confidentiality. Act on reports.

title: Incident Analysis
implementation_guidance: Analyze all reported incidents. Conduct root cause analysis for serious events. Identify contributing factors. Develop action plans. Track implementation.

title: Learning from Incidents
implementation_guidance: Share lessons learned from incidents. Implement system improvements. Communicate changes to staff. Monitor effectiveness. Prevent recurrence.

title: Adverse Events
implementation_guidance: Define adverse events and near misses. Track adverse event rates. Investigate serious adverse events. Implement preventive measures. Report to MOH.

title: Consent Documentation
implementation_guidance: Document informed consent in medical record. Include date time provider patient signature. Specify procedure consented. Maintain consent forms.

title: Radiation Safety
implementation_guidance: Minimize radiation exposure. Use shielding. Follow ALARA principle. Monitor radiation doses. Protect pregnant patients. Train staff.

title: Health Systems Audit
implementation_guidance: Conduct regular health IT security audits. Review access logs. Test security controls. Assess compliance. Implement findings.

title: Clinical Staff Training
description: Train staff on health information security
description_ar: تدريب الموظفين على أمن المعلومات الصحية
implementation_guidance: Train all clinical staff on patient privacy and data security. Cover HIPAA/local regulations. Conduct annual training. Test understanding.

title: Compliance
implementation_guidance: Comply with MOH EMR requirements. Meet meaningful use criteria. Support quality reporting. Enable clinical research. Maintain certification.

title: EMR Governance
implementation_guidance: Establish EMR governance committee. Define policies and standards. Approve system changes. Review system performance. Set strategic direction.

title: Updates
implementation_guidance: Apply vendor updates regularly. Test updates in non-production. Plan update windows. Communicate changes. Monitor post-update.

title: Customization
implementation_guidance: Control EMR customizations. Test before production. Document all changes. Avoid over-customization. Maintain upgradeability.

title: Interfaces
implementation_guidance: Monitor interface status. Track message flow. Resolve interface errors. Test interfaces regularly. Document interface specifications.

title: Integration
implementation_guidance: Interface EMR with lab pharmacy radiology billing. Use HL7 messages. Enable bidirectional data flow. Maintain interface reliability.

title: Dashboards
implementation_guidance: Create clinical dashboards. Display key metrics. Enable drill-down. Provide real-time data. Support decision-making.

title: Analytics
implementation_guidance: Implement clinical analytics. Generate quality reports. Enable population health management. Provide dashboards. Support research.

title: Mobile Devices
implementation_guidance: Implement MDM for clinical devices. Enforce device encryption. Enable remote wipe. Control app installation. Monitor compliance.

title: Mobile Applications
implementation_guidance: Provide mobile EMR access. Secure mobile apps. Enable offline functionality. Sync when online. Support BYOD policies.

title: Patient Engagement
implementation_guidance: Encourage portal use. Educate patients on portal benefits. Provide portal training. Enable proxy access. Monitor portal adoption.

title: Patient Portal
implementation_guidance: Deploy patient portal. Enable appointment scheduling. Provide lab/imaging results. Allow secure messaging. Offer medication refills.

title: Audit Trails
implementation_guidance: Enable comprehensive audit logging. Log all data access and changes. Retain audit logs for 10 years. Protect logs from modification. Enable audit review.

title: System Audit
implementation_guidance: Conduct regular EMR audits. Review system logs. Check access patterns. Verify data integrity. Assess compliance. Document findings.

title: Paper Records
implementation_guidance: Maintain downtime documentation supplies. Use standardized forms. Capture essential data. Enter into EMR after recovery. Reconcile records.

title: Downtime Procedures
implementation_guidance: Develop downtime protocols. Provide paper forms. Train staff on downtime procedures. Test downtime plan. Document workarounds.

title: User Support
implementation_guidance: Establish EMR help desk. Provide 24/7 support for clinical users. Resolve issues promptly. Track support tickets. Provide super-user support.

title: Progress Notes
