implementation_guidance: Use structured note format. Include assessment and plan. Document changes in condition. Time-stamp all notes. Enable co-signature.

title: Interoperability
implementation_guidance: Implement HL7/FHIR standards. Exchange data with other systems. Enable health information exchange. Share data with MOH. Support continuity of care.

title: Data Exchange
implementation_guidance: Send and receive clinical data. Support CCD/CCR formats. Enable patient summary sharing. Participate in regional HIE. Ensure secure exchange.

title: Access Controls
implementation_guidance: Control EMR access by role. Implement role-based permissions. Use unique user IDs. Enforce strong authentication. Monitor access.

title: Access Logs
implementation_guidance: Log all EMR access. Monitor for inappropriate access. Audit VIP/employee records. Investigate suspicious activity. Enforce sanctions.

title: EMR Security
implementation_guidance: Encrypt EMR data at rest and in transit. Implement firewalls. Use intrusion detection. Patch systems regularly. Conduct security assessments.

title: Certification
implementation_guidance: Achieve EMR certification. Maintain certified status. Meet certification criteria. Document compliance. Prepare for recertification.

title: Data Encryption
implementation_guidance: Encrypt patient data end-to-end. Use AES-256 encryption. Encrypt backups. Protect encryption keys. Ensure secure transmission.

title: Data Recovery
implementation_guidance: Test backup restoration monthly. Verify data integrity. Measure recovery time. Document test results. Ensure RPO/RTO compliance.

title: Availability
implementation_guidance: Maintain 99.9%+ uptime. Implement redundancy. Use load balancing. Enable failover. Monitor system health. Minimize downtime.

title: Disaster Recovery
implementation_guidance: Develop EMR disaster recovery plan. Define RTO (2-4 hours) and RPO (15 minutes). Maintain hot site. Test DR annually. Document procedures.

title: Performance
implementation_guidance: Monitor EMR performance continuously. Track response times. Identify bottlenecks. Optimize slow queries. Ensure acceptable speed.

title: Optimization
implementation_guidance: Tune database performance. Optimize server resources. Archive old data. Clean up unused records. Maintain system efficiency.

title: Training
implementation_guidance: Train all EMR users. Provide role-specific training. Offer hands-on practice. Test competency. Provide ongoing education.

title: Backup
implementation_guidance: Backup EMR data daily. Store backups offsite. Encrypt backups. Test restoration regularly. Maintain backup logs. Ensure 24-hour recovery.

title: Privacy Awareness
implementation_guidance: Raise awareness of patient privacy obligations. Share privacy policies. Communicate privacy incidents. Update on regulations.

title: Data Quality
implementation_guidance: Monitor EMR data quality. Validate data accuracy. Implement data quality checks. Clean duplicate records. Maintain data integrity.

title: Health Systems Governance
implementation_guidance: Establish HIS governance framework. Define health IT strategy. Assign HIS responsibilities. Implement health IT policies.

title: Business Associate Agreements
implementation_guidance: Execute BAAs with vendors accessing patient data. Define data protection obligations. Include breach notification requirements. Monitor vendor compliance.

title: Health System Vendors
implementation_guidance: Assess vendor security. Include security requirements in contracts. Verify vendor compliance. Monitor vendor access to health data.

title: Medical Data Backup
implementation_guidance: Backup patient data daily. Store backups offsite. Encrypt backups. Test restoration regularly. Maintain backup logs.

title: Healthcare Continuity
implementation_guidance: Develop healthcare BCP. Define RTOs for critical systems (typically 2-4 hours). Maintain backup systems. Test failover. Enable patient care continuity.

title: Data De-identification
implementation_guidance: De-identify patient data for secondary use. Remove direct identifiers. Apply k-anonymity or differential privacy. Prevent re-identification.

title: Medical Research
implementation_guidance: Obtain ethics approval for research. Get informed consent from subjects. Anonymize research data. Protect research participant privacy.

title: Patient Notification
implementation_guidance: Notify patients of health data breaches within required timeframe. Explain breach impact. Provide remediation steps. Offer support services.

title: Outpatient Quality
implementation_guidance: Monitor clinic wait times. Track appointment availability. Measure patient satisfaction. Improve access. Enhance clinic operations.

title: Health Data Incidents
implementation_guidance: Develop health data breach response plan. Notify affected patients. Report to MOH. Investigate incidents. Remediate vulnerabilities.

title: Medical Mobile Devices
implementation_guidance: Implement MDM for clinical devices. Encrypt mobile devices. Enable remote wipe. Control app installation. Monitor device compliance.

title: Mobile Health Apps
implementation_guidance: Secure mHealth apps. Encrypt health data on devices. Implement app authentication. Control app permissions. Test app security.

title: Teleconsultation Privacy
implementation_guidance: Protect virtual consultation privacy. Use secure communication platforms. Prevent unauthorized access to sessions. Document informed consent.

title: Telemedicine
implementation_guidance: Secure telehealth platforms. Encrypt video consultations. Verify patient identity. Maintain teleconsultation records. Ensure privacy.

title: Connected Medical Devices
implementation_guidance: Secure IoMT devices. Segment medical device network. Monitor device activity. Patch medical devices. Inventory all devices.

title: Pharmacy Systems
implementation_guidance: Secure pharmacy systems. Prevent medication errors. Check drug interactions. Track controlled substances. Verify prescriptions.

title: Radiology Systems
implementation_guidance: Secure RIS and PACS. Protect medical images. Implement DICOM standards. Enable image sharing. Control radiologist access.

title: Laboratory Systems
implementation_guidance: Secure LIS. Validate lab results. Interface with EMR. Maintain lab data integrity. Control access to lab systems.

title: Health Information Exchange
implementation_guidance: Facilitate secure health data exchange. Obtain patient consent for sharing. Encrypt data in transit. Log all exchanges.

title: HIS Strategy
implementation_guidance: Develop HIS strategy aligned with healthcare objectives. Plan digital health transformation. Define interoperability goals. Budget for health IT.

title: Patient Data Protection
implementation_guidance: Implement strong patient data protection. Encrypt patient records. Control access to medical information. Maintain patient confidentiality.

title: Medical Information Confidentiality
implementation_guidance: Protect patient privacy. Implement confidentiality safeguards. Train staff on patient privacy. Monitor privacy compliance.

title: Patient Consent
implementation_guidance: Obtain patient consent for data collection use sharing. Document consent. Honor patient preferences. Enable consent withdrawal.

title: Patient Rights
implementation_guidance: Enable patient access to medical records. Allow data correction. Provide data portability. Support right to be forgotten where applicable.

title: Electronic Medical Records
implementation_guidance: Deploy EMR system. Ensure EMR completeness and accuracy. Enable clinical decision support. Maintain audit trails.

title: Data Completeness
implementation_guidance: Monitor documentation completeness. Require required fields. Track missing data. Report completeness metrics. Improve data capture.

title: Medical Data Quality
implementation_guidance: Validate medical data accuracy. Implement data quality checks. Standardize medical terminologies. Correct data errors promptly.

title: Medical Record Retention
implementation_guidance: Retain patient records per MOH requirements (typically 10-25 years). Store securely. Enable retrieval. Archive inactive records.

title: Medical Access Controls
implementation_guidance: Control access to patient information based on role. Implement break-glass access for emergencies. Log all access. Review access regularly.

title: Healthcare Authentication
description: Implement strong authentication for healthcare systems
implementation_guidance: Require strong authentication for health systems. Use biometrics or smart cards for clinical staff. Implement MFA. Disable inactive accounts.

title: Staff Access Reviews
implementation_guidance: Review clinical staff access quarterly. Verify appropriateness for role. Remove unnecessary access. Audit privileged access monthly.

title: Healthcare Interoperability
implementation_guidance: Implement health information exchange. Use HL7 FHIR standards. Enable data sharing between facilities. Maintain interoperability.

title: Health Data Standards
implementation_guidance: Adopt ICD-10 for diagnoses. Use SNOMED CT for clinical terms. Implement LOINC for labs. Apply RxNorm for medications.

title: Medical Record Integrity
implementation_guidance: Protect medical records from tampering. Implement digital signatures. Maintain version control. Log all record modifications.

title: Radiation Protection
implementation_guidance: Justify all imaging. Use lowest necessary dose. Shield non-targeted areas. Screen for pregnancy. Document radiation exposure.

title: Laboratory Safety
implementation_guidance: Label specimens correctly. Verify specimen identity. Prevent specimen mix-ups. Communicate critical results. Maintain specimen integrity.

title: Specimen Handling
implementation_guidance: Collect specimens using proper technique. Label at bedside. Transport safely. Store appropriately. Track specimen chain of custody.

title: Demolition
implementation_guidance: Obtain demolition permit. Submit demolition plan. Ensure safety. Manage debris. Complete within timeline.

title: Food Safety
implementation_guidance: Ensure food safety. Prevent contamination. Maintain cold chain. Monitor temperatures. Conduct inspections.

title: Food Establishments
implementation_guidance: Regulate food businesses. Obtain health permit. Meet hygiene standards. Store food properly. Train food handlers.

title: Recycling
implementation_guidance: Participate in recycling programs. Separate recyclables. Use designated bins. Support sustainability. Reduce waste.

title: Waste Management

implementation_guidance: Validate computer systems per 21 CFR Part 11. Control system access. Maintain audit trails. Backup data. Ensure data integrity.

title: Training
implementation_guidance: Provide GMP training to all staff. Train on job responsibilities. Conduct ongoing training. Assess competency. Document training.

title: Post-Market Surveillance
implementation_guidance: Monitor device performance post-market. Collect incident reports. Investigate device failures. Take corrective actions. Report to SFDA.

title: Cosmetics
implementation_guidance: Register cosmetics with SFDA. Ensure product safety. List ingredients. Comply with standards. Avoid prohibited substances.

title: Safety Assessment
implementation_guidance: Conduct safety assessments. Test products. Evaluate ingredients. Assess allergic potential. Document safety.

title: Monitoring - Ongoing and Periodic Evaluations
description: Entity conducts ongoing and periodic evaluations
implementation_guidance: Monitor controls continuously. Conduct periodic evaluations. Use internal audit. Assess control effectiveness.

title: Monitoring - Deficiency Remediation
description: Entity evaluates and communicates control deficiencies
description_ar: المنظمة تقيّم وتبلغ عن أوجه القصور
implementation_guidance: Identify control deficiencies. Assess severity. Communicate to appropriate parties. Track remediation. Verify correction.

title: Control Activities - Selection and Development
description: Entity selects and develops control activities
implementation_guidance: Select controls to mitigate risks. Develop control procedures. Consider technology. Implement comprehensively.

title: Control Activities - Technology Controls
implementation_guidance: Implement technology controls: access change management IT operations. Support business processes. Ensure reliability.

title: Control Activities - Policies and Procedures
description: Entity deploys control activities through policies and procedures
description_ar: المنظمة تطبق أنشطة الرقابة من خلال السياسات
implementation_guidance: Establish policies and procedures. Define control activities. Assign responsibilities. Monitor compliance.

title: Logical Access - Authorized Users
description: Entity authorizes identifies and authenticates users
implementation_guidance: Identify authorized users. Authenticate before access. Use strong authentication. Manage user identities.

title: Risk Assessment - Change
description: Entity identifies and assesses changes that could impact system
implementation_guidance: Identify changes in business model operations environment technology. Assess impact on system and controls.

title: Logical Access - New Users
description: Entity manages addition modification and removal of user access
implementation_guidance: Provision access based on authorization. Modify access with role changes. Remove access upon termination. Review regularly.

title: Logical Access - Access Removal
description: Entity restricts access to system resources
implementation_guidance: Remove access immediately upon termination. Disable accounts. Revoke credentials. Collect assets. Verify removal.

title: Logical Access - Access Reviews
description: Entity discontinues logical access when users no longer require access
implementation_guidance: Review access rights quarterly. Identify unnecessary access. Remove inappropriate access. Document reviews.

title: Physical Access - Facilities
description: Entity restricts physical access to facilities and information assets
implementation_guidance: Control facility access. Use badges locks cameras. Monitor entries. Escort visitors. Review physical access.

title: Physical Access - Data Centers
description: Entity restricts access to programs data and other information assets
implementation_guidance: Protect data centers with layered security. Use biometric access. Monitor 24/7. Control environmental conditions.

title: Access - Transmission
description: Entity restricts transmission storage and disposal of confidential information
implementation_guidance: Encrypt data in transmission and at rest. Securely dispose of media. Protect backups. Control data access.

title: System Operations - Detection
description: Entity detects and monitors unauthorized activities
description_ar: الكشف عن ومراقبة العمليات غير المصرح بها
implementation_guidance: Monitor systems for unauthorized access suspicious activities security events. Generate alerts. Investigate incidents.

title: Logical Access - Restrictions
description: Entity restricts logical access to authorized users
implementation_guidance: Implement access controls. Enforce least privilege. Use role-based access. Control privileged access. Monitor access.

title: Settlement Risk
implementation_guidance: Minimize settlement risk. Use delivery versus payment where applicable. Implement settlement controls. Monitor exposures. Report risks.

title: Risk Assessment - Fraud
description: Entity considers potential for fraud in assessing risks
description_ar: المنظمة تأخذ في الاعتبار احتمالية الاحتيال
implementation_guidance: Assess fraud risks. Consider incentives pressures rationalization. Identify fraud schemes. Evaluate fraud prevention.

title: Risk Assessment - Objectives
description: Entity specifies objectives with sufficient clarity
implementation_guidance: Define service commitment objectives. Establish system objectives. Document clearly. Align with business goals.

title: Food Safety
implementation_guidance: Implement food safety management system. Apply HACCP principles. Control hazards. Maintain hygiene. Test products.

title: HACCP
implementation_guidance: Identify critical control points. Establish critical limits. Monitor CCPs. Take corrective actions. Verify system effectiveness.

title: Halal
implementation_guidance: Source Halal-certified ingredients. Prevent cross-contamination with Haram. Obtain Halal certification. Maintain segregation. Audit compliance.

title: Certification
implementation_guidance: Apply for Halal certification. Provide documentation. Undergo audit. Maintain certification. Renew regularly.

title: Regulatory Reporting
implementation_guidance: Submit required reports to SFDA. Report adverse events. Notify of product recalls. Submit annual product reports. Respond to SFDA requests.

title: Compliance Reporting
implementation_guidance: Demonstrate compliance with SFDA requirements. Prepare for inspections. Maintain compliance documentation. Address non-compliances. Implement corrections.

title: Risk Assessment - Identification
description: Entity identifies and analyzes risks to achievement of objectives
implementation_guidance: Identify risks to objectives. Analyze likelihood and impact. Consider internal and external factors. Assess at all levels.

title: Control Environment - Integrity and Ethical Values
description: Entity demonstrates commitment to integrity and ethical values
description_ar: المنظمة تظهر الالتزام بالنزاهة والقيم الأخلاقية
implementation_guidance: Establish code of conduct. Communicate ethics policy. Set tone at the top. Address violations. Demonstrate leadership commitment.

title: Control Environment - Organizational Structure
description: Management establishes structure authority and responsibility
implementation_guidance: Define organizational structure. Assign authority and responsibility. Document reporting lines. Communicate clearly.

title: Control Environment - Competence
implementation_guidance: Define competence requirements for roles. Assess competence. Provide training. Maintain qualified personnel.

title: Control Environment - Accountability
description: Entity holds individuals accountable for internal control
implementation_guidance: Establish accountability mechanisms. Define consequences. Enforce accountability. Measure performance against objectives.

title: Communication - Internal Control Information
description: Entity obtains information to support internal control functioning
description_ar: المنظمة تحصل على معلومات لدعم الرقابة الداخلية
implementation_guidance: Identify information requirements. Capture relevant data. Process information. Maintain information quality.

title: Communication - Internal Communication
description: Entity internally communicates internal control information
description_ar: المنظمة تنقل معلومات الرقابة الداخلية داخلياً
implementation_guidance: Communicate control objectives responsibilities. Use multiple channels. Ensure timely communication. Enable feedback.

title: Communication - External Communication
description: Entity communicates with external parties regarding internal control
implementation_guidance: Communicate with customers vendors regulators. Provide relevant information. Establish communication channels.

title: Control Environment - Board Independence
implementation_guidance: Establish independent board. Include outside directors. Conduct independent oversight. Separate board from management.

title: Clinical Documentation
implementation_guidance: Standardize clinical documentation. Ensure completeness. Require progress notes. Document all encounters. Maintain quality.

title: Stress Testing
implementation_guidance: Test system under peak loads. Simulate failures. Assess capacity limits. Identify weaknesses. Address findings.

title: Open Banking
implementation_guidance: Implement open banking APIs. Enable account information access. Support payment initiation. Obtain customer consent. Protect data.

title: Suspicious Transactions
implementation_guidance: Define suspicious indicators. Monitor for red flags. Investigate suspicious activity. Escalate to MLRO.

title: Transaction Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Monitor all transactions. Detect unusual patterns. Use automated systems. Investigate alerts. Document monitoring.

title: Ongoing Due Diligence
description: Conduct ongoing and periodic CDD reviews
implementation_guidance: Review CDD periodically. Update customer information. Re-assess risk. Review high-risk customers annually.

title: PEPs
description_ar: تطبيق إجراءات محددة للأشخاص المكشوفين سياسياً
implementation_guidance: Screen for PEPs. Obtain senior approval for PEP relationships. Apply EDD. Monitor closely. Document.

title: Enhanced Due Diligence
description: Apply enhanced due diligence for high-risk customers
description_ar: تطبيق العناية المشددة للعملاء عاليي المخاطر
implementation_guidance: Identify high-risk customers: PEPs high-risk countries complex structures. Apply EDD. Obtain senior approval.

title: Purpose of Relationship
implementation_guidance: Determine intended nature of relationship. Understand source of funds. Assess reasonableness. Document purpose.

title: Beneficial Ownership
implementation_guidance: Identify individuals owning/controlling 10%+. Verify BO identity. Understand ownership structure. Document BO.

title: Identity Verification
implementation_guidance: Verify using reliable independent documents. Check government IDs. Verify beneficial owners. Document verification.

title: Customer Due Diligence
implementation_guidance: Identify and verify customer identity. Understand customer business. Assess ML/TF risk. Document CDD.

title: Compliance Officer
description_ar: تعيين مسؤول امتثال لمكافحة غسل الأموال
implementation_guidance: Appoint MLRO at senior management level. Define responsibilities. Ensure independence. Provide resources.

title: Risk Assessment
description_ar: إجراء تقييم مخاطر غسل الأموال وتمويل الإرهاب
implementation_guidance: Assess ML/TF risks. Consider customer products geography channels. Document risk factors. Update annually.

title: AML Policy
description_ar: وضع سياسة شاملة لمكافحة غسل الأموال وتمويل الإرهاب
implementation_guidance: Develop AML/CFT policy. Cover customer due diligence transaction monitoring reporting. Obtain board approval.

title: Entry into Force
implementation_guidance: Track effective dates. Ensure compliance by deadlines. Document readiness. Maintain compliance after entry into force.

title: Final Provisions
implementation_guidance: Understand implementation timeline. Plan compliance roadmap. Allocate resources. Monitor regulatory updates.

title: Enforcement
description_ar: آليات تنفيذ نظام حماية البيانات الشخصية
implementation_guidance: Understand SDAIA enforcement powers. Prepare for inspections. Maintain compliance documentation. Cooperate with investigations.

title: Change Detection
implementation_guidance: Detect changes to web pages. Alert on file modifications. Monitor application changes. Investigate anomalies.

title: Penalties
description_ar: العقوبات على انتهاكات نظام حماية البيانات الشخصية
implementation_guidance: Understand penalty structure. Implement compliance to avoid penalties. Document compliance efforts. Maintain evidence of good faith.

title: Cooperation with SDAIA
description: Cooperate with and comply with SDAIA directives
description_ar: التعاون والامتثال لتوجيهات الهيئة السعودية للبيانات والذكاء الاصطناعي
implementation_guidance: Respond to SDAIA requests promptly. Provide requested information. Implement corrective actions. Participate in investigations.

title: Privacy by Design
description: Implement privacy principles in system design
description_ar: تطبيق مبادئ الخصوصية في تصميم الأنظمة
implementation_guidance: Integrate privacy into system development lifecycle. Conduct privacy reviews. Implement privacy-enhancing technologies.

title: Privacy by Default
description: Set default settings to protect privacy
implementation_guidance: Configure systems with privacy-protective defaults. Limit data collection by default. Require opt-in not opt-out.

title: Privacy Notices
implementation_guidance: Include all required elements in privacy notice: controller identity purpose legal basis retention rights. Display prominently.

title: SAMA Reporting
description_ar: الإبلاغ لساما عن تطبيق مكافحة غسل الأموال
implementation_guidance: Report AML program to SAMA. Submit annual AML returns. Notify SAMA of material changes. Respond to SAMA requests.

title: Reliance on Third Parties
description: Controls for relying on third parties for CDD
description_ar: ضوابط الاعتماد على أطراف ثالثة للعناية الواجبة
implementation_guidance: Establish criteria for third party reliance. Obtain customer information. Retain ultimate responsibility. Document reliance.

title: New Technologies
implementation_guidance: Assess ML/TF risks before launching new products services technologies. Implement appropriate controls. Monitor risks.

title: Payable Through Accounts
implementation_guidance: Do not establish payable through accounts. Screen for PTAs. Terminate if discovered. Document prohibition.

title: Reporting Records
implementation_guidance: Keep records of all STRs and CTRs. Retain for 10 years. Ensure confidentiality. Enable retrieval.

title: Record Quality
implementation_guidance: Maintain complete accurate records. Enable reconstruction of transactions. Ensure legibility. Protect from loss.

title: Documentation
implementation_guidance: Maintain: contracts invoices payment records WHT calculations receipts certificates. Retain for inspection. Organize systematically. Enable audit.

title: Exempt Entities
implementation_guidance: Recognize payments to exempt entities. Include certain government bodies. Verify exemption status. Maintain evidence. Document exempt status.

title: Exemptions
implementation_guidance: Identify exempt payments: government entities international organizations certain services. Verify exemption eligibility. Obtain supporting documents. Document exemption basis.

title: Distributions
implementation_guidance: Distinguish dividend distributions from other payments. Identify taxable distributions. Apply WHT where required. Document distribution nature.

title: Dividends
implementation_guidance: Generally no WHT on dividends. Apply WHT in special cases (e.g. liquidation distributions). Determine distribution nature. Check applicability. Document dividends.

title: Loans
implementation_guidance: Review loan agreements for WHT applicability. Determine if interest exempt. Check treaty provisions. Apply WHT if required. Document loan.

title: Interest
implementation_guidance: Generally no WHT on interest (exempt). Exceptions for certain cases. Check loan agreement. Verify exemption. Document interest nature.

title: Real Estate
implementation_guidance: Apply 5% WHT on real estate rent to non-residents. Include commercial and residential. Apply to land rent. Withhold monthly. Document property.

title: Rent
implementation_guidance: Withhold 5% on rent paid to non-resident landlords. Apply to movable and immovable property. Include equipment leasing. Withhold on each payment. Document rental.

title: Intellectual Property
implementation_guidance: Apply WHT to IP payments. Include copyrights trademarks patents know-how. Distinguish from sale of IP. Apply to license fees. Document IP nature.

title: Biometric Data
description: Special requirements for processing biometric data
implementation_guidance: Obtain explicit consent for biometric processing. Use strong encryption. Store templates not raw data. Provide deletion option.

title: Data Retention
description: Define retention periods for personal data
implementation_guidance: Establish data retention schedule. Define retention periods per data category. Delete data after retention period. Document retention.

title: Secure Deletion
implementation_guidance: Implement secure deletion methods. Overwrite or destroy media. Document deletion. Ensure deletion from backups and processors.

title: Training and Awareness
description: Provide data protection training to personnel
description_ar: توفير التدريب على حماية البيانات للموظفين
implementation_guidance: Conduct regular PDPL training. Cover data protection principles rights and obligations. Track completion. Test understanding.

title: Monitoring and Auditing
description: Monitor and audit data protection compliance
description_ar: مراقبة وتدقيق الامتثال لمتطلبات حماية البيانات
implementation_guidance: Implement compliance monitoring. Conduct regular audits. Review processing activities. Test controls. Document findings.

title: Complaints Handling
implementation_guidance: Establish complaint handling procedure. Provide complaint channels. Investigate promptly. Respond within required timeframe.

title: Health Data
description: Special requirements for processing health data
implementation_guidance: Implement enhanced protections for health data. Obtain explicit consent. Encrypt data. Limit access. Comply with MOH regulations.

title: Data Protection Impact Assessment
description_ar: إجراء تقييم أثر حماية البيانات للمعالجة عالية المخاطر
implementation_guidance: Identify high-risk processing. Conduct DPIA before processing. Document risks and mitigation. Consult SDAIA if necessary.

title: Large Cash Transactions
implementation_guidance: Monitor cash transactions above threshold. Report currency transactions. Verify source of cash. Document.

title: CTR Reporting
implementation_guidance: File CTRs for cash transactions exceeding SAR 60000. Submit within required timeframe. Include accurate information.

title: Organizational Structure
description: Define clear organizational structure for information security
description_ar: تحديد هيكل تنظيمي واضح لأمن المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Define security organization. Establish CISO role reporting to CEO/CRO. Define team structure. Document reporting lines.

title: Policies and Standards
description: Develop and approve security policies and standards
description_ar: تطوير والموافقة على السياسات والمعايير الأمنية
implementation_guidance: Develop comprehensive security policies. Cover all domains. Obtain board approval. Review annually. Communicate to all.

title: Information Security Strategy
description: Develop information security strategy aligned with business objectives
description_ar: وضع استراتيجية أمن معلومات متوافقة مع أهداف الأعمال
implementation_guidance: Develop 3-year security strategy. Align with business goals. Define objectives KPIs budget. Obtain executive approval.

title: Information Security Governance Framework
description: Comprehensive information security governance framework must be established
description_ar: يجب وضع إطار حوكمة شامل لأمن المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Establish ISMS governance framework. Define policies standards procedures. Obtain board approval. Communicate organization-wide.

title: Internal Controls
implementation_guidance: Establish AML internal controls. Implement policies procedures. Assign responsibilities. Test controls. Document.

title: High-Risk Countries
description: Apply specific measures for high-risk countries
description_ar: تطبيق تدابير محددة للدول عالية المخاطر
implementation_guidance: Identify high-risk jurisdictions. Apply enhanced measures for transactions from/to high-risk countries. Monitor FATF lists.

title: Shell Banks
implementation_guidance: Prohibit accounts for shell banks. Screen correspondent banks. Terminate shell bank relationships. Document prohibition.

title: Tipping Off Prohibition
description: Prohibit tipping off customers about STRs
description_ar: حظر إبلاغ العملاء عن الإبلاغات المشبوهة
implementation_guidance: Prohibit disclosure of STR filing to customer. Train staff on tipping off. Implement confidentiality procedures. Monitor compliance.

title: Intrusion Detection
implementation_guidance: Deploy IDS/IPS on critical network segments. Monitor traffic to/from CDE. Alert on suspicious activity. Investigate alerts.

title: Branches and Subsidiaries
description: Apply AML standards to branches and subsidiaries
description_ar: تطبيق معايير مكافحة غسل الأموال على الفروع والتابعة
implementation_guidance: Implement group-wide AML/CFT program. Apply to all branches and subsidiaries. Ensure consistent standards. Monitor compliance.

title: Money Value Transfer Services
implementation_guidance: License MVTS providers. Apply AML/CFT requirements. Monitor MVTS activities. Supervise compliance.

title: Wire Transfer Screening
implementation_guidance: Screen all wires against sanctions lists. Monitor for suspicious patterns. Investigate flagged wires. Document screening.

title: Wire Transfer Information
description: Include complete information in wire transfers
description_ar: تضمين معلومات كاملة في التحويلات البرقية
implementation_guidance: Include originator information in all wire transfers. Include beneficiary information. Retain wire records. Screen wires.

title: Correspondent Banking Due Diligence
description: Apply due diligence for correspondent banking
description_ar: تطبيق العناية الواجبة للعلاقات المصرفية المراسلة
implementation_guidance: Assess correspondent bank AML controls. Verify correspondent reputation. Understand correspondent business. Document assessment.

title: Record Retention
implementation_guidance: Retain all CDD records for 10 years after relationship ends. Retain transaction records for 10 years. Ensure accessibility.

title: Record Access
implementation_guidance: Provide records to SAMA SAFIU law enforcement promptly. Enable searches. Maintain confidentiality of requests.

title: Sanctions Screening
description: Screen against sanctions and wanted lists
description_ar: الفحص مقابل قوائم العقوبات والأشخاص المطلوبين
implementation_guidance: Screen customers against UN EU US Saudi sanctions lists. Screen at onboarding and ongoing. Freeze assets if match.

title: Immediate Freezing
implementation_guidance: Freeze assets of designated persons immediately. Do not notify customer. Report to authorities. Maintain freeze.

title: STR Reporting
description_ar: الإبلاغ عن المعاملات المشبوهة للجهات المختصة
implementation_guidance: File STRs with SAFIU promptly. Include all required information. Do not tip off customer. Maintain confidentiality.

title: Freezing Reporting
implementation_guidance: Report freezing to SAMA SAFIU within required timeframe. Provide details of frozen assets. Document actions.

title: Specialized Training
description: Provide specialized training for key roles
implementation_guidance: Train MLRO compliance staff frontline staff on role-specific requirements. Provide advanced training.

title: Ongoing Training
implementation_guidance: Update training for new typologies regulations. Provide refresher training. Communicate emerging risks.

title: Automated Systems
description: Use automated systems for monitoring and screening
implementation_guidance: Implement automated transaction monitoring. Deploy sanctions screening systems. Use data analytics. Maintain systems.

title: System Effectiveness
description_ar: ضمان فعالية أنظمة مكافحة غسل الأموال
implementation_guidance: Test system effectiveness. Tune scenarios. Review alerts quality. Optimize false positives. Document tuning.

title: Independent Audit
implementation_guidance: Engage independent auditors. Audit AML/CFT program. Review all control areas. Implement audit recommendations.

title: Internal Testing
implementation_guidance: Test CDD transaction monitoring STR quality. Review compliance. Document test results. Address findings.

title: AML Training
description_ar: توفير تدريب شامل على مكافحة غسل الأموال
implementation_guidance: Train all employees on AML/CFT. Cover regulations CDD monitoring reporting. Conduct annual training. Test understanding.

title: Roles and Responsibilities
description: Define and document security roles and responsibilities
implementation_guidance: Document security roles and responsibilities. Create RACI matrix. Assign accountabilities. Communicate clearly.

title: Record Keeping
implementation_guidance: Maintain Register of Processing Activities (RoPA). Document all processing operations. Update regularly. Make available to SDAIA.

title: Transfer Exceptions
description_ar: الحالات المستثناة من قيود نقل البيانات
implementation_guidance: Document valid transfer exceptions. Obtain explicit consent for transfers. Implement safeguards even for exceptions.

title: Security Policy
implementation_guidance: Develop security policy addressing PCI DSS. Obtain executive approval. Review annually. Communicate to all personnel.

title: File Integrity Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Deploy FIM on critical files. Alert on unauthorized changes. Review alerts. Investigate changes. Update baselines.

title: Penetration Testing
implementation_guidance: Perform comprehensive pen test annually. Test network and application layers. Test after significant changes. Use qualified testers.

title: Security Testing
implementation_guidance: Perform vulnerability scans quarterly. Conduct penetration tests annually. Test after significant changes. Remediate findings.

title: Log Review
implementation_guidance: Review critical system logs daily. Investigate exceptions. Document reviews. Automate log review where possible.

title: Time Synchronization
implementation_guidance: Use NTP or equivalent. Synchronize all systems. Use authoritative time source. Monitor time synchronization.

title: Audit Events
implementation_guidance: Log user access. Log privileged actions. Log access to audit logs. Log invalid access. Log changes to auth mechanisms.

title: Point of Sale
implementation_guidance: Maintain list of POS devices. Inspect devices regularly. Train personnel to detect tampering. Respond to tampering.

title: Access Reviews
implementation_guidance: Review user access quarterly. Verify appropriateness. Remove unnecessary access. Document reviews. Address findings.

title: Default Deny
implementation_guidance: Configure systems with default deny. Explicitly allow necessary access only. Deny all unspecified access.

title: Unique User IDs
description: Assign unique ID to each user
implementation_guidance: Assign unique user ID to everyone with access. Prohibit shared IDs. Disable generic accounts. Track by user ID.

title: Password Management
implementation_guidance: Enforce password complexity: 12+ characters mixed case numbers symbols. Change every 90 days. Prevent reuse of last 4.

title: Multi-Factor Authentication
implementation_guidance: Require MFA for all remote access to CDE. Use two independent factors. Implement for VPN admin access console access.

title: MFA for Internal Access
description: Implement MFA for internal CDE access
implementation_guidance: Require MFA for all access to CDE from internal network. Apply to admins and users. Use strong authentication.

title: Usage Policy
implementation_guidance: Define acceptable use of technology. Cover employee and contractor requirements. Obtain acknowledgment.

title: User Sessions
implementation_guidance: Terminate inactive sessions after 15 minutes. Require re-authentication. Lock workstations. Clear session data.

title: Access Termination
implementation_guidance: Disable all access within 24 hours of termination. Revoke physical and logical access. Collect assets. Verify completion.

title: Secure Areas
implementation_guidance: Identify areas storing/processing CHD. Designate as secure areas. Control physical access. Monitor entries.

title: Entry Controls
description: Implement entry controls for secure areas
implementation_guidance: Control access with badges cameras guards. Log all entries. Escort visitors. Review access logs.

title: Visitor Management
implementation_guidance: Require visitor authorization. Issue visitor badges. Escort at all times. Log visitor access. Return badges on exit.

title: Third-Party Personnel
implementation_guidance: Authorize third-party access. Require physical tokens. Escort or monitor. Distinguish from employees. Log access.

title: Vulnerability Scanning
implementation_guidance: Scan all systems quarterly. Scan after significant changes. Use ASV for external scans. Remediate vulnerabilities per risk.

title: Log Retention
implementation_guidance: Retain logs minimum 1 year. Keep 3 months online. Archive remainder. Ensure availability for analysis.

title: Log Protection
implementation_guidance: Protect logs from modification. Restrict access to logs. Store on separate system. Use write-once media or equivalent.

title: Log Elements
implementation_guidance: Include user ID. Include event type. Include date/time. Include success/failure. Include origination. Include affected resource.

title: Audit Logs
implementation_guidance: Log all access to CHD. Log administrative actions. Log authentication attempts. Log system events. Include required elements.

title: Media Disposal
implementation_guidance: Shred paper crosscut. Degauss or destroy electronic media. Use secure disposal bins. Document destruction.

title: Security Awareness
implementation_guidance: Train all personnel annually. Cover security policies and procedures. Include social engineering. Test understanding.

title: Cross-Border Transfer
description: Conditions for transferring personal data outside Kingdom
description_ar: شروط نقل البيانات الشخصية خارج المملكة
implementation_guidance: Implement cross-border transfer controls. Verify adequacy of destination country. Use SCCs or BCRs. Obtain approvals.

title: Breach Notification
description: Report data breaches to authority and data subjects
description_ar: الإبلاغ عن انتهاكات البيانات للهيئة وأصحاب البيانات
implementation_guidance: Implement breach detection and response. Notify SDAIA within 72 hours. Notify affected individuals. Document incidents.

title: Access Control
implementation_guidance: Implement role-based access control. Grant access on need-to-know basis. Review access regularly. Revoke promptly.

title: Encryption
description: Use encryption to protect sensitive data
implementation_guidance: Encrypt personal data at rest and in transit. Use strong encryption algorithms (AES-256 TLS 1.2+). Manage encryption keys securely.

title: Data Security
description: Must implement appropriate security measures to protect personal data
description_ar: يجب تطبيق تدابير أمنية مناسبة لحماية البيانات الشخصية
implementation_guidance: Implement technical and organizational security measures. Encrypt data. Control access. Monitor security. Conduct assessments.

title: Data Protection Officer
implementation_guidance: Appoint qualified DPO. Define DPO responsibilities. Ensure independence. Provide resources. Report to highest management.

title: Processor Responsibilities
implementation_guidance: Define processor obligations. Ensure processors act only on controller instructions. Implement processor oversight.

title: Controller Responsibilities
implementation_guidance: Define data controller role. Document responsibilities. Implement accountability measures. Maintain processing records.

title: Right to Object
description: Data subject has right to object to processing of their data
description_ar: يحق لصاحب البيانات الاعتراض على معالجة بياناته
implementation_guidance: Implement objection handling process. Stop processing upon valid objection. Document objections and responses.

title: Right to Data Portability
description: Data subject has right to receive data in portable format
description_ar: يحق لصاحب البيانات الحصول على بياناته بصيغة قابلة للنقل
implementation_guidance: Implement data portability function. Export data in structured commonly-used machine-readable format (JSON XML CSV).

title: Right to Restriction
description: Data subject has right to restrict processing of their data
description_ar: يحق لصاحب البيانات طلب تقييد معالجة بياناته
implementation_guidance: Implement processing restriction mechanism. Mark restricted data. Prevent further processing except storage.

title: Right to Erasure
description: Data subject has right to request deletion of their data
description_ar: يحق لصاحب البيانات طلب حذف بياناته
implementation_guidance: Implement right to erasure process. Verify deletion requests. Permanently delete data. Notify processors.

title: Payment System Governance
implementation_guidance: Establish governance framework. Define board oversight. Assign management responsibilities. Document governance.

title: Media Protection
implementation_guidance: Classify media. Secure during storage and transport. Track media movement. Approve media distribution.

title: Application Account Management
implementation_guidance: Change application/system passwords per policy. Protect embedded passwords. Restrict interactive login.

title: Accountability
description: Principle of accountability and compliance responsibility
implementation_guidance: Implement accountability framework. Maintain compliance documentation. Conduct regular audits. Demonstrate compliance.

title: Responsibilities
implementation_guidance: Define security responsibilities. Assign to individuals. Document assignments. Communicate responsibilities.

title: Accountability
implementation_guidance: Assign PCI DSS compliance responsibility to named individual. Provide authority and resources. Report to executive management.

title: Definitions
description: Definitions of terms used in the law
implementation_guidance: Maintain glossary of PDPL terms. Ensure organization-wide understanding of personal data controller processor etc.

title: Purpose Limitation
description: Processing must be for specified explicit and legitimate purposes
description_ar: يجب أن تكون المعالجة لأغراض محددة وصريحة ومشروعة
implementation_guidance: Define and document specific purposes for each data processing activity. Prohibit further processing incompatible with original purpose.

title: Notifications
implementation_guidance: Notify card brands of breach within required timeframe. Notify customers. Notify law enforcement. Notify regulators.

title: Information Security Committee
description: Establish information security committee at executive level
description_ar: إنشاء لجنة أمن معلومات على مستوى الإدارة العليا
implementation_guidance: Establish executive security committee. Include C-level members. Meet quarterly. Document decisions. Track actions.

title: Management Reporting
description: Provide regular reports to executive management and board
description_ar: تقديم تقارير منتظمة للإدارة العليا ومجلس الإدارة
implementation_guidance: Report security status quarterly to board. Cover incidents risks compliance metrics. Obtain board decisions.

title: Risk Management Framework
description: Establish comprehensive information security risk management framework
description_ar: وضع إطار شامل لإدارة مخاطر أمن المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Develop risk management framework. Define methodology processes tools. Align with enterprise risk management.

title: Fraud Prevention
implementation_guidance: Implement fraud detection. Monitor suspicious transactions. Use fraud scoring. Block fraudulent payments. Investigate fraud.

title: Encryption
implementation_guidance: Encrypt payment data at rest and in transit. Use strong encryption (AES-256 TLS 1.2+). Manage keys securely.

title: Strong Authentication
implementation_guidance: Require multi-factor authentication. Use strong authentication for transactions. Verify user identity. Prevent fraud.

title: Payment System Security
implementation_guidance: Implement comprehensive security. Protect payment data. Use encryption. Control access. Monitor security.

title: Settlement
implementation_guidance: Complete settlement by deadline. Use central bank money where required. Handle settlement failures. Document settlements.

title: Liquidity Management
implementation_guidance: Monitor liquidity positions. Maintain adequate liquidity. Manage settlement obligations. Report liquidity status.

title: Payment Processing
description_ar: معالجة المدفوعات بدقة وفي الوقت المناسب
implementation_guidance: Process all payments correctly. Meet processing deadlines. Handle errors promptly. Reconcile daily.

title: Operational Reliability
implementation_guidance: Design reliable payment systems. Implement redundancy. Minimize downtime. Target 99.9% availability. Monitor performance.

title: Risk Committee
implementation_guidance: Form risk committee. Include senior management. Meet regularly. Review risks. Document decisions.

title: Risk Management
implementation_guidance: Identify payment system risks. Assess operational credit liquidity risks. Implement risk controls. Monitor risks.

title: Right to Rectification
description: Data subject has right to request correction of inaccurate data
description_ar: يحق لصاحب البيانات طلب تصحيح بياناته غير الدقيقة
implementation_guidance: Implement rectification request process. Verify and correct inaccurate data. Notify third parties of corrections.

title: Right of Access
description: Data subject has right to obtain copy of their data
description_ar: يحق لصاحب البيانات الحصول على نسخة من بياناته
implementation_guidance: Implement data subject access request (DSAR) process. Provide data within 30 days. Use secure delivery method.

title: Withdrawal of Consent
description: Data subject has right to withdraw consent at any time
description_ar: يحق لصاحب البيانات سحب موافقته في أي وقت
implementation_guidance: Provide easy consent withdrawal mechanism. Process withdrawal requests promptly. Delete data when consent withdrawn.

title: Children's Consent
description: Processing children's data requires parental consent
description_ar: معالجة بيانات الأطفال تتطلب موافقة ولي الأمر
implementation_guidance: Implement age verification. Obtain parental consent for users under 18. Provide special protections for minors.

title: Consent
description: Must obtain data subject consent before processing
description_ar: يجب الحصول على موافقة صاحب البيانات قبل المعالجة
implementation_guidance: Implement consent management platform. Obtain explicit opt-in consent. Document consent records. Allow withdrawal.

title: Personnel Screening
implementation_guidance: Conduct background checks. Verify employment and education. Check references. Screen per local laws.

title: Third-Party Management
implementation_guidance: Maintain list of service providers. Assess provider PCI DSS compliance. Include security requirements in agreements. Monitor compliance.

title: Third-Party Agreements
implementation_guidance: Include PCI DSS compliance in contracts. Define responsibilities. Require compliance evidence. Include audit rights.

title: Incident Response Plan
implementation_guidance: Develop IR plan. Define procedures for payment card breaches. Assign responsibilities. Provide contact information. Test plan.

title: Detection and Reporting
implementation_guidance: Monitor for compromises. Detect alerts from security systems. Report suspected breaches. Escalate to management.

title: Incident Response
implementation_guidance: Activate IR plan. Contain breach. Preserve evidence. Notify card brands. Engage forensics. Remediate vulnerabilities.

title: Plan Testing
implementation_guidance: Test IR plan annually. Conduct tabletop exercises. Document test results. Update plan based on findings.

title: Lessons Learned
implementation_guidance: Conduct post-incident review. Identify lessons learned. Update procedures. Implement improvements. Share knowledge.

title: Scope of Application
description: This law applies to processing of personal data wholly or partly by automated or non-automated means
description_ar: يطبق هذا النظام على معالجة البيانات الشخصية التي تتم كلياً أو جزئياً بوسائل آلية أو غير آلية
implementation_guidance: Define scope of PDPL applicability. Document which data processing activities fall under PDPL jurisdiction.

title: Lawfulness of Processing
description: Personal data processing must be lawful fair and transparent
description_ar: يجب أن تكون معالجة البيانات الشخصية مشروعة وعادلة وشفافة
implementation_guidance: Establish legal basis for each processing activity. Document lawfulness fairness and transparency measures.

title: Data Minimization
description: Data must be adequate relevant and limited to what is necessary
description_ar: يجب أن تكون البيانات كافية وذات صلة ومحددة بما يلزم
implementation_guidance: Implement data minimization controls. Collect only data necessary for stated purpose. Review data collection forms and APIs.

title: Payment Security
description: Comply with payment card data security standards
description_ar: الامتثال لمعايير أمن بيانات بطاقات الدفع
implementation_guidance: Implement PCI-DSS controls. Encrypt cardholder data. Tokenize where possible. Conduct quarterly scans. Complete annual SAQ.

title: Specialized Training
description: Provide specialized training for security roles
implementation_guidance: Train security personnel on: threat intelligence incident response forensics. Maintain industry certifications (CISSP CISM CEH).

title: Cloud Security
description: Implement security controls for cloud services
implementation_guidance: Define cloud security policy. Assess cloud providers. Implement cloud-specific controls. Monitor cloud usage. Manage cloud access.

title: Licensing Conditions
implementation_guidance: Meet all license conditions. Maintain capital requirements. Adhere to operational requirements. Report compliance.

title: Payment System Licensing
description: Obtain license to operate payment system
description_ar: الحصول على ترخيص لتشغيل نظام دفع
implementation_guidance: Apply for SAMA payment system license. Meet licensing requirements. Maintain license validity. Report changes.

title: Reporting
implementation_guidance: Report security status monthly to management quarterly to board. Cover incidents risks compliance metrics. Include recommendations.

title: Security Metrics
description: Define and measure security performance indicators
implementation_guidance: Define security KPIs and metrics. Measure regularly. Track trends. Report to management. Use for improvement.

title: Network Segmentation
implementation_guidance: Isolate CDE from other networks. Use firewalls. Restrict access. Monitor traffic. Minimize systems in scope.

title: Plan Testing
implementation_guidance: Test BCP and DRP annually. Conduct tabletop exercises and full tests. Document results. Update plans based on findings.

title: Alternate Site
implementation_guidance: Maintain hot or warm DR site. Ensure adequate capacity and connectivity. Replicate data. Test failover quarterly.

title: Redundancy
implementation_guidance: Implement redundant: power (UPS+generator) network storage servers. Use clustering and load balancing. Eliminate SPOFs.

title: Supplier Management
implementation_guidance: Define supplier security requirements. Assess supplier risks. Include security in contracts. Monitor compliance.

title: Supplier Assessment
description: Assess supplier security before and during engagement
description_ar: تقييم أمن الموردين قبل وأثناء التعاقد
implementation_guidance: Conduct security assessments of critical suppliers. Review certifications SOC2 ISO27001. Audit high-risk suppliers.

title: Supplier Agreements
description: Include security requirements in supplier agreements
description_ar: تضمين متطلبات الأمن في اتفاقيات الموردين
implementation_guidance: Include comprehensive security clauses: confidentiality access controls incident notification audit rights SLAs liability.

title: Security Incident Management
implementation_guidance: Detect security incidents. Respond promptly. Contain breaches. Notify affected parties. Report to SAMA.

title: Third-Party Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Monitor third-party security continuously. Review security reports. Conduct periodic audits. Track incidents. Address issues.

title: Confidentiality Agreements
implementation_guidance: Require all personnel to sign NDAs covering confidentiality acceptable use security responsibilities. Obtain before access.

title: Security Awareness
implementation_guidance: Conduct mandatory annual security awareness for all personnel. Cover policies phishing passwords social engineering incidents.

title: Awareness Testing
implementation_guidance: Conduct phishing simulations quarterly. Test security knowledge. Track click rates. Provide remedial training to failures.

title: Business Continuity
implementation_guidance: Develop payment system BCP. Define RTOs (2-4 hours). Maintain backup systems. Test annually. Document procedures.

title: Disaster Recovery Testing
implementation_guidance: Test DR plan at least annually. Conduct full failover tests. Document test results. Address test findings. Update plan.

title: Payment APIs
implementation_guidance: Develop secure payment APIs. Implement OAuth 2.0. Use API keys. Rate limit requests. Monitor API usage. Document APIs.

title: International Compliance
implementation_guidance: Adopt international payment standards. Comply with FATF recommendations. Implement sanctions screening. Report suspicious transactions.

title: Statistics Reporting
implementation_guidance: Report transaction volumes values. Provide system performance metrics. Submit participant statistics. Ensure accuracy.

title: Cloud Provider Assessment
implementation_guidance: Assess cloud provider security posture. Review certifications (SOC2 ISO27001). Verify data location. Review SLAs. Audit compliance.

title: Security Screening
description: Conduct comprehensive security screening before employment
description_ar: إجراء فحص أمني شامل قبل التوظيف
implementation_guidance: Screen all candidates: criminal background employment verification education credit check. Enhanced screening for privileged roles.

title: Recovery Strategies
implementation_guidance: Define recovery strategies for each critical function. Consider alternate sites backup systems manual procedures.

title: Domestic Switching
implementation_guidance: Route domestic transactions locally. Use MADA network. Reduce costs. Improve efficiency. Support national payments.

title: Card Schemes
implementation_guidance: Implement card scheme rules. Ensure EMV compliance. Support chip and PIN. Enable contactless. Manage card fraud.

title: Record Integrity
implementation_guidance: Protect records from tampering. Maintain audit trails. Use checksums. Enable record verification. Document integrity measures.

title: Record Retention
implementation_guidance: Retain all transaction records for 10 years. Maintain payment instructions. Keep settlement records. Ensure accessibility.

title: Instant Payments
implementation_guidance: Enable 24/7 instant payments. Process within seconds. Ensure reliability. Manage risks. Implement fraud controls.

title: Payment Innovation
implementation_guidance: Support payment innovation. Assess innovation risks. Implement controls for new products. Test thoroughly. Obtain SAMA approval.

title: Financial Transparency
implementation_guidance: Publish financial statements. Disclose fee structure. Provide cost breakdowns. Enable price comparison.

title: Pricing Policy
implementation_guidance: Define transparent pricing. Ensure non-discriminatory fees. Disclose all charges. Review pricing regularly. Document policy.

title: Service Level Agreements
implementation_guidance: Establish clear SLAs. Define performance metrics. Monitor SLA compliance. Address SLA breaches. Review SLAs annually.

title: Change Notification
description: Notify SAMA and participants of changes
implementation_guidance: Notify SAMA of significant changes 30 days in advance. Inform participants. Provide transition support. Document notifications.

title: Participant Management
implementation_guidance: Screen participants before admission. Set participation criteria. Monitor participant compliance. Suspend non-compliant participants.

title: Participant Due Diligence
implementation_guidance: Assess participant financial soundness. Review operational capability. Verify regulatory compliance. Update assessments.

title: Participant Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Monitor participant transactions. Detect unusual activity. Review participant performance. Address issues promptly.

title: Interoperability
implementation_guidance: Support interoperability with other payment systems. Use standard protocols. Enable cross-system transactions. Document interfaces.

title: Standards Compliance
implementation_guidance: Adopt international payment standards (ISO 20022 EMV). Implement Saudi standards. Maintain compatibility. Document compliance.

title: Customer Protection
implementation_guidance: Implement customer protection measures. Ensure transparency. Handle complaints. Protect customer data. Educate customers.

title: Transparency
implementation_guidance: Disclose fees and charges. Explain transaction terms. Provide receipts. Enable account access. Communicate clearly.

title: SAMA Reporting
implementation_guidance: Report payment statistics monthly. Submit annual audited financials. Report incidents immediately. Provide requested information.

title: Cross-Border Payments
implementation_guidance: Support international payments. Comply with SWIFT standards. Enable currency exchange. Manage FX risk. Report cross-border transactions.

title: Digital Wallets
implementation_guidance: Enable e-wallet services. Link to bank accounts. Support P2P transfers. Implement security controls. Monitor transactions.

title: Mobile Payments
implementation_guidance: Support mobile payment methods. Implement strong security. Use tokenization. Enable QR payments. Prevent mobile fraud.

title: Outsourcing
implementation_guidance: Define outsourcing policy. Assess service provider risks. Include security requirements in contracts. Monitor providers. Maintain oversight.

title: Change Management
implementation_guidance: Control system changes. Test changes thoroughly. Obtain SAMA approval for major changes. Notify participants. Document changes.

title: Alternate Site
implementation_guidance: Establish hot backup site. Replicate data. Test failover quarterly. Enable rapid recovery. Document site.

title: Data Protection
implementation_guidance: Implement PDPL controls. Obtain consent. Protect personal data. Enable data subject rights. Report breaches.

title: Incident Reporting
implementation_guidance: Report operational failures security breaches fraud incidents to SAMA within 4 hours. Provide incident details. Submit follow-up.

title: SAMA Access
implementation_guidance: Grant SAMA system access. Enable monitoring. Provide reports. Respond to inquiries. Facilitate inspections.

title: Audit Rights
implementation_guidance: Allow SAMA audits. Provide requested documentation. Grant auditor access. Implement audit recommendations. Report compliance.

title: Complaint Handling
implementation_guidance: Establish complaint procedures. Respond within specified timeframes. Resolve complaints fairly. Document resolutions. Report to SAMA.

title: Business Impact Analysis
implementation_guidance: Identify critical business processes. Assess impact of disruptions. Determine MTD RTO RPO. Define recovery priorities.

title: Business Continuity Plan
implementation_guidance: Develop BCP for all critical business functions. Define RTOs and RPOs. Include IT disaster recovery. Test annually.

title: Incident Reporting
implementation_guidance: Report significant incidents to SAMA within 24 hours. Report to NCA SDAIA as required. Notify affected customers.

title: Remote Access
implementation_guidance: Require VPN for remote access. Enforce MFA. Use strong encryption. Restrict access. Monitor sessions. Log activities.

title: Intrusion Detection and Prevention
description: Deploy intrusion detection and prevention systems
implementation_guidance: Deploy IDS/IPS on critical network segments. Update signatures daily. Monitor alerts. Investigate incidents.

title: Firewalls
description: Deploy firewalls at all network boundaries
description_ar: تطبيق جدران حماية لجميع حدود الشبكة
implementation_guidance: Deploy next-generation firewalls. Implement default-deny rules. Review rules quarterly. Log all traffic. Monitor alerts.

title: Network Segmentation
implementation_guidance: Implement network segmentation. Define security zones (Internet DMZ Internal Sensitive). Use VLANs and firewalls.

title: Network Security
implementation_guidance: Secure networks using: segmentation firewalls IDS/IPS VPN encryption. Monitor traffic. Detect intrusions.

title: Access Revocation
description_ar: إلغاء الوصول فوراً عند انتهاء العمل
implementation_guidance: Disable all access within 4 hours of termination. Include network applications VPN physical access. Verify completion.

title: Access Reviews
implementation_guidance: Conduct quarterly access reviews. Verify appropriateness. Remove unnecessary access. Document reviews and actions.

title: Privileged Access
implementation_guidance: Implement PAM solution. Use separate admin accounts. Require additional MFA. Monitor all privileged activities. Review access monthly.

title: Identity Management
implementation_guidance: Deploy IAM solution. Manage complete identity lifecycle. Integrate with HR. Automate provisioning/deprovisioning.

title: Access Control Policy
description: Establish and enforce comprehensive access control policy
description_ar: وضع وتطبيق سياسة شاملة للتحكم في الوصول
implementation_guidance: Develop access control policy. Define principles (least privilege need-to-know). Cover logical and physical access.

title: Privacy Protection
description: Comply with personal data protection requirements
implementation_guidance: Implement PDPL controls. Obtain consent. Provide privacy notices. Enable data subject rights. Report breaches.

title: Data Backup
description: Perform regular backup of critical data
description_ar: إجراء نسخ احتياطي منتظم للبيانات الحرجة
implementation_guidance: Backup all critical systems and data daily. Implement 3-2-1 backup strategy. Test restores quarterly. Document.

title: Risk Assessment
implementation_guidance: Perform annual risk assessments. Identify assets threats vulnerabilities. Calculate inherent and residual risk.

title: Risk Treatment
implementation_guidance: Develop risk treatment plans. Implement controls. Track remediation. Monitor effectiveness. Report progress.

title: Independent Audit
description: Conduct annual independent information security audit
description_ar: إجراء تدقيق مستقل سنوي لأمن المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Engage external auditors annually. Audit SAMA CSF compliance. Review findings. Implement recommendations.

title: Information Classification
description: Classify all information according to sensitivity level
description_ar: تصنيف جميع المعلومات حسب مستوى الحساسية
implementation_guidance: Define classification scheme (Public Internal Confidential Secret). Classify all data. Apply labels. Train personnel.

title: Acceptable Use
description: Define acceptable use rules for assets
implementation_guidance: Develop acceptable use policy. Cover IT resources email internet mobile. Communicate to users. Obtain acknowledgment.

title: Encryption
description: Encrypt sensitive data at rest and in transit
description_ar: تشفير البيانات الحساسة في حالة السكون والنقل
implementation_guidance: Encrypt all sensitive data. Use AES-256 for data at rest. Use TLS 1.2+ for data in transit. Manage keys securely.

title: Network Separation
description_ar: فصل الشبكات اللاسلكية عن شبكات الأعمال
implementation_guidance: Isolate guest WiFi from corporate network. Use separate VLANs. Apply firewall rules. Restrict access.

title: Royalties
implementation_guidance: Withhold 15% on royalty payments. Include: intellectual property software licenses trademarks patents. Apply to franchises. Check treaty rates. Document royalty.

title: Technical Services
implementation_guidance: Apply WHT to technical services. Include engineering design consulting. Distinguish from exempt services. Apply correct rate. Document technical nature.

title: Management Services
implementation_guidance: Withhold 15% on management fees to non-residents. Include: consulting advisory management. Apply to technical services. Withhold on professional fees. Document service nature.

title: Certificate Details
implementation_guidance: Include complete information on certificate. Show tax withheld in SAR. Reference tax period. Sign certificate. Provide in English and Arabic.

title: WHT Certificates
implementation_guidance: Issue WHT certificates to non-residents. Include: payer details recipient details payment amount WHT amount date. Provide within reasonable time. Enable foreign tax credit claim.

title: Telecommunications
implementation_guidance: Apply standard rate to all telecommunications services. Include mobile internet TV. Apply to Saudi customers. Use place of supply rules. Document telecom services.

title: Imaging Results
implementation_guidance: Interface EMR with PACS. View images in EMR. Access radiology reports. Enable comparison with prior studies. Ensure availability.

title: WHT Scope
implementation_guidance: Apply withholding tax to payments to non-resident companies. Include service fees royalties management fees. Apply 5-20% based on payment type. Determine residence status. Document WHT applicability.

title: Password Management
description_ar: تطبيق معايير قوية لإدارة كلمات المرور
implementation_guidance: Enforce password policy: 14+ characters complexity no reuse. Change every 90 days. Prevent common passwords.

title: Strong Authentication
implementation_guidance: Require MFA for all critical systems. Use certificate-based or biometric authentication where appropriate.

title: Privacy Impact Assessment
description: Conduct privacy impact assessment for high-risk processing
description_ar: إجراء تقييم أثر الخصوصية للمعالجة عالية المخاطر
implementation_guidance: Identify high-risk processing activities. Conduct PIA before implementation. Document risks and mitigations.

title: Data Retention and Disposal
description: Define retention periods and secure disposal of data
description_ar: تحديد فترات الاحتفاظ والتخلص الآمن من البيانات
implementation_guidance: Establish data retention schedule. Define retention by data type. Implement secure deletion. Document disposal.

title: Data Loss Prevention
description: Implement controls to prevent data loss
implementation_guidance: Deploy DLP solution. Monitor data exfiltration. Block unauthorized transfers. Alert on violations. Investigate incidents.

title: Risk Acceptance
description: Obtain senior management approval for residual risk acceptance
description_ar: الحصول على موافقة الإدارة العليا لقبول المخاطر المتبقية
implementation_guidance: Document residual risks. Present to executive committee. Obtain formal approval. Review annually.

title: Risk Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Implement continuous risk monitoring. Track key risk indicators. Update risk register. Escalate significant changes.

title: Regulatory Compliance
description: Ensure compliance with all regulatory requirements
implementation_guidance: Identify applicable regulations (SAMA PDPL NCA). Implement controls. Monitor compliance. Report to regulators.

title: Compliance Reviews
implementation_guidance: Perform quarterly compliance assessments. Verify control effectiveness. Document gaps. Implement corrections.

title: Wireless Network Security
implementation_guidance: Use WPA3-Enterprise. Implement 802.1X authentication. Change default credentials. Hide SSIDs. Monitor for rogue APs.

title: Asset Ownership
description: Assign owner for each information asset
implementation_guidance: Assign asset owners from business units. Document responsibilities. Obtain owner acceptance. Review annually.

title: Asset Handling
description: Handle assets according to their classification
implementation_guidance: Define handling procedures per classification. Cover storage transmission sharing disposal. Enforce compliance.

title: Data Protection
implementation_guidance: Implement comprehensive data protection controls. Encrypt sensitive data. Control access. Monitor usage.

title: Asset Inventory
description: Establish and maintain comprehensive inventory of all assets
description_ar: إنشاء وصيانة جرد شامل لجميع الأصول
implementation_guidance: Identify all information assets. Document hardware software data services. Assign owners. Update quarterly.

title: Security Perimeter
description: Define and protect physical security perimeter
implementation_guidance: Establish physical security perimeters. Use barriers fences walls. Control entry points. Monitor 24/7.

title: Entry Controls
description: Implement strict entry controls for sensitive areas
description_ar: تطبيق ضوابط دخول صارمة للمناطق الحساسة
implementation_guidance: Control access using badges biometrics mantraps. Log all entries. Escort visitors. Review access logs.

title: Secure Operations
implementation_guidance: Define and document secure operations procedures. Cover change management capacity monitoring backup. Follow procedures.

title: Change Management
implementation_guidance: Require approval for all changes. Test in non-production. Implement during maintenance windows. Document. Enable rollback.

title: Capacity Management
implementation_guidance: Monitor system capacity continuously. Track CPU memory disk network. Forecast growth. Plan capacity upgrades.

title: Security Logging
implementation_guidance: Log comprehensive security events: authentication access changes errors privileged activities. Centralize logs.

title: Security Controls
implementation_guidance: Implement security controls. Control access. Encrypt data. Monitor security. Maintain compliance.

title: Log Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Implement 24/7 log monitoring. Use SIEM for correlation. Generate alerts. Investigate anomalies. Escalate incidents.

title: Security Testing
implementation_guidance: Test applications for security. Perform SAST DAST vulnerability scans penetration tests. Fix critical issues before launch.

title: Incident Response Plan
implementation_guidance: Develop detailed IR plan. Define procedures roles responsibilities. Cover detection containment eradication recovery.

title: Detection and Classification
implementation_guidance: Monitor for security incidents continuously. Classify by severity (Critical High Medium Low). Prioritize response.

title: Containment and Eradication
implementation_guidance: Contain incidents immediately. Isolate affected systems. Eradicate threats. Verify removal. Prevent spread.

title: Post-Incident Analysis
implementation_guidance: Conduct lessons learned sessions. Identify root causes. Implement improvements. Update procedures. Share lessons.

title: Operational Resilience
implementation_guidance: Design resilient systems. Implement redundancy. Enable rapid recovery. Test resilience. Maintain under stress.

title: Code Review
implementation_guidance: Review all code for security issues. Use manual peer review and SAST tools. Fix vulnerabilities before deployment.

title: Penetration Testing
implementation_guidance: Perform comprehensive penetration test annually. Test external and internal. Use qualified testers. Remediate findings.

title: Data Center Protection
description: Protect data centers with strong physical controls
description_ar: حماية مراكز البيانات بضوابط فيزيائية قوية
implementation_guidance: Implement layered security for data centers. Use biometric access fire suppression environmental controls UPS.

title: Secure Development
implementation_guidance: Adopt secure SDLC. Include security in all phases. Train developers. Conduct code reviews. Perform security testing.

title: Cloud Functions
implementation_guidance: Apply least privilege to functions. Encrypt function environment variables. Log function activity. Scan function dependencies.

title: Infrastructure as Code
implementation_guidance: Implement IaC. Version control templates. Review code changes. Test before deployment.

title: Secure Automation
implementation_guidance: Secure automation scripts. Control automation permissions. Review automation changes. Monitor automation activity.

title: API Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Monitor API calls. Log API activity. Detect unusual patterns. Alert on suspicious API usage.

title: Residence
implementation_guidance: Assess whether recipient is resident or non-resident. Check for permanent establishment in Saudi Arabia. Review tax treaties. Obtain residence certificates. Document residence determination.

title: WHT Rates
implementation_guidance: Apply 5% on rent and real estate income. Apply 15% on royalties management technical fees. Apply 20% on other payments. Check tax treaties for reduced rates. Document rate application.

title: Tax Treaties
implementation_guidance: Review applicable tax treaties. Apply reduced treaty rates where available. Obtain certificate of residence from recipient. Verify treaty eligibility. Document treaty application.

title: Agriculture
implementation_guidance: Apply standard rate to agricultural products and services. No special VAT treatment for agriculture. Include farming livestock produce. Document agricultural activity.

title: Tax Calculation
implementation_guidance: Calculate WHT on gross payment amount. Apply correct rate based on payment type. Check for treaty reduction. Calculate before deducting expenses. Document calculation.

title: Withholding
implementation_guidance: Withhold tax at time of payment or accrual (whichever earlier). Deduct from payment to non-resident. Pay net amount to recipient. Remit WHT to GAZT. Obtain withholding confirmation.

title: Log Retention
implementation_guidance: Retain security logs minimum 1 year. Retain critical system logs 3 years. Archive securely. Enable search and retrieval.

title: Security Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Establish 24/7 SOC. Monitor networks systems applications. Detect threats. Respond to incidents. Escalate to management.

title: Incident Response Team
implementation_guidance: Form CSIRT with defined members. Provide training and tools. Ensure 24/7 availability. Define escalation.

title: Recovery
implementation_guidance: Restore systems and services. Verify integrity. Monitor for recurrence. Document recovery actions.

title: Threat Intelligence
implementation_guidance: Subscribe to threat intelligence feeds. Analyze threats. Apply indicators of compromise. Share threat information.

title: Video Surveillance
implementation_guidance: Install CCTV covering all critical areas. Record 24/7. Retain 90 days. Monitor in real-time. Investigate incidents.

title: Environmental Protection
implementation_guidance: Protect against fire flood temperature humidity power issues. Install detection and suppression systems. Monitor continuously.

title: Cryptography Policy
implementation_guidance: Define cryptography policy. Specify approved algorithms (AES-256 RSA-2048+ SHA-256+). Define use cases.

title: Key Management
implementation_guidance: Manage key lifecycle: generation distribution storage rotation destruction. Use HSM for critical keys. Separate key management.

title: Sensitive Data Encryption
implementation_guidance: Encrypt all sensitive data at rest. Use AES-256. Encrypt databases file servers backups payment card data.

title: Communications Encryption
implementation_guidance: Encrypt all network communications. Use TLS 1.2+ for web. Use VPN for remote access. Encrypt email. Disable weak protocols.

title: Device Encryption
