implementation_guidance: Require full disk encryption on all laptops tablets smartphones. Use BitLocker FileVault or equivalent. Verify encryption.

title: Mobile Device Management
implementation_guidance: Deploy MDM solution. Enforce security policies. Require passcodes. Enable remote wipe. Monitor compliance.

title: Anti-Malware
description_ar: تطبيق حماية شاملة من البرمجيات الخبيثة
implementation_guidance: Deploy anti-malware on all systems. Update signatures hourly. Scan real-time and scheduled. Quarantine threats. Alert on detection.

title: Email Filtering
implementation_guidance: Deploy email security gateway. Filter spam phishing malware. Scan attachments. Block malicious links. Quarantine suspicious emails.

title: Vulnerability Management
implementation_guidance: Scan all systems monthly for vulnerabilities. Prioritize by criticality. Remediate critical within 15 days high within 30.

title: Patch Management
implementation_guidance: Deploy patches promptly. Critical patches within 15 days other within 30. Test before production. Document exceptions.

title: Endpoint Protection
implementation_guidance: Deploy endpoint protection on all devices. Include antivirus anti-malware EDR DLP. Update regularly. Monitor alerts.

title: PACS Integration
implementation_guidance: Achieve full PACS-EMR integration. Enable single sign-on. Provide context launch. Display images in workflow. Eliminate duplicate systems.

title: EMR Committee
implementation_guidance: Form multidisciplinary EMR committee. Meet regularly. Review issues. Prioritize enhancements. Guide EMR strategy.

title: Security Policies
implementation_guidance: Define pod security policies. Implement network policies. Control resource quotas. Monitor policy compliance.

title: Container Orchestration
implementation_guidance: Secure Kubernetes/container orchestration. Control API access. Implement RBAC. Scan for vulnerabilities.

title: Serverless Computing
implementation_guidance: Secure serverless functions. Control function permissions. Monitor function execution. Review function code.

title: API Security
implementation_guidance: Secure cloud APIs. Implement API authentication. Use API keys or tokens. Rate limit API calls.

title: Configuration Compliance
implementation_guidance: Implement cloud security baselines. Scan for misconfigurations. Remediate drift. Monitor compliance.

title: Configuration Management
implementation_guidance: Define secure cloud configurations. Use infrastructure as code. Version control configurations. Audit configurations.

title: Cloud Auditing
implementation_guidance: Conduct cloud security audits. Review configurations. Test controls. Implement findings.

title: Cloud Compliance
implementation_guidance: Verify cloud compliance with Saudi regulations. Implement compliance controls. Audit cloud environment. Document compliance.

title: Log Analysis
implementation_guidance: Centralize cloud logs. Use SIEM for analysis. Correlate events. Detect security incidents.

title: Cloud Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Monitor cloud resources. Track performance metrics. Alert on anomalies. Investigate security events.

title: Cloud Logging
implementation_guidance: Enable cloud audit logs. Log all API calls. Log resource changes. Retain logs per requirements.

title: VPN
implementation_guidance: Connect to cloud via VPN. Use site-to-site VPN. Encrypt VPN traffic. Monitor VPN connections.

title: Intrusion Detection
implementation_guidance: Deploy cloud IDS/IPS. Monitor network traffic. Detect suspicious activity. Alert on threats.

title: Access Reviews
implementation_guidance: Review cloud access quarterly. Verify appropriateness. Remove unused permissions. Audit access logs.

title: Cloud Data Encryption
implementation_guidance: Encrypt data at rest in cloud. Encrypt data in transit. Use strong encryption (AES-256). Manage encryption keys.

title: Cloud Key Management
implementation_guidance: Use cloud KMS or HSM. Control key access. Rotate keys regularly. Backup keys securely.

title: Data Classification
implementation_guidance: Classify data before cloud migration. Label cloud resources. Apply controls per classification. Monitor data movement.

title: Data Loss Prevention
implementation_guidance: Implement cloud DLP. Monitor data exfiltration. Block unauthorized transfers. Detect sensitive data exposure.

title: Compute Security
implementation_guidance: Harden cloud instances. Apply security baselines. Use approved images. Patch instances regularly.

title: Migration Assessment
implementation_guidance: Assess applications before migration. Identify security requirements. Plan migration approach. Test migration.

title: Virtual Machines
implementation_guidance: Configure VMs securely. Disable unnecessary services. Implement anti-malware. Monitor VM security.

title: Cloud Storage Security
implementation_guidance: Configure storage securely. Enable encryption. Control access to buckets/containers. Monitor storage access.

title: Public Storage
implementation_guidance: Prohibit public storage buckets. Block public access. Scan for exposed storage. Alert on public resources.

title: Cloud Backup
implementation_guidance: Backup cloud data. Store backups in different region. Enable versioning. Test recovery procedures.

title: Database Protection
implementation_guidance: Use private subnets for databases. Implement database firewall. Audit database access. Backup databases regularly.

title: Containers
implementation_guidance: Scan container images. Use trusted registries. Implement container runtime security. Monitor container activity.

title: Migration Security
implementation_guidance: Secure data during migration. Encrypt in transit. Validate after migration. Document migration.

title: Data Quality Measurement
implementation_guidance: Implement data quality monitoring. Measure quality metrics. Generate quality reports. Address quality issues.

title: Data Governance Committee
implementation_guidance: Form data governance committee with C-level representation. Meet quarterly. Make decisions on data policies. Track actions.

title: Regulator Cooperation
implementation_guidance: Cooperate with CITC inspections. Provide cloud documentation. Enable regulator access to cloud data. Implement recommendations.

title: Secure Innovation
implementation_guidance: Enable secure cloud innovation. Implement security in new services. Balance security with agility. Monitor innovations.

title: Central Governance
implementation_guidance: Centralize cloud governance. Approve cloud services. Maintain cloud catalog. Monitor all clouds.

title: Data Retrieval
implementation_guidance: Enable data export. Use standard formats. Test data retrieval. Document retrieval process.

title: Cost Allocation
implementation_guidance: Tag cloud resources. Track costs by project/department. Enable chargeback. Report cost allocation.

title: Cloud Incident Response
implementation_guidance: Develop cloud incident response plan. Define cloud-specific procedures. Enable forensics capabilities. Test IR plan.

title: Cloud Forensics
implementation_guidance: Enable cloud forensics. Preserve cloud evidence. Snapshot instances. Retain logs for investigation.

title: Cloud Continuity
implementation_guidance: Develop cloud BC/DR plan. Use multiple availability zones. Implement auto-scaling. Test failover.

title: Withholding Timing
implementation_guidance: Withhold at earlier of: payment or invoice accrual. Apply at each payment installment. Withhold on partial payments. Time withholding correctly. Document timing.

title: Tax Payment
implementation_guidance: Pay withheld tax to GAZT by 10th of following month. Use GAZT portal or SADAD. Obtain payment receipt. Allocate to correct period. Track payment.

title: Payment Receipts
implementation_guidance: Obtain GAZT payment receipt. Provide receipt copy to non-resident. Maintain receipt records. Enable recipient to claim foreign tax credit. Track receipts.

title: WHT Returns
implementation_guidance: File monthly WHT return (Form 5) by 10th of following month. Include all payments to non-residents. Report amounts withheld. Submit through GAZT portal. File even if no activity.

title: Return Details
implementation_guidance: Include in WHT return: recipient details payment type amount paid WHT amount. Provide breakdown by payment type. Reconcile with payments. Ensure accuracy.

title: Taxable Payments
implementation_guidance: Identify payments subject to WHT. Include: service fees consulting management royalties rent interest dividends (in certain cases). Exclude exempt payments. Document payment nature.

title: VAT Refund
implementation_guidance: Request refund when input VAT exceeds output VAT. Submit supporting documents. Respond to GAZT queries. Receive refund within 30 days. Track refund status.

title: VAT Payment
implementation_guidance: Calculate VAT payable (output VAT minus input VAT). Pay through SADAD or online banking. Obtain payment receipt. Record payment. Request refund if input exceeds output.

title: Cloud Database Security
implementation_guidance: Configure databases securely. Enable encryption. Control database access. Monitor database activity.

title: Cloud Firewalls
implementation_guidance: Deploy cloud firewalls. Configure security groups. Implement WAF for web apps. Monitor firewall logs.

title: Privileged Access
implementation_guidance: Control cloud admin access. Use separate privileged accounts. Require approval for privileged access. Monitor privileged activities.

title: Hybrid Cloud
implementation_guidance: Secure hybrid cloud connections. Implement consistent policies. Monitor inter-cloud traffic. Manage identities across clouds.

title: Data Quality Standards
implementation_guidance: Define data quality dimensions: accuracy completeness consistency timeliness validity. Set quality targets. Monitor compliance.

title: Data Governance Framework
implementation_guidance: Establish data governance council. Define roles (data owners stewards custodians). Create governance processes.

title: Data Governance Policy
description: Establish comprehensive data governance and AI policy
description_ar: وضع سياسة شاملة لحوكمة البيانات والذكاء الاصطناعي
implementation_guidance: Develop data governance framework. Define data ownership stewardship lifecycle. Obtain executive approval. Communicate organization-wide.

title: Customer Responsibility
implementation_guidance: Implement customer-side controls. Secure data applications identities. Monitor customer responsibilities. Document implementation.

title: Shared Responsibility
implementation_guidance: Understand cloud shared responsibility. Document responsibilities: provider vs customer. Assign ownership. Communicate model.

title: Regulatory Reporting
implementation_guidance: Report cloud usage to CITC. Submit required information. Notify of incidents. Respond to regulator requests.

title: Emerging Technologies
implementation_guidance: Assess new cloud services. Evaluate security implications. Test before adoption. Document assessments.

title: Shadow IT
implementation_guidance: Discover unauthorized cloud usage. Monitor cloud service sign-ups. Block unapproved services. Educate users.

title: Exit Strategy
implementation_guidance: Define cloud exit strategy. Ensure data portability. Plan for provider change. Test data extraction.

title: Cost Management
implementation_guidance: Monitor cloud spending. Set budget alerts. Optimize costs. Eliminate waste. Report costs.

title: Cloud Disaster Recovery
implementation_guidance: Implement cloud DR. Replicate across regions. Define RTOs/RPOs. Test recovery regularly.

title: Cloud Performance
implementation_guidance: Monitor cloud resource performance. Track latency throughput. Optimize costs. Right-size resources.

title: Cloud Optimization
implementation_guidance: Optimize cloud costs. Eliminate unused resources. Use reserved instances. Implement auto-shutdown.

title: Multi-Cloud
implementation_guidance: Define multi-cloud strategy. Maintain consistent security. Monitor all clouds. Centralize visibility.

title: Secrets Management
implementation_guidance: Use cloud secrets manager. Never hardcode secrets. Rotate secrets regularly. Audit secret access.

title: Cloud Supply Chain
implementation_guidance: Assess cloud dependencies. Verify third-party services. Monitor supply chain risks. Maintain vendor inventory.

title: Third-Party Services
implementation_guidance: Assess cloud marketplace services. Review third-party permissions. Monitor third-party access. Audit integrations.

title: Cloud DevSecOps
implementation_guidance: Integrate security in cloud CI/CD. Scan code and containers. Test security in pipeline. Automate compliance checks.

title: Continuous Security
implementation_guidance: Implement continuous security testing. Monitor runtime security. Detect vulnerabilities continuously. Remediate automatically where possible.

title: Cloud Training
implementation_guidance: Train staff on cloud security. Cover cloud-specific risks. Provide hands-on practice. Test knowledge.

title: Cloud Awareness
implementation_guidance: Raise cloud security awareness. Communicate cloud policies. Share best practices. Update on cloud threats.

title: Certificates
implementation_guidance: Manage SSL/TLS certificates. Automate certificate renewal. Monitor expiration. Use trusted CAs.

title: Data Quality Improvement
implementation_guidance: Identify data quality issues. Root cause analysis. Implement improvements. Track quality trends over time.

title: Cloud Access Controls
implementation_guidance: Control access to cloud resources. Use role-based access. Implement resource policies. Review access regularly.

title: Multi-Factor Authentication
implementation_guidance: Require MFA for cloud console access. Use MFA for API access. Implement conditional access. Monitor authentication.

title: Manage Data
implementation_guidance: Manage data assets. Define data architecture. Establish governance. Ensure quality. Protect data.

title: Manage Security
implementation_guidance: Manage information security. Establish security program. Define policies. Implement controls. Monitor compliance.

title: Manage Risk
implementation_guidance: Manage IT risk. Identify risks. Assess impact. Define response. Monitor risks.

title: Manage Quality
implementation_guidance: Manage IT quality. Define quality standards. Implement quality assurance. Monitor compliance. Improve continuously.

title: Manage Suppliers
implementation_guidance: Manage IT suppliers and vendors. Evaluate suppliers. Negotiate contracts. Monitor delivery. Manage relationships.

title: Manage Service Agreements
implementation_guidance: Manage service level agreements. Define service levels. Establish SLAs. Monitor compliance. Report performance.

title: Manage Relationships
implementation_guidance: Manage business and IT relationships. Understand requirements. Set expectations. Foster collaboration. Measure satisfaction.

implementation_guidance: Manage IT human resources. Plan workforce. Manage performance. Ensure compliance. Foster culture.

implementation_guidance: Manage IT budget and costs. Prepare budget. Allocate costs. Monitor spending. Report financial performance.

title: Manage Suppliers
implementation_guidance: Manage supplier relationships. Select suppliers. Establish contracts. Monitor performance. Manage risks.

implementation_guidance: Develop and maintain workforce talent. Recruit staff. Train employees. Develop careers. Retain talent.

implementation_guidance: Create and maintain IT capabilities. Develop skills. Build knowledge. Foster innovation. Enable performance.

implementation_guidance: Manage programs and projects. Govern portfolio. Monitor progress. Manage changes. Report status.

implementation_guidance: Evaluate value optimization of IT investments. Review business cases. Assess benefits. Monitor portfolio. Enable informed investment decisions.

title: Testing
implementation_guidance: Test services comprehensively. Develop test plans. Execute tests. Document results. Address defects.

title: Prepare Project Plans
implementation_guidance: Prepare IT-enabled investment and project plans. Define scope timeline budget. Identify dependencies. Assign resources. Document plans.

title: Define Strategic Plan
implementation_guidance: Define IT strategic plan. Set objectives. Define initiatives. Allocate resources. Create roadmap. Communicate plan.

title: Assess Current Environment
implementation_guidance: Assess current IT capabilities and performance. Analyze strengths weaknesses. Identify gaps. Evaluate maturity. Document assessment.

title: Ensure Governance Framework Setting
implementation_guidance: Establish IT governance framework aligned with enterprise governance. Define structures processes mechanisms. Assign decision rights. Enable accountability. Document framework.

title: Ensure Benefits Delivery
implementation_guidance: Monitor that IT delivers value. Track benefits realization. Measure ROI. Ensure stakeholder value. Report to board.

title: Ensure Risk Optimization
implementation_guidance: Ensure risk appetite is understood. Balance risk and benefits. Maintain acceptable risk levels. Integrate risk management. Enable risk-aware decisions.

title: Evaluate Risk Management
implementation_guidance: Evaluate IT risk management effectiveness. Review risk appetite. Assess risk tolerance. Monitor risk exposure. Enable risk governance.

title: Reverse Charge
implementation_guidance: Apply reverse charge for imported services. Self-account for VAT. Include in VAT return box 3 and 8. Claim as input VAT if eligible. Document reverse charge.

title: Credit Notes
implementation_guidance: Issue credit notes for returned goods discounts errors. Include original invoice reference. Show VAT adjustment. Reduce output VAT in same period. Provide to customer.

title: Property Leasing
implementation_guidance: Apply 15% VAT on commercial property leasing. Exempt residential leasing. Apply to rent payments. Issue tax invoices. Track lease contracts.

title: Insurance
implementation_guidance: Exempt life insurance. Exempt health insurance meeting CCHI requirements. Apply standard rate to other insurance. Handle reinsurance appropriately.

title: Healthcare
implementation_guidance: Zero-rate healthcare services to citizens and residents. Zero-rate medications on MOH list. Apply standard rate to non-listed items. Verify patient eligibility. Document healthcare.

title: Filing Deadlines
implementation_guidance: File returns by end of month following tax period. Pay VAT due by same deadline. Submit even if no activity (zero return). Avoid late filing penalties.

title: Human Intervention
description: Enable human intervention in AI decisions
description_ar: تمكين التدخل البشري في قرارات الذكاء الاصطناعي
implementation_guidance: Provide human review option. Allow overrides. Document human decisions. Train reviewers.

title: Model Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Monitor model accuracy drift. Detect performance degradation. Track predictions. Alert on anomalies. Retrain as needed.

title: Model Testing
implementation_guidance: Test models for accuracy fairness robustness. Conduct adversarial testing. Validate outputs. Document results.

title: AI Ethics
implementation_guidance: Define AI ethics: fairness transparency accountability. Prevent discrimination. Ensure explainability. Protect rights.

title: Data Sharing Agreements
implementation_guidance: Require agreements for data sharing. Define permitted uses. Specify security requirements. Include liability clauses.

title: Data Labeling
implementation_guidance: Apply classification labels to datasets files databases. Use metadata tags. Automate labeling where possible.

title: Data Science
implementation_guidance: Govern data science projects. Approve data access. Review models. Ensure compliance. Document projects.

title: Data Modeling
implementation_guidance: Create logical and physical data models. Define entity relationships. Normalize data. Document models.

title: Direct Value Optimization
implementation_guidance: Direct value optimization initiatives. Set value targets. Allocate resources. Prioritize investments. Communicate expectations.

title: Manage Programs and Projects
implementation_guidance: Manage IT-enabled change programs and projects. Initiate projects. Plan execution. Control delivery. Close projects.

title: Direct Risk Management
implementation_guidance: Direct enterprise approach to IT risk management. Set risk appetite. Define risk tolerance. Assign risk ownership. Communicate risk culture.

title: Direct Resource Management
implementation_guidance: Direct resource management approach. Set resource principles. Define investment priorities. Allocate budget. Enable resource optimization.

title: Evaluate Stakeholder Engagement
implementation_guidance: Evaluate stakeholder engagement. Identify stakeholders. Assess needs. Review communication. Measure satisfaction.

title: Direct Stakeholder Engagement
implementation_guidance: Direct stakeholder engagement approach. Define engagement strategy. Set communication standards. Assign responsibilities. Enable collaboration.

title: Manage IT Management Framework
implementation_guidance: Maintain IT management framework. Define processes. Establish roles. Assign responsibilities. Document framework.

title: Manage Strategy
implementation_guidance: Develop and maintain IT strategy. Align with business strategy. Define strategic goals. Set initiatives. Communicate strategy.

title: Manage Enterprise Architecture
implementation_guidance: Establish and maintain enterprise architecture. Define current and target state. Develop roadmap. Enable architecture governance. Document architecture.

title: Evaluate Resource Management
implementation_guidance: Evaluate IT resource management. Review resource allocation. Assess capability. Monitor utilization. Ensure optimization.

title: Federated Identity
implementation_guidance: Implement identity federation. Use SAML or OAuth. Integrate with corporate directory. Enable SSO.

title: Manage Requirements Definition
implementation_guidance: Define and maintain solution requirements. Gather requirements. Analyze needs. Document specifications. Validate requirements.

title: Manage Availability and Capacity
implementation_guidance: Manage service availability and capacity. Plan capacity. Monitor performance. Optimize resources. Ensure availability.

title: Cloud Identity Management
implementation_guidance: Implement cloud IAM. Use centralized identity provider. Enforce MFA. Apply least privilege. Manage cloud identities.

title: Cloud Networking
implementation_guidance: Configure security groups. Implement network ACLs. Use VPN for connectivity. Enable traffic encryption.

title: Cloud Segmentation
implementation_guidance: Segment cloud resources by sensitivity. Separate production from development. Isolate workloads. Implement micro-segmentation.

title: Secure Cloud Architecture
implementation_guidance: Design secure cloud architecture. Implement network segmentation. Use VPCs and subnets. Apply defense in depth.

title: Provider Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Monitor provider SLA compliance. Track service availability. Review security incidents. Assess provider changes.

title: Cloud Contracts
implementation_guidance: Include security requirements in cloud contracts. Define SLAs for availability security. Specify data ownership. Include audit rights.

title: Provider Assessment
implementation_guidance: Conduct provider security assessment. Review certifications (ISO 27001 SOC 2). Assess provider financial stability. Evaluate provider reputation.

title: Provider Selection
implementation_guidance: Use CITC-approved cloud providers. Verify provider compliance with Saudi regulations. Assess provider security. Document selection.

title: Data Access
implementation_guidance: Ensure Saudi legal jurisdiction over data. Prohibit foreign government access. Require legal process for access. Protect from foreign laws.

title: Data Residency
implementation_guidance: Ensure data resides in Saudi territory. Store backups locally. Verify cloud provider data center location. Prohibit cross-border replication.

title: Data Sovereignty
implementation_guidance: Store data within Saudi Arabia. Use local data centers. Prohibit data transfer outside KSA without approval. Verify data location.

title: Cloud Policies
implementation_guidance: Define cloud usage policies. Cover public private hybrid clouds. Address security privacy compliance. Document policies.

title: Cloud Strategy
implementation_guidance: Develop cloud adoption strategy. Align with business objectives. Define cloud deployment models. Plan cloud migration.

title: Cloud Governance
implementation_guidance: Establish cloud governance framework. Define cloud strategy. Assign cloud responsibilities. Implement cloud policies.

title: Manage Assurance
implementation_guidance: Manage assurance. Scope assurance. Obtain independent assurance. Report assurance findings. Follow up issues.

title: Monitor Compliance
implementation_guidance: Monitor and evaluate compliance with requirements. Identify obligations. Assess compliance. Report violations. Implement corrections.

title: Monitor Internal Control System
implementation_guidance: Monitor and evaluate internal control system. Assess controls. Test effectiveness. Identify deficiencies. Report findings.

title: Manage Organizational Change
implementation_guidance: Manage organizational change. Prepare for change. Communicate changes. Train users. Support adoption.

title: Manage Changes
implementation_guidance: Manage IT changes. Assess change requests. Approve changes. Implement changes. Review post-implementation.

title: Manage Change Acceptance
implementation_guidance: Manage change acceptance and transitioning. Test solutions. Obtain acceptance. Transition to operations. Document acceptance.

title: Manage Knowledge
implementation_guidance: Manage IT knowledge. Capture knowledge. Organize information. Share knowledge. Enable learning.

title: Manage Assets
implementation_guidance: Manage IT assets throughout lifecycle. Identify assets. Track ownership. Maintain inventory. Optimize assets.

title: Manage Configuration
implementation_guidance: Manage configuration of IT assets. Establish baseline. Control changes. Maintain accuracy. Enable recovery.

title: Manage Solutions Build
implementation_guidance: Manage solution design development and configuration. Design solutions. Develop components. Configure systems. Test solutions.

title: Manage Projects
implementation_guidance: Manage individual projects. Plan project. Execute activities. Monitor progress. Close project.

title: Manage Service Requests and Incidents
implementation_guidance: Manage service requests and incidents. Log requests. Categorize incidents. Prioritize issues. Resolve requests.

title: Manage Problems
implementation_guidance: Manage IT problems. Identify root causes. Resolve problems. Prevent recurrence. Document solutions.

title: Manage Continuity
implementation_guidance: Manage IT continuity. Develop BCP. Test plans. Maintain readiness. Enable recovery.

title: Manage Security Services
implementation_guidance: Manage security services. Protect information. Monitor threats. Respond to incidents. Report security.

title: Manage Business Process Controls
implementation_guidance: Manage business process controls. Define controls. Implement measures. Monitor effectiveness. Improve controls.

title: Monitor and Evaluate Performance
implementation_guidance: Monitor and evaluate IT performance. Define metrics. Collect data. Analyze performance. Report results.

title: Manage Operations
implementation_guidance: Manage IT operations. Coordinate activities. Schedule jobs. Monitor infrastructure. Report status.

title: Data Catalog
description: Establish and maintain comprehensive data catalog
description_ar: إنشاء والحفاظ على فهرس شامل للبيانات
implementation_guidance: Implement data catalog solution. Document all data assets. Include metadata lineage ownership. Enable discovery.

title: Metadata Management
implementation_guidance: Define metadata standards. Capture technical and business metadata. Maintain metadata repository. Update regularly.

title: Data Lineage
implementation_guidance: Track data from source to consumption. Document transformations. Map data flows. Enable impact analysis.

title: Recovery
implementation_guidance: Repay VAT relief if debt recovered. Account in correct period. Increase output VAT. Notify GAZT. Maintain records.

title: Bad Debts
implementation_guidance: Claim bad debt relief after 12 months. Write off debt in accounts. Reduce output VAT. Document bad debt. Reverse if subsequently paid.

title: GCC Agreement
implementation_guidance: Follow GCC VAT agreement. Apply place of supply rules. Zero-rate for GCC registered businesses. Verify registration. Support with evidence.

title: GCC
implementation_guidance: Apply standard rate to supplies to GCC customers. Zero-rate qualifying supplies (B2B services). Obtain GCC customer VAT registration. Apply reverse charge. Document GCC status.

title: Electronic Platforms
implementation_guidance: Apply deemed supplier rules for platforms. Account for VAT on marketplace sales. Register if facilitating supplies. Issue tax invoices. Maintain platform records.

title: E-Commerce
implementation_guidance: Register for VAT if selling in Saudi Arabia. Apply place of supply rules. Register non-resident suppliers. Use deemed supplier provisions. Comply with e-invoicing.

title: Compliance
implementation_guidance: Comply with all VAT regulations. Implement internal controls. Conduct self-assessments. Review VAT treatment. Update for law changes.

title: VAT Audit
implementation_guidance: Prepare for GAZT audits. Maintain organized records. Provide requested information. Respond to queries. Address audit findings.

title: Corrections
implementation_guidance: Identify and correct VAT errors. Adjust in current return if under SAR 5000. Submit amended return if over SAR 5000. Disclose voluntarily. Minimize penalties.

title: Penalties
implementation_guidance: Avoid late filing penalty (5-25% of VAT). Avoid late payment penalty (5% then 1% monthly). Prevent error penalties. Submit on time. Pay by deadline.

title: Intra-Group Supplies
implementation_guidance: Disregard intra-group supplies for VAT. Apply to registered group members only. Document group structure. Maintain member list.

title: Tax Groups
implementation_guidance: Form tax group for related entities. Apply for group registration. Appoint representative member. File single return. Apply intra-group supply rules.

title: Investment Gold
implementation_guidance: Exempt gold 99% purity or above for investment. Require gold in bar or coin form. Document investment purpose. Maintain records.

title: Gold
implementation_guidance: Apply standard rate to gold above 99% purity. Exempt investment gold. Apply to manufacturing fees. Zero-rate gold exports. Document gold purity.

title: International Shipping
implementation_guidance: Zero-rate international transportation of goods. Apply to exports. Include air sea land. Obtain shipping evidence. Document international nature.

title: Transportation
implementation_guidance: Apply standard rate to domestic transportation. Zero-rate international passenger transport. Zero-rate international goods transport. Apply to Saudi leg. Document journey.

title: Training
implementation_guidance: Apply standard rate to commercial training. Zero-rate qualifying vocational training. Determine training nature. Document training type.

title: Documentation
implementation_guidance: Document all taxable supplies. Record exempt and zero-rated supplies. Maintain purchase records. Track input VAT claims. Support with invoices.

title: Exports
implementation_guidance: Apply zero-rating to exports of goods and services. Obtain export evidence (customs declaration bill of lading). Maintain export documentation. Verify buyer is non-resident.

title: Export Evidence
implementation_guidance: Retain customs export declaration. Keep shipping documents. Maintain proof of payment from overseas. Document foreign delivery. Support zero-rating claim.

title: Imports
implementation_guidance: Pay import VAT at customs. Use reverse charge for service imports. Declare in VAT return. Claim as input VAT (if eligible). Document import VAT.

title: VAT Adjustments
implementation_guidance: Issue credit notes for supply reductions. Issue debit notes for increases. Adjust VAT in correct period. Report in VAT return. Retain adjustment documentation.

title: Voluntary Registration
implementation_guidance: Register voluntarily if turnover between SAR 187500-375000. Assess benefits. Apply through portal. Obtain VAT number. Comply with all obligations.

title: Financial Services
implementation_guidance: Exempt most financial services (lending deposits). Apply standard rate to explicit fees. Exempt insurance. Zero-rate for GCC customers. Document service type.

title: Data Loss Prevention
implementation_guidance: Implement DLP controls. Monitor data exfiltration. Block unauthorized transfers. Detect sensitive data movement.

title: Data Access Control
implementation_guidance: Implement role-based access control. Grant access on need-to-know basis. Review access regularly. Revoke promptly.

title: Data Encryption
implementation_guidance: Encrypt data at rest and in transit. Use strong encryption (AES-256 TLS 1.2+). Manage keys securely.

title: Data Classification
implementation_guidance: Define classification scheme (Public Internal Confidential Restricted). Classify all data assets. Apply labels. Train personnel.

title: Classified Data Handling
implementation_guidance: Define handling procedures per classification level. Control access storage transmission. Enforce policies.

title: Data Ownership
description: Assign owner for each data asset
implementation_guidance: Assign data owners from business units. Document ownership. Define owner responsibilities. Obtain acknowledgment.

title: Owner Responsibilities
implementation_guidance: Document owner duties: quality access decisions retention. Require owners to fulfill responsibilities. Monitor compliance.

title: Data Stewards
implementation_guidance: Appoint data stewards for critical data domains. Define steward responsibilities. Provide training. Support stewards.

title: Data Lifecycle
implementation_guidance: Define lifecycle stages: creation storage use archive disposal. Manage data through all stages. Document lifecycle.

title: Data Archiving
implementation_guidance: Identify data for archiving. Move to archive storage. Maintain accessibility. Ensure integrity. Document archives.

title: Data Disposal
implementation_guidance: Implement secure deletion methods. Destroy physical media. Wipe electronic storage. Verify deletion. Document disposal.

title: Personal Data Protection
implementation_guidance: Implement PDPL controls. Obtain consent. Provide privacy notices. Enable data subject rights. Report breaches.

title: Privacy Impact Assessment
implementation_guidance: Identify privacy risks. Conduct PIA for high-risk processing. Document risks and mitigations. Update regularly.

title: Library
implementation_guidance: Provide school library. Stock appropriate books. Enable access. Promote reading. Maintain collection.

title: Privacy by Design
implementation_guidance: Integrate privacy into system design. Conduct privacy reviews. Implement privacy-enhancing technologies. Default privacy settings.

title: Data Retention
implementation_guidance: Define retention periods per data type. Retain data per policy. Delete after retention period. Document retention.

title: Data Exchange Standards
implementation_guidance: Define exchange formats: JSON XML CSV. Use standard schemas. Validate exchanges. Document standards.

title: Data Awareness
implementation_guidance: Communicate data value. Share success stories. Promote data culture. Recognize data stewardship.

title: Data Innovation
implementation_guidance: Support data innovation projects. Provide data sandboxes. Enable experimentation. Share innovations.

title: Data Monetization
implementation_guidance: Identify monetization opportunities. Develop data products. Price data appropriately. Generate revenue from data.

title: VAT Number
implementation_guidance: Receive 15-digit VAT number from GAZT. Display on tax invoices. Include on business documents. Verify customer VAT numbers. Maintain valid registration.

title: VAT Calculation
implementation_guidance: Apply 15% VAT rate on taxable supplies. Calculate VAT accurately. Apply zero-rating where applicable. Handle exempt supplies correctly. Document calculations.

title: Input VAT
implementation_guidance: Claim input VAT on business purchases. Retain valid tax invoices. Ensure direct link to taxable activity. Apply input VAT rules. Block where prohibited.

title: Data Security
implementation_guidance: Protect data with encryption access controls monitoring. Implement defense-in-depth. Prevent unauthorized access.

title: Data Integration
implementation_guidance: Define integration standards. Use APIs and ETL. Maintain data quality during integration. Document integrations.

title: APIs
implementation_guidance: Develop secure APIs. Authenticate API users. Rate limit. Log API usage. Version APIs.

title: Continuous Improvement
implementation_guidance: Review data practices regularly. Identify improvements. Implement enhancements. Measure impact. Share lessons learned.

title: Data Value
implementation_guidance: Assess data value to business. Calculate data ROI. Monetize data assets. Track value realization.

title: VAT Registration
implementation_guidance: Register for VAT if turnover exceeds SAR 375000. Apply through GAZT portal. Obtain VAT number. Display VAT certificate. Update registration for changes.

title: Data Training
implementation_guidance: Train all personnel on data governance. Cover policies responsibilities quality. Provide role-specific training. Track completion.

title: Simplified Invoices
implementation_guidance: Issue simplified invoices for B2C sales under SAR 1000. Include minimum required fields. Use approved POS system. Comply with e-invoicing from Dec 2021.

title: VAT Rates
implementation_guidance: Apply standard rate (15%) for most supplies. Apply zero rate (0%) for exports healthcare education. Identify exempt supplies (residential real estate financial services). Document rate application.

title: Deduction Rules
implementation_guidance: Deduct input VAT for making taxable supplies. Block for exempt supplies. Apportion for mixed supplies. Claim in correct tax period. Support with invoices.

title: VAT Returns
implementation_guidance: File monthly or quarterly VAT returns per registration. Submit through GAZT portal. Include all supplies and purchases. Calculate net VAT. Pay by deadline.

title: Disciplinary Actions
implementation_guidance: Define disciplinary procedures. Apply sanctions for violations. Document disciplinary actions. Communicate decisions.

title: Data Metrics
implementation_guidance: Define data KPIs: quality completeness timeliness. Measure regularly. Track trends. Report to management.

title: Reference Data Updates
implementation_guidance: Update reference data regularly. Validate updates. Communicate changes. Maintain version history.

title: Data Sovereignty
implementation_guidance: Store critical data within Saudi Arabia. Control cross-border transfers. Comply with data localization requirements.

title: Cross-Border Transfer
implementation_guidance: Assess destination country adequacy. Use standard contractual clauses. Obtain approvals. Document transfers.

title: Sovereign Cloud
implementation_guidance: Select cloud providers with Saudi data centers. Verify data residency. Review jurisdiction. Maintain sovereignty.

title: Regulatory Compliance
implementation_guidance: Identify applicable regulations: PDPL sector-specific. Implement controls. Monitor compliance. Report to regulators.

title: Data Audit
implementation_guidance: Audit data practices. Review data handling. Assess compliance. Document findings. Implement corrections.

title: Data Architecture
implementation_guidance: Define data architecture principles. Design data models. Plan data infrastructure. Document architecture.

title: Data Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Monitor data access patterns. Detect anomalies. Track data usage. Alert on suspicious activity. Investigate incidents.

title: Storage Management
implementation_guidance: Plan storage capacity. Optimize storage. Tier data by access frequency. Monitor storage usage. Scale appropriately.

title: Data Backup
implementation_guidance: Backup all critical data. Implement 3-2-1 backup strategy. Test restores. Encrypt backups. Store offsite.

title: Disaster Recovery
implementation_guidance: Develop data DR plan. Define RPO/RTO. Replicate data. Test failover. Document recovery procedures.

title: Master Data
implementation_guidance: Identify master data entities. Define golden records. Implement MDM. Maintain data consistency. Govern master data.

title: Reference Data
implementation_guidance: Identify reference data: codes lookups. Centralize management. Version reference data. Distribute updates.

title: Data Standards
implementation_guidance: Define naming conventions data types formats. Standardize across systems. Enforce standards. Document.

title: PE Consequences
implementation_guidance: If PE exists: no WHT required (corporate tax instead). Determine profit attribution. Apply corporate tax rules. Register for corporate tax. Document PE treatment.

title: Internal Enforcement
implementation_guidance: Investigate violations. Impose disciplinary action. Document enforcement. Report serious violations to CMA.

title: Compliance Program
implementation_guidance: Establish compliance function. Develop policies and procedures. Monitor compliance. Report to management.

title: Information Security
implementation_guidance: Implement information security controls. Protect confidential data. Prevent unauthorized access. Monitor security.

title: Sustainability
implementation_guidance: Integrate sustainability into strategy. Reduce environmental impact. Report on sustainability metrics. Set sustainability goals.

title: Social Responsibility
implementation_guidance: Develop CSR policy. Support community initiatives. Promote environmental sustainability. Report on CSR activities.

implementation_guidance: Provide safe working environment. Ensure fair compensation. Enable training and development. Respect employee rights.

implementation_guidance: Ensure fair treatment of customers. Handle complaints effectively. Protect customer data. Maintain service quality.

implementation_guidance: Require conflict disclosures. Maintain conflict register. Implement conflict procedures. Monitor compliance.

implementation_guidance: Develop code of conduct for directors officers employees. Cover ethics conflicts gifts. Obtain acknowledgments. Enforce code.

implementation_guidance: Monitor master data quality. Cleanse data. Deduplicate. Validate. Maintain high quality.

implementation_guidance: Disclose board member names qualifications independence status. Include board attendance committee membership. Update changes.

implementation_guidance: Prohibit trading on material non-public information. Implement blackout periods. Monitor insider transactions. Report insider trading.

implementation_guidance: Monitor trading for market manipulation insider trading. Detect unusual trading patterns. Investigate suspicious trading. Report violations.

implementation_guidance: Execute client orders promptly. Obtain best execution. Record orders accurately. Confirm executions.

implementation_guidance: Establish policies and procedures. Conduct compliance training. Monitor compliance. Report violations.

implementation_guidance: Select qualified external auditor. Ensure auditor independence. Rotate audit partner every 5 years. Review audit findings.

implementation_guidance: Establish enterprise risk management. Identify strategic operational financial compliance risks. Assess and prioritize risks.

implementation_guidance: Assess governance framework annually. Identify improvements. Update policies. Report to board.

implementation_guidance: Establish governance policies procedures charters. Document governance framework. Communicate to organization. Review annually.

implementation_guidance: Enable director self-assessment. Use evaluation questionnaires. Discuss results. Address development needs.

implementation_guidance: Conduct external evaluation every 3 years. Engage independent evaluator. Review governance practices. Implement recommendations.

implementation_guidance: Conduct board induction for new members. Provide ongoing training. Cover governance regulations fiduciary duties. Update on industry developments.

implementation_guidance: Enable director development programs. Attend relevant conferences. Participate in training. Update skills regularly.

implementation_guidance: Test system effectiveness regularly. Tune scenarios and rules. Review alert quality. Optimize false positives. Document tuning.

implementation_guidance: Implement automated transaction monitoring system. Deploy sanctions screening. Use name matching. Maintain systems. Document technology.

implementation_guidance: Maintain complete accurate records. Enable reconstruction of transactions. Ensure legibility. Protect from loss or damage.

title: Report Quality
implementation_guidance: Include complete accurate information in STRs. Provide supporting documentation. Explain suspicion clearly. Review before filing.

implementation_guidance: File STRs within required timeframe. Do not delay reporting. Report immediately for serious cases. Track reporting deadlines.

implementation_guidance: Conduct ML/TF risk assessment for securities trading investment management. Consider customer products channels geography.

implementation_guidance: Appoint qualified MLRO at senior level. Grant independence and authority. Report to board. Provide resources.

description: Understand purpose and nature of relationship

implementation_guidance: Establish qualification criteria for board members. Require relevant expertise. Assess competencies. Document qualifications.

implementation_guidance: Assess risk likelihood and impact. Evaluate inherent and residual risk. Use risk matrix. Prioritize risks.

implementation_guidance: Protect AML information confidentiality. Prohibit tipping off. Secure AML records. Limit information access.

implementation_guidance: Provide disclosures in Arabic and English. Ensure accurate translation. Specify Arabic as primary. Resolve discrepancies.

title: Continuous Disclosure
implementation_guidance: Maintain continuous disclosure obligation. Keep market informed. Correct inaccurate information. Prevent rumors and speculation.

title: Supervision
implementation_guidance: Establish supervision framework. Assign supervisory responsibilities. Monitor employee activities. Review trading. Address violations.

title: Incident Reporting
implementation_guidance: Report market conduct violations to CMA. Report system failures. Disclose operational incidents. File incident reports promptly.

title: Periodic Reporting
implementation_guidance: Report to CMA: trading activity positions exposures. Submit timely. Ensure accuracy. Follow reporting formats.

title: Record Quality
implementation_guidance: Maintain complete accurate records. Enable audit trails. Ensure legibility. Protect from loss.

title: Record Keeping
implementation_guidance: Retain all trading communication client records for required period (typically 10 years). Ensure accessibility. Protect confidentiality.

title: Complaints Register
implementation_guidance: Record all complaints. Track resolution status. Analyze complaint trends. Report to management. Improve based on complaints.

title: Complaint Handling
implementation_guidance: Establish complaint procedures. Respond promptly. Investigate fairly. Resolve complaints. Escalate unresolved issues.

title: Client Communications
implementation_guidance: Communicate accurately with clients. Avoid misleading statements. Provide timely information. Document communications.

title: Advertising and Marketing
implementation_guidance: Ensure advertising is fair clear not misleading. Provide balanced presentation. Disclose risks. Approve advertising.

title: Client Assets
implementation_guidance: Hold client securities in client name or properly designated accounts. Prohibit unauthorized use. Maintain adequate insurance. Monitor custodians.

title: Employee Trading
implementation_guidance: Require pre-approval for employee trades. Implement blackout periods. Monitor employee trading. Prevent front running.

title: Inside Information
implementation_guidance: Prohibit trading on material non-public information. Maintain insider lists. Monitor insider trading. Report violations.

title: Market Manipulation
implementation_guidance: Prohibit wash trades fictitious transactions artificial prices. Monitor for manipulation. Investigate suspicious activity. Report manipulation.

title: False Rumors
implementation_guidance: Prohibit disseminating false misleading information. Verify information before sharing. Monitor communications. Address violations.

title: Short Selling
implementation_guidance: Comply with short selling regulations. Ensure securities availability for delivery. Monitor short positions. Report short sales.

title: Conflicts of Interest
implementation_guidance: Identify conflicts of interest. Disclose conflicts to clients. Manage or avoid conflicts. Maintain conflict register.

title: Order Aggregation
implementation_guidance: Establish aggregation policy. Aggregate fairly. Allocate pro rata. Disclose aggregation to clients.

title: Conflict Disclosure
implementation_guidance: Disclose all material conflicts. Provide clear disclosure. Obtain client consent. Document disclosures.

title: Investment Research
implementation_guidance: Separate research from trading and investment banking. Ensure research independence. Disclose conflicts in research. Prohibit undue pressure.

title: Research Independence
implementation_guidance: Compensate analysts independently from deals. Prohibit pre-publication review by banking. Disclose analyst holdings. Monitor independence.

title: Research Distribution
implementation_guidance: Distribute research fairly to all clients. Prohibit selective disclosure. Time-stamp research. Control research distribution.

title: Advisory Services
implementation_guidance: Provide suitable investment advice. Assess client needs. Disclose advisory fees. Document advice given.

title: Advice Provision
implementation_guidance: Base advice on client situation. Consider risk tolerance. Explain recommendations. Update advice when circumstances change.

title: Custody Services
implementation_guidance: Segregate client assets from firm assets. Safeguard client securities. Reconcile client accounts. Provide custody statements.

title: Activity Separation
implementation_guidance: Establish Chinese walls between conflicting business lines. Control information flows. Monitor wall effectiveness. Document separations.

title: Debt Controls
implementation_guidance: Authorize borrowings. Monitor debt covenants. Calculate interest correctly. Track maturities.

title: Investment Valuation
implementation_guidance: Use appropriate valuation methods. Obtain market prices. Document valuations. Review independently.

title: Investment Controls
implementation_guidance: Establish investment policy. Authorize investments. Monitor performance. Value investments correctly.

title: Authority Delegation
implementation_guidance: Define delegation framework. Assign authorities. Document delegations. Communicate clearly.

title: Integrity and Ethics
implementation_guidance: Establish code of ethics. Lead by example. Address unethical behavior. Foster ethical culture.

title: Disclosure Officer
implementation_guidance: Designate disclosure officer. Grant authority to ensure compliance. Coordinate disclosures. Liaise with CMA. Report to board.

title: Information Correction
implementation_guidance: Monitor market information and media. Correct inaccurate or misleading information promptly. Issue clarifications. Prevent misunderstandings.

title: Resolutions
implementation_guidance: Announce GA resolutions immediately. Include voting results. Disclose material decisions. Explain implications.

title: Insider Register
implementation_guidance: Maintain list of insiders with access to material information. Update regularly. Notify insiders of obligations. Monitor insider trading.

title: Capital Changes
description_ar: الإفصاح عن التغييرات في رأس المال
implementation_guidance: Disclose capital increases decreases. Include rights issues bonus shares share splits. Obtain shareholder approval. Report to CMA.

title: Material Contracts
implementation_guidance: Disclose material contracts agreements. Include value terms duration parties. Disclose contract modifications. Explain impact on business.

title: Principal Risks
implementation_guidance: Identify and disclose key risks: operational financial market strategic. Explain risk mitigation strategies. Update risk disclosures.

title: Objective Setting
implementation_guidance: Define strategic operational reporting compliance objectives. Align with mission. Communicate objectives. Monitor achievement.

title: Subsequent Events
implementation_guidance: Disclose material events after balance sheet date. Include events affecting financial position. Report before financial statement issuance.

title: Financial Forecasts
implementation_guidance: Disclose forecasts if provided. Include assumptions and basis. Update or withdraw if no longer valid. Explain variances.

title: Segment Reporting
implementation_guidance: Report financial information by business segment geographic segment. Apply IFRS 8. Explain segment basis. Reconcile to total.

title: Segment Performance
implementation_guidance: Provide segment revenues profits assets. Explain segment trends. Discuss segment outlook. Compare segment performance.

title: Settlements
implementation_guidance: Announce material settlements. Disclose settlement amount terms. Explain impact on financial position. Update resolution status.

title: Risk Identification
implementation_guidance: Identify internal and external risks. Consider operational financial compliance risks. Document risk universe.

title: General Assembly
implementation_guidance: Announce GA meeting at least 21 days in advance. Publish agenda. Disclose voting matters. Announce results after meeting.

title: Insider Dealings
implementation_guidance: Disclose director officer substantial shareholder transactions. Report within 2 business days. Include transaction details. Publish on Tadawul.

title: Dividends
implementation_guidance: Announce dividend declarations. Disclose dividend amount payment date record date. Provide dividend policy. Explain dividend decisions.

title: Commitments
implementation_guidance: Disclose material commitments and contingencies. Include guarantees pledges legal claims. Quantify potential impact. Update status.

title: Risk Management
implementation_guidance: Describe risk management framework. Explain risk governance. Disclose risk appetite. Provide risk reporting.

title: Legal Proceedings
implementation_guidance: Disclose material legal proceedings. Include claims against and by company. Provide status and potential impact. Update developments.

title: Material Developments
implementation_guidance: Announce material developments immediately: strategy changes management changes operational changes. Explain implications.

title: Profit Warnings
implementation_guidance: Warn of material profit deviation from forecasts. Announce as soon as known. Explain reasons for deviation. Provide revised expectations.

title: Fraud Assessment
implementation_guidance: Identify fraud schemes. Assess fraud likelihood. Consider fraud triangle: pressure opportunity rationalization. Implement antifraud controls.

title: Segregation of Duties
implementation_guidance: Separate authorization custody recording. Prevent single person control. Implement compensating controls where needed. Monitor violations.

title: Financial Disclosure
implementation_guidance: Disclose all material information. Follow disclosure requirements. Review disclosures. File timely.

title: Backup and Recovery
implementation_guidance: Backup critical data daily. Store backups offsite. Test recovery procedures. Document backup schedule.

title: Data Quality
implementation_guidance: Validate data accuracy. Implement data quality checks. Correct errors promptly. Monitor data quality.

title: Separate Evaluations
implementation_guidance: Conduct periodic control assessments. Test control effectiveness. Use internal audit. Engage external evaluators.

title: Information Security
implementation_guidance: Classify information. Encrypt sensitive data. Control access. Monitor security events.

title: Digital Services
implementation_guidance: Apply standard rate to electronically supplied services. Register non-resident suppliers. Use place of supply rules. Apply to streaming apps software. Track digital supplies.

title: Focus on Value
implementation_guidance: Focus on value for stakeholders. Understand customer needs. Deliver outcomes. Measure value. Optimize benefits.

title: Service Value System
implementation_guidance: Establish service value system (SVS). Define guiding principles. Enable value streams. Implement practices. Foster continual improvement.

title: Training
implementation_guidance: Provide risk management training. Build capability. Develop skills. Enhance awareness. Enable competence. Document training.

title: Risk Culture
implementation_guidance: Promote positive risk culture. Encourage risk awareness. Support informed risk-taking. Reward good practice. Embed in values.

title: Risk Audit
implementation_guidance: Conduct audits of risk management. Assess compliance. Review effectiveness. Identify gaps. Report findings. Implement improvements.

title: Event Review
implementation_guidance: Review after significant events or changes. Analyze events. Identify lessons. Update risk assessment. Improve process. Document learning.

title: Risk Response
implementation_guidance: Select risk responses: avoid reduce share accept. Develop action plans. Assign owners. Monitor implementation.

title: Revenue Recognition
implementation_guidance: Apply revenue recognition standards (IFRS 15). Identify performance obligations. Determine transaction price. Recognize revenue appropriately.

title: Sales Controls
implementation_guidance: Authorize sales transactions. Verify pricing. Record sales accurately. Control invoicing.

title: Collection Controls
implementation_guidance: Monitor receivables aging. Follow up on overdue accounts. Write off uncollectible amounts. Reconcile receipts.

title: Procurement Controls
implementation_guidance: Require purchase requisitions. Obtain competitive quotes. Approve purchases. Control purchase orders.

title: Vendor Selection
implementation_guidance: Establish vendor criteria. Evaluate vendor qualifications. Maintain approved vendor list. Monitor vendor performance.

title: Payment Controls
implementation_guidance: Verify goods/services received. Match invoices to POs. Approve payments. Prevent duplicate payments.

title: Financial Close
implementation_guidance: Define close timeline. Assign responsibilities. Perform close procedures. Review and approve.

title: Inventory Controls
implementation_guidance: Track inventory movements. Conduct physical counts. Reconcile to records. Value inventory correctly.

title: Fixed Asset Controls
implementation_guidance: Maintain asset register. Tag assets. Control asset acquisitions and disposals. Calculate depreciation.

title: Asset Inventory
implementation_guidance: Conduct physical asset verification periodically. Reconcile to register. Identify missing assets. Update records.

title: Cash Controls
implementation_guidance: Segregate cash handling. Reconcile bank accounts daily. Restrict access to cash. Control cash disbursements.

title: Bank Reconciliations
implementation_guidance: Reconcile all bank accounts monthly. Investigate reconciling items. Clear old items. Review independently.

title: Payroll Controls
implementation_guidance: Authorize employee changes. Verify hours worked. Calculate payroll accurately. Approve payroll.

title: Payroll Distribution
implementation_guidance: Use electronic transfers. Verify bank details. Control payroll distribution. Investigate unclaimed payments.

title: Physical Inventory
implementation_guidance: Count inventory at least annually. Investigate variances. Adjust records. Document count results.

title: Compliance Officer
implementation_guidance: Designate qualified compliance officer. Grant authority and independence. Report to board. Provide resources.

title: Accounting Estimates
implementation_guidance: Develop estimation methodologies. Document assumptions. Review estimates. Obtain approvals for significant estimates.

title: Financial Statement Preparation
implementation_guidance: Apply accounting standards (IFRS). Ensure accuracy and completeness. Review by qualified personnel. Obtain approvals.

title: Approval Controls
implementation_guidance: Require approvals for transactions. Define approval authorities. Implement dual authorization for high-risk. Document approvals.

title: Access Controls
description: Access controls for systems and data
implementation_guidance: Implement user authentication. Enforce least privilege. Control physical and logical access. Review access regularly.

title: Reconciliations
implementation_guidance: Reconcile accounts balances transactions. Investigate discrepancies. Document reconciliations. Review independently.

title: Supervisory Reviews
implementation_guidance: Review operational performance. Monitor key metrics. Investigate variances. Approve exceptions.

title: Information Systems
implementation_guidance: Implement IT general controls. Apply application controls. Ensure system security. Manage system changes.

title: Change Management
implementation_guidance: Control system changes. Test changes before production. Obtain approvals. Document changes. Enable rollback.

title: Ongoing Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Monitor control performance continuously. Use key indicators. Investigate anomalies. Report issues.

title: Deficiency Reporting
implementation_guidance: Identify control deficiencies. Classify severity. Report to management and board. Track remediation.

title: Agents
implementation_guidance: Agents/intermediaries responsible for withholding when paying non-residents. Apply WHT on behalf of principal. Remit to GAZT. Issue certificates. Document agency.

title: Penalties
implementation_guidance: Avoid penalties for: non-withholding late payment late filing. Penalties range 1-25% plus interest. Withhold correctly. Pay on time. File timely.

title: Iterate with Feedback
description_ar: التقدم بشكل تكراري مع التغذية الراجعة
implementation_guidance: Progress iteratively. Use feedback loops. Deliver incrementally. Adapt based on learning. Enable agility.

title: Start Where You Are
implementation_guidance: Start from current state. Assess what exists. Leverage current capabilities. Don't build from scratch. Use existing services.

title: Service Value Chain
implementation_guidance: Implement service value chain activities: plan improve engage design obtain build deliver support. Enable value creation. Connect activities.

title: Reduce Risk
implementation_guidance: Reduce risk likelihood or consequences. Implement controls. Mitigate impact. Apply safeguards. Monitor reduction.

title: Retain Risk
implementation_guidance: Retain risk by informed decision. Accept risk level. Prepare contingency. Monitor retained risks. Document retention.

title: Risk Evaluation
implementation_guidance: Evaluate risks by comparing analysis results with criteria. Prioritize risks. Support decisions. Determine need for treatment. Document evaluation.

title: Think Holistically
implementation_guidance: Think holistically about services. Consider entire system. Integrate components. Understand dependencies. Enable end-to-end view.

title: Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Monitor events continuously. Detect anomalies. Generate alerts. Log events. Enable response.

title: Knowledge Base
implementation_guidance: Maintain knowledge base. Document solutions. Enable search. Keep current. Measure usage.

title: Knowledge Management
implementation_guidance: Manage knowledge effectively. Capture knowledge. Organize information. Enable sharing. Maintain knowledge base.

title: Supplier Performance
implementation_guidance: Monitor supplier performance. Measure against SLAs. Review regularly. Address issues. Improve collaboration.

title: Supplier Management
implementation_guidance: Manage supplier relationships. Evaluate suppliers. Negotiate contracts. Monitor performance. Manage risks.

title: Availability
implementation_guidance: Ensure service availability meets requirements. Implement redundancy. Enable failover. Monitor availability. Address outages.

title: Capacity Planning
implementation_guidance: Plan capacity proactively. Analyze trends. Forecast demand. Size appropriately. Prevent shortages.

title: Fulfillment
implementation_guidance: Fulfill service requests efficiently. Use standard procedures. Automate where possible. Meet SLAs. Confirm completion.

title: Service Information
implementation_guidance: Provide service information. Describe capabilities. Specify SLAs. Show pricing. Enable decisions.

title: Periodic Review
implementation_guidance: Conduct periodic reviews of risk management. Review framework and process. Assess effectiveness. Identify improvements. Update approach.

title: Risk Reports
implementation_guidance: Produce risk reports for stakeholders. Summarize risk profile. Report significant risks. Communicate treatments. Provide insights.

title: Risk Register
implementation_guidance: Maintain risk register documenting identified risks. Record risks. Track treatments. Update regularly. Enable reporting.

title: Risk Policy
implementation_guidance: Establish documented risk management policy. Define approach. Set objectives. Assign responsibilities. Communicate policy.

title: Consultation
implementation_guidance: Consult stakeholders throughout risk management process. Seek input. Gather expertise. Enable participation. Consider views. Document consultation.

title: External Communication
implementation_guidance: Communicate externally about risks. Engage stakeholders. Meet requirements. Build confidence. Manage expectations. Document communications.

title: Internal Communication
implementation_guidance: Ensure effective internal communication about risk. Share information. Consult stakeholders. Report upward. Enable dialogue. Foster awareness.

title: Recording and Reporting
implementation_guidance: Record and report risk management activities and outcomes. Document process. Maintain records. Communicate results. Report to stakeholders. Enable learning.

title: Evaluation
implementation_guidance: Periodically evaluate risk management framework. Measure effectiveness. Assess suitability. Review performance. Identify improvements. Report results.

title: Improvement
implementation_guidance: Continually improve framework. Adapt to changes. Address deficiencies. Enhance capabilities. Implement improvements. Monitor effectiveness.

title: Scope and Context
implementation_guidance: Establish scope context and criteria for risk management. Define objectives. Identify stakeholders. Consider internal external factors. Establish criteria.

title: Risk Identification
implementation_guidance: Identify risks that could affect objectives. Find recognize describe risks. Use appropriate tools. Involve stakeholders. Document risks.

title: Risk Analysis
implementation_guidance: Analyze identified risks. Understand nature and characteristics. Determine sources causes. Assess consequences and likelihood. Document analysis.

title: Likelihood
implementation_guidance: Determine likelihood of risks occurring. Use qualitative or quantitative methods. Consider frequency probability. Assess likelihood. Document determination.

title: Collaborate
implementation_guidance: Foster collaboration. Promote transparency. Share information. Enable communication. Work across boundaries.

title: Consequences
implementation_guidance: Determine potential consequences of risks. Consider multiple types of consequences. Assess severity. Evaluate impact. Document consequences.

title: Risk Treatment
implementation_guidance: Select and implement risk treatment options. Avoid reduce share retain. Develop plans. Assign responsibilities. Implement treatment. Monitor effectiveness.

title: Avoid Risk
implementation_guidance: Avoid risk by not starting or continuing activity. Decide not to proceed. Withdraw from activity. Change approach. Eliminate source.

title: Share Risk
implementation_guidance: Share risk with other parties. Transfer risk through insurance contracts outsourcing. Allocate risk. Maintain oversight.

title: Monitoring and Review
implementation_guidance: Monitor and review risk management process and outcomes. Track implementations. Detect changes. Review effectiveness. Report performance.

title: Risk Identification
implementation_guidance: Identify sources of risk. Recognize internal external sources. Consider all activities. Identify events. Document sources.

title: Optimize
implementation_guidance: Optimize processes. Automate where valuable. Eliminate waste. Improve efficiency. Use technology.

title: Information Security
implementation_guidance: Manage information security. Implement controls. Protect confidentiality integrity availability. Monitor threats. Respond to incidents.

title: Recovery
implementation_guidance: Develop recovery plans. Define RTOs and RPOs. Enable quick recovery. Test procedures. Document recovery.

title: Continuity
implementation_guidance: Manage service continuity. Assess risks. Develop continuity plans. Test plans. Maintain readiness.

title: Availability Management
implementation_guidance: Manage service availability. Define requirements. Design for availability. Monitor uptime. Improve reliability.

title: Capacity Management
implementation_guidance: Manage capacity and performance. Monitor utilization. Forecast needs. Plan capacity. Optimize resources.

title: Service Requests
implementation_guidance: Manage service requests. Log all requests. Prioritize appropriately. Fulfill requests. Track status.

title: Service Catalog
implementation_guidance: Maintain service catalog. Document all services. Describe offerings. Enable self-service. Keep current.

title: Targets
implementation_guidance: Define service level targets. Set measurable objectives. Align with needs. Enable monitoring. Document agreements.

title: Incident Classification
implementation_guidance: Classify incidents by type. Prioritize by impact and urgency. Assign appropriately. Track status. Enable resolution.

title: Problem Analysis
implementation_guidance: Analyze problems systematically. Investigate root causes. Use problem-solving techniques. Document findings. Identify trends.

title: Change Management
implementation_guidance: Manage all changes. Assess risks and benefits. Obtain approvals. Plan implementation. Review post-implementation.

title: Release Management
implementation_guidance: Manage releases effectively. Plan deployments. Test thoroughly. Coordinate rollout. Enable rollback.

title: Asset Management
implementation_guidance: Manage IT assets throughout lifecycle. Track ownership. Maintain inventory. Optimize usage. Control costs.

title: Change Assessment
implementation_guidance: Assess change requests. Evaluate impact. Consider risks. Determine priority. Make authorization decisions.

title: Apply Process
implementation_guidance: Apply risk management process across organization. Implement at all levels. Integrate into projects. Include in operations. Enable application.

title: Intermediaries
implementation_guidance: Intermediaries must withhold on pass-through payments. Determine withholding obligation. Apply correct rate. Account to GAZT. Document intermediary role.

title: Information backup
description: Backup copies of information shall be maintained
description_ar: يجب الاحتفاظ بنسخ احتياطية من المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Backup critical data and systems. Implement 3-2-1 strategy. Automate backups. Test restores.

title: Monitoring activities
description: Networks systems and applications shall be monitored
implementation_guidance: Monitor for anomalies intrusions performance issues. Generate alerts. Investigate incidents.

title: Equipment siting and protection
description: Equipment shall be protected from physical and environmental threats
description_ar: يجب حماية المعدات من التهديدات الفيزيائية والبيئية
implementation_guidance: Site equipment appropriately. Protect from hazards. Use racks cabinets. Secure cabling.

title: Security of assets off-premises
implementation_guidance: Protect mobile devices and equipment outside premises. Require encryption. Use VPN. Track assets.

title: Cabling security
description: Cables shall be protected from interception or damage
description_ar: يجب حماية الكابلات من الاعتراض أو الضرر
implementation_guidance: Protect network and power cables. Use conduits. Avoid unauthorized access. Label cables. Separate power/data.

title: Implementation
implementation_guidance: Implement risk management framework. Develop implementation plan. Apply process. Ensure ownership. Provide training. Enable implementation.

title: Service Level Management
implementation_guidance: Manage service levels. Define SLAs. Monitor performance. Report on achievement. Review regularly.

title: Incident Management
implementation_guidance: Manage incidents effectively. Restore service quickly. Minimize impact. Log all incidents. Escalate appropriately.

title: Problem Management
implementation_guidance: Manage problems proactively. Identify root causes. Implement permanent fixes. Prevent recurrence. Document solutions.

title: Keep It Simple
implementation_guidance: Keep things simple. Use minimum steps. Avoid complexity. Make practical. Enable usability.

title: Deployment
implementation_guidance: Deploy releases safely. Follow deployment plans. Verify success. Monitor performance. Address issues.

title: Configuration Management
implementation_guidance: Manage configuration items. Maintain CMDB. Track relationships. Control changes. Enable reporting.

title: CMDB
implementation_guidance: Maintain accurate CMDB. Record all CIs. Update regularly. Verify accuracy. Enable queries.

title: Asset Lifecycle
implementation_guidance: Manage asset lifecycle. Plan acquisition. Track deployment. Maintain assets. Dispose properly.

title: Events
implementation_guidance: Manage events effectively. Filter events. Correlate information. Determine significance. Take action.

title: Communication
implementation_guidance: Establish communication and consultation mechanisms. Enable internal and external communication. Facilitate dialogue. Report on risks. Share information.

title: Redundancy of information processing facilities
description: Information processing facilities shall be implemented with sufficient redundancy
description_ar: يجب تطبيق معدات معالجة المعلومات بتكرار كافٍ
implementation_guidance: Implement redundancy for critical systems. Use clustering load balancing. Eliminate single points of failure.

title: Data leakage prevention
description: Data leakage prevention measures shall be applied
description_ar: يجب تطبيق تدابير منع تسرب البيانات
implementation_guidance: Implement DLP controls. Monitor data exfiltration. Block unauthorized transfers. Alert on violations.

title: Data masking
description: Data masking shall be used according to policy
description_ar: يجب استخدام إخفاء البيانات حسب السياسة
implementation_guidance: Mask sensitive data in non-production environments. Use realistic but fictional data. Document masking.

title: Information deletion
description: Information stored in systems shall be deleted when no longer required
description_ar: يجب حذف المعلومات المخزنة في الأنظمة عند عدم الحاجة
implementation_guidance: Define retention periods. Delete data when no longer needed. Use secure deletion methods. Verify deletion.

title: Configuration management
description: Configurations shall be established documented and controlled
implementation_guidance: Define configuration baselines. Document configurations. Control changes. Audit compliance with baselines.

title: Management of technical vulnerabilities
description: Information about technical vulnerabilities shall be obtained
description_ar: يجب الحصول على معلومات حول الثغرات التقنية
implementation_guidance: Monitor vulnerability announcements. Scan for vulnerabilities. Assess risks. Patch critical vulnerabilities promptly.

title: Protection against malware
description: Protection against malware shall be implemented
description_ar: يجب تطبيق الحماية من البرمجيات الخبيثة
implementation_guidance: Deploy antivirus/antimalware. Update regularly. Scan all files. Block malicious traffic. Quarantine threats.

title: Capacity management
description: Use of resources shall be monitored and adjusted
implementation_guidance: Monitor resource utilization. Forecast capacity needs. Plan upgrades. Optimize performance.

title: Secure authentication
description: Secure authentication technologies shall be implemented
implementation_guidance: Implement strong authentication. Use MFA for sensitive access. Enforce password complexity. Support SSO.

title: Access to source code
description: Access to source code shall be controlled
description_ar: يجب التحكم في الوصول إلى كود المصدر
implementation_guidance: Restrict source code access. Use version control with authentication. Log access. Separate dev/prod.

title: Information access restriction
description: Access to information and other associated assets shall be restricted
description_ar: يجب تقييد الوصول إلى المعلومات والموارد
implementation_guidance: Implement access controls. Grant based on need-to-know. Use RBAC. Review access regularly.

title: Privileged access rights
description: Allocation and use of privileged access rights shall be restricted
description_ar: يجب تقييد تخصيص واستخدام حقوق الوصول المميزة
implementation_guidance: Restrict privileged access. Use separate admin accounts. Require additional authentication. Monitor privileged use.

title: Equipment maintenance
implementation_guidance: Maintain equipment per manufacturer specs. Use authorized service providers. Log maintenance. Supervise.

title: Information security event reporting
description: Personnel shall report observed information security events
description_ar: يجب على الموظفين الإبلاغ عن أحداث أمن المعلومات الملحوظة
implementation_guidance: Establish reporting channels. Encourage reporting. Protect reporters. Provide clear procedures.

title: Physical security perimeters
description: Security perimeters shall be defined and protected
