implementation_guidance: Define security perimeters. Protect with barriers. Control entry points. Monitor perimeter.

title: Physical entry
description: Secure areas shall be protected by appropriate entry controls
description_ar: يجب حماية المناطق الآمنة بضوابط دخول مناسبة
implementation_guidance: Implement entry controls: badges biometrics guards. Log entries. Escort visitors. Review access.

title: Physical security monitoring
description: Premises shall be continuously monitored for unauthorized physical access
description_ar: يجب مراقبة المباني بشكل مستمر من الوصول الفيزيائي غير المصرح
implementation_guidance: Install CCTV. Monitor continuously. Record footage. Retain recordings. Review incidents.

title: Protection against physical and environmental threats
description: Protection against physical and environmental threats shall be designed
description_ar: يجب الحماية من التهديدات الفيزيائية والبيئية
implementation_guidance: Protect against fire flood power failure environmental threats. Install fire suppression UPS climate control.

title: Clear desk and clear screen
description: Clear desk and clear screen rules shall be applied
description_ar: يجب تطبيق قاعدة المكتب الواضح والشاشة الواضحة
implementation_guidance: Implement clear desk policy. Lock documents when unattended. Lock screens. Shred confidential waste.

title: Supporting utilities
description: Information processing facilities shall be protected from power failures
description_ar: يجب حماية معدات المعلومات من انقطاع الكهرباء وغيرها
implementation_guidance: Install UPS for critical systems. Provide backup generators. Test regularly. Monitor power quality.

title: Working in secure areas
description: Security measures for working in secure areas shall be designed
description_ar: يجب تصميم وتطبيق تدابير أمنية للعمل في المناطق الآمنة
implementation_guidance: Define secure area work procedures. Restrict unsupervised access. Prohibit devices. Log activities.

title: Clock synchronization
description: Clocks of information processing systems shall be synchronized
description_ar: يجب مزامنة ساعات أنظمة معالجة المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Synchronize clocks using NTP. Use authoritative time source. Verify synchronization. Log time changes.

title: Resources
implementation_guidance: Allocate appropriate resources to risk management. Provide people expertise time budget technology. Ensure adequacy. Enable effectiveness.

title: Commitment
implementation_guidance: Articulate risk management commitment. Define policy. Establish objectives. Assign accountability. Allocate resources. Communicate commitment.

title: Framework Design
implementation_guidance: Design risk management framework. Understand organization and context. Articulate commitment. Assign roles. Allocate resources. Establish communication.

title: Leadership and Commitment
implementation_guidance: Ensure management demonstrates leadership and commitment to risk management. Integrate into governance. Allocate resources. Communicate importance. Set direction.

title: Secure disposal or re-use of equipment
title_ar: التخلص الآمن أو إعادة استخدام المعدات
description: All items of equipment shall be verified to ensure data is removed
description_ar: يجب التحقق من حذف البيانات من المعدات قبل التخلص منها
implementation_guidance: Wipe or destroy storage media before disposal. Use certified methods. Verify data removal. Document disposal.

title: Remote working
description: Security measures shall be implemented when personnel work remotely
description_ar: يجب تطبيق تدابير أمنية عندما يعمل الموظفون عن بعد
implementation_guidance: Define remote work policy. Require VPN. Encrypt devices. Control access. Provide secure equipment.

title: Securing offices rooms and facilities
description: Physical security for offices rooms and facilities shall be designed
description_ar: يجب تصميم الأمن الفيزيائي للمكاتب والغرف والمرافق
implementation_guidance: Design physical security. Protect based on classification. Lock offices. Secure server rooms. Control access.

title: Installation of software on operational systems
description: Procedures shall be in place to control software installation
description_ar: يجب وضع إجراءات للتحكم في تثبيت البرامج
implementation_guidance: Control software installation. Require approval. Test before deployment. Use application whitelisting.

title: Roles
implementation_guidance: Assign organizational roles authorities and responsibilities. Define governance structure. Assign risk ownership. Delegate authority. Enable accountability.

title: Understand Organization
implementation_guidance: Understand organization and its context. Examine internal external environment. Identify stakeholders. Define objectives. Assess culture.

title: Integration
implementation_guidance: Integrate risk management throughout organization. Embed in all processes. Include in decision-making. Align with objectives. Enable integration.

title: Continual Improvement
implementation_guidance: Continually improve risk management. Learn from experience. Share knowledge. Develop capabilities. Enhance effectiveness.

title: Human Factors
implementation_guidance: Consider human and cultural factors. Recognize capabilities perceptions. Address culture. Enable behavioral aspects. Support risk culture.

title: Best Information
implementation_guidance: Base risk management on best available information. Use historical data. Consider forecasts. Recognize limitations. Update as information improves.

title: Dynamic
implementation_guidance: Recognize risks change over time. Monitor changes. Anticipate emerging risks. Respond to events. Update continuously.

title: Inclusiveness
implementation_guidance: Ensure appropriate and timely involvement of stakeholders. Involve relevant parties. Enable diverse perspectives. Consider knowledge. Improve buy-in.

title: Customization
implementation_guidance: Customize risk management to context and objectives. Tailor to organization. Consider internal external factors. Align with scope. Enable appropriateness.

title: Structured Process
implementation_guidance: Apply structured comprehensive approach to risk management. Use consistent methodology. Enable comparable results. Improve effectiveness. Document process.

title: Integration
implementation_guidance: Integrate risk management into all activities. Embed in governance. Include in processes. Align with culture. Enable holistic approach.

title: Value Creation
implementation_guidance: Ensure risk management creates and protects value. Contribute to objectives. Improve performance. Encourage innovation. Support decision-making.

title: Protection of information systems during audit testing
title_ar: حماية أنظمة المعلومات أثناء اختبار التدقيق
description: Audit tests shall be planned and agreed
description_ar: يجب التخطيط للاختبارات التدقيقية والاتفاق عليها
implementation_guidance: Plan audit tests. Obtain approvals. Minimize impact. Use read-only access where possible. Monitor audit activities.

title: Security of network services
description: Security mechanisms shall be identified implemented and monitored
description_ar: يجب تحديد وتنفيذ ومراقبة آليات الأمن
implementation_guidance: Secure network services. Define security requirements. Implement controls. Monitor compliance.

title: Segregation of networks
description: Groups of information services shall be segregated
implementation_guidance: Segment networks by security zone: internet DMZ internal. Use VLANs firewalls. Control inter-zone traffic.

title: Web filtering
description: Access to external websites shall be managed
description_ar: يجب إدارة الوصول إلى مواقع الويب الخارجية
implementation_guidance: Implement web filtering. Block malicious and inappropriate sites. Log web access. Monitor for threats.

title: Use of cryptography
description: Rules for use of cryptography shall be defined and implemented
description_ar: يجب تحديد وتنفيذ قواعد لاستخدام التشفير
implementation_guidance: Define cryptographic policy. Specify approved algorithms. Encrypt data at rest and in transit.

title: Secure development lifecycle
description: Rules for secure development of software and systems shall be established
description_ar: يجب وضع قواعد لتطوير البرامج والأنظمة الآمنة
implementation_guidance: Implement secure SDLC. Include security in all phases. Conduct security reviews. Train developers.

title: Use of privileged utility programs
description: Use of utility programs that might override controls shall be restricted
description_ar: يجب تقييد استخدام برامج المساعدة التي قد تتجاوز الضوابط
implementation_guidance: Restrict privileged utility use. Require approval. Log usage. Separate from production systems.

title: Application security requirements
description: Information security requirements shall be identified and integrated
description_ar: يجب تحديد متطلبات أمن المعلومات ودمجها
implementation_guidance: Define application security requirements. Include in design. Implement security controls. Test thoroughly.

title: Secure coding
description: Secure coding principles shall be applied
implementation_guidance: Define secure coding standards. Avoid common vulnerabilities (OWASP Top 10). Conduct code reviews. Use SAST.

title: Validation
implementation_guidance: Validate services meet requirements. Test thoroughly. Verify functionality. Ensure quality. Obtain acceptance.

title: Transport Safety
implementation_guidance: Ensure transport safety. Conduct safety checks. Provide seatbelts. Train supervisors. Monitor routes.

title: School Transport
implementation_guidance: Provide safe school transportation. Use licensed buses. Employ qualified drivers. Maintain vehicles. Supervise students.

title: Cyber Security
implementation_guidance: Secure educational IT systems. Protect student data. Filter content. Monitor usage. Comply with regulations.

title: Educational Technology
implementation_guidance: Use educational technology effectively. Provide digital resources. Enable online learning. Train teachers. Ensure access.

title: Inclusion
implementation_guidance: Enable educational inclusion. Adapt curriculum. Provide support services. Train teachers. Monitor progress.

title: Special Needs
implementation_guidance: Support students with special needs. Assess needs. Provide accommodations. Train staff. Enable inclusion.

title: Engagement
implementation_guidance: Engage parents in education. Invite to events. Seek feedback. Enable involvement. Foster partnership.

title: Discipline
implementation_guidance: Implement fair discipline. Use progressive approach. Document incidents. Involve parents. Support improvement.

title: Maintenance
implementation_guidance: Maintain educational facilities. Conduct regular maintenance. Repair promptly. Ensure safety. Keep records.

title: EMR Strategy
implementation_guidance: Develop EMR strategic plan. Select appropriate system. Plan implementation phases. Budget for EMR. Ensure leadership support.

title: Development
implementation_guidance: Develop educational programs. Update curriculum. Enhance methods. Incorporate technology. Measure outcomes.

title: Academic Records
implementation_guidance: Maintain accurate academic records. Record grades. Track progress. Issue transcripts. Protect confidentiality.

title: Certificates
implementation_guidance: Issue certificates properly. Verify completion. Ensure accuracy. Prevent fraud. Maintain records.

title: Reporting
implementation_guidance: Report to MOE as required. Submit statistics. Provide student data. Report incidents. Respond to requests.

title: Improvement
implementation_guidance: Implement continual improvement. Analyze results. Identify opportunities. Take action. Measure effectiveness.

title: Nutrition
implementation_guidance: Provide healthy nutrition. Offer balanced meals. Ensure food safety. Accommodate dietary needs. Monitor quality.

title: Values
implementation_guidance: Promote positive values. Teach Islamic values. Foster citizenship. Encourage respect. Build character.

title: Fees
implementation_guidance: Manage tuition fees transparently. Communicate costs. Apply fairly. Provide receipts. Enable payment plans.

title: Budget
implementation_guidance: Manage budget responsibly. Allocate resources. Control spending. Maintain records. Report financially.

title: Staff
implementation_guidance: Manage staff effectively. Recruit qualified personnel. Provide training. Evaluate performance. Maintain compliance.

title: Staff Rights
implementation_guidance: Respect staff rights. Comply with labor law. Provide benefits. Ensure safety. Address grievances.

title: Security testing in development and acceptance
description: Security testing processes shall be defined and implemented
description_ar: يجب تحديد وتنفيذ عمليات اختبار الأمن
implementation_guidance: Test security in development and acceptance. Perform functional security testing vulnerability assessment penetration testing.

title: Separation of development test and production environments
description: Development test and production environments shall be separated
description_ar: يجب فصل بيئات التطوير والاختبار والإنتاج
implementation_guidance: Maintain separate environments. Restrict production access. Use test data in non-production. Control migration.

title: Change management
description: Changes to information processing facilities shall be subject to change management
description_ar: يجب التحكم في التغييرات على تسهيلات معالجة المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Implement formal change management. Require approval. Test changes. Document. Enable rollback.

title: Test information
description: Test information shall be selected protected and controlled
description_ar: يجب اختيار وحماية والتحكم في معلومات الاختبار
implementation_guidance: Use non-production data for testing. Mask sensitive data. Delete test data after use. Control access.

title: Secure system architecture and engineering principles
description: Principles for secure system architecture shall be established
description_ar: يجب وضع مبادئ معمارية النظام الآمن
implementation_guidance: Define secure architecture principles. Apply defense-in-depth. Use secure design patterns. Review architectures.

title: Service Design
implementation_guidance: Design services effectively. Consider all aspects. Meet requirements. Enable supportability. Document design.

title: Communication
implementation_guidance: Communicate regularly with parents. Provide updates. Share progress. Address concerns. Enable engagement.

title: Conduct
implementation_guidance: Establish conduct standards. Communicate expectations. Apply consistently. Address violations. Support positive behavior.

title: Absences
implementation_guidance: Manage student absences. Investigate prolonged absence. Follow up with parents. Support return. Document reasons.

title: Attendance
implementation_guidance: Track student attendance accurately. Record daily. Monitor absences. Contact parents. Report to MOE.

title: Examinations
implementation_guidance: Manage examinations securely. Ensure integrity. Prevent cheating. Maintain confidentiality. Document results.

title: Assessment
implementation_guidance: Conduct fair student assessment. Use valid methods. Grade objectively. Provide feedback. Maintain records.

title: Medical Emergencies
implementation_guidance: Manage medical emergencies. Train staff in first aid. Maintain medical supplies. Contact parents. Coordinate with hospitals.

title: Health
implementation_guidance: Maintain school health standards. Provide health services. Maintain clinic. Train health staff. Monitor student health.

title: Compliance Reporting
implementation_guidance: Demonstrate compliance with consumer protection law. Prepare for inspections. Maintain compliance records. Address violations. Implement corrections.

title: Penalties
implementation_guidance: Avoid penalties for consumer protection violations. Comply with all requirements. Address complaints. Fix violations. Don't repeat offenses.

title: Violations
implementation_guidance: Address consumer protection violations promptly. Investigate causes. Implement corrections. Prevent recurrence. Document remediation.

title: Educational Licensing
implementation_guidance: Obtain educational license from Ministry of Education. Meet requirements. Submit documentation. Pass inspection. Renew annually.

title: Accreditation
implementation_guidance: Obtain academic accreditation. Meet quality standards. Submit for review. Maintain accreditation. Undergo periodic review.

title: Curriculum
implementation_guidance: Follow approved curriculum. Teach required subjects. Meet educational standards. Use approved materials. Document curriculum delivery.

title: Activities
implementation_guidance: Provide extracurricular activities. Offer sports and arts. Enable participation. Ensure safety. Supervise activities.

title: Content
implementation_guidance: Ensure quality educational content. Align with standards. Update regularly. Review appropriateness. Ensure accuracy.

title: Professional Development
implementation_guidance: Provide teacher professional development. Offer training. Support certification. Enable skill development. Measure effectiveness.

title: Admission
implementation_guidance: Establish fair admission policies. Define criteria. Apply consistently. Don't discriminate. Communicate clearly.

title: Student Data
implementation_guidance: Protect student personal data. Comply with PDPL. Limit access. Obtain parent consent. Secure information.

title: Safety
implementation_guidance: Ensure student safety. Implement safety measures. Supervise students. Secure facilities. Conduct drills.

title: Protection
implementation_guidance: Protect students from harm. Prevent bullying. Address abuse. Train staff. Report incidents.

title: Facilities
implementation_guidance: Provide adequate educational facilities. Meet space requirements. Ensure safety. Maintain cleanliness. Provide proper equipment.

title: Teachers
implementation_guidance: Employ qualified teachers. Verify credentials. Require degrees and certifications. Check background. Maintain teacher records.

title: Reporting
implementation_guidance: Report to MOCI as required. Notify of safety issues. Report non-compliances. Submit required information. Respond to MOCI requests.

title: Field Trips
implementation_guidance: Organize safe field trips. Obtain parent permission. Ensure supervision. Provide transportation. Manage risks.

title: Cafeteria
implementation_guidance: Manage cafeteria properly. Ensure hygiene. Offer healthy options. Control pricing. Supervise operations.

title: Test Results
implementation_guidance: Deliver results to EMR automatically. Flag abnormal results. Alert on critical values. Ensure result review. Track result acknowledgment.

title: Barcode Scanning
implementation_guidance: Scan patient wristband. Scan medication barcode. Verify match. Alert on mismatch. Document scanning.

title: Electronic Medication Administration
implementation_guidance: Deploy electronic medication administration record. Use barcode scanning. Verify five rights electronically. Document administration in real-time. Reduce medication errors.

title: Medication Alerts
implementation_guidance: Alert for drug-drug interactions. Warn about allergies. Check renal/hepatic dosing. Identify contraindications. Prevent errors.

title: Clinical Decision Support
implementation_guidance: Implement CDS alerts. Check drug interactions allergies duplicate orders. Provide dosing guidance. Alert on critical values.

title: Computerized Physician Order Entry
implementation_guidance: Deploy CPOE for all orders. Eliminate handwritten orders. Include medications labs imaging procedures. Ensure order clarity.

title: Order Sets
implementation_guidance: Develop evidence-based order sets. Standardize common orders. Include best practices. Enable modification. Monitor usage.

title: Templates
implementation_guidance: Create specialty-specific templates. Standardize documentation. Include required elements. Enable customization. Update templates regularly.

title: Data Entry
implementation_guidance: Provide structured data entry. Use templates and order sets. Enable copy-forward functionality. Provide voice recognition. Minimize free text.

title: Workflow Configuration
implementation_guidance: Map current clinical workflows. Design EMR workflows. Minimize clicks. Reduce documentation burden. Enable efficiency.

title: System Design
implementation_guidance: Design user-friendly EMR interface. Configure workflows to match clinical processes. Customize templates. Enable clinical decision support. Optimize usability.

title: EMR Implementation
implementation_guidance: Deploy comprehensive EMR system. Include all clinical departments. Ensure interoperability. Train all users. Go-live with proper planning.

title: Innovation
implementation_guidance: Foster educational innovation. Encourage creativity. Adopt new methods. Support initiatives. Enable experimentation.

title: Evacuation
implementation_guidance: Develop evacuation plans. Mark exits. Conduct drills. Train staff. Ensure readiness.

title: Emergencies
implementation_guidance: Manage emergencies effectively. Develop emergency plans. Conduct drills. Train staff. Coordinate with authorities.

title: Regulatory Compliance
implementation_guidance: Comply with MOE regulations. Maintain licenses. Meet standards. Submit reports. Pass inspections.

title: Quality
implementation_guidance: Manage educational quality. Set quality standards. Monitor performance. Gather feedback. Improve continuously.

title: Discounts
implementation_guidance: Provide genuine discounts. Show original and sale price. Don't inflate before discounting. Honor discount terms. Communicate clearly.

title: Fair Practices
implementation_guidance: Engage in fair trade practices. Avoid deception. No misleading advertising. Honest representation. Ethical conduct.

title: Freedom of Choice
implementation_guidance: Enable consumer choice. Avoid forced bundling. Provide alternatives. Don't coerce purchases. Respect preferences.

title: Deployment Management
implementation_guidance: Manage deployments systematically. Plan rollouts. Coordinate activities. Minimize disruption. Verify success.

title: Resources
implementation_guidance: Provide educational resources. Supply materials. Enable access. Maintain equipment. Update resources.

title: National Identity
implementation_guidance: Promote Saudi national identity. Celebrate national days. Teach history. Foster pride. Build loyalty.

title: Children's Products
implementation_guidance: Ensure children's products are safe. Test for safety. Avoid choking hazards. Use safe materials. Comply with toy standards.

title: Child Protection
implementation_guidance: Protect children in marketing. Avoid exploiting children. No deceptive child advertising. Ensure product safety for children. Don't target young children.

title: Competition
implementation_guidance: Support competitive market. Avoid anti-competitive practices. Provide variety. Enable price comparison. Foster competition.

title: Transparency
implementation_guidance: Be transparent in dealings. Disclose material information. Avoid hidden charges. Explain terms clearly. Provide complete disclosure.

title: Safety Right
implementation_guidance: Provide safe products and services. Eliminate hazards. Warn of risks. Comply with safety standards. Recall unsafe products.

title: Satisfaction
implementation_guidance: Measure customer satisfaction. Conduct surveys. Analyze feedback. Take action. Improve satisfaction.

title: Continual Improvement
implementation_guidance: Drive continual improvement. Identify opportunities. Implement improvements. Measure effectiveness. Foster culture.

title: Application Management
implementation_guidance: Manage applications throughout lifecycle. Develop maintain support applications. Ensure functionality. Optimize performance.

title: Infrastructure Management
implementation_guidance: Manage IT infrastructure. Maintain systems. Ensure reliability. Optimize performance. Control configuration.

title: Architecture
implementation_guidance: Design service architecture. Define components. Specify interfaces. Enable integration. Maintain standards.

title: Service Portfolio
implementation_guidance: Manage service portfolio. Define services. Assess value. Prioritize investments. Optimize portfolio.

title: Lifecycle
implementation_guidance: Manage service lifecycle. Plan development. Transition services. Operate effectively. Retire appropriately.

title: Financial Management
implementation_guidance: Manage service finances. Budget appropriately. Track costs. Charge for services. Optimize spending.

title: Costing
implementation_guidance: Calculate service costs accurately. Allocate costs. Determine pricing. Enable transparency. Support decisions.

title: Workforce Management
implementation_guidance: Manage workforce effectively. Plan capacity. Schedule appropriately. Develop skills. Maintain morale.

title: Integrity
implementation_guidance: Maintain commercial integrity. Honor commitments. Fulfill promises. Keep agreements. Act in good faith.

title: Competencies
implementation_guidance: Develop workforce competencies. Assess skills. Provide training. Enable certification. Track development.

title: Risk Mitigation
implementation_guidance: Mitigate service risks. Implement controls. Reduce likelihood. Minimize impact. Monitor effectiveness.

title: Project Management
implementation_guidance: Manage service projects. Plan projects. Execute effectively. Monitor progress. Deliver outcomes.

title: Delivery
implementation_guidance: Deliver projects successfully. Meet objectives. Control scope. Manage changes. Close properly.

title: Measurement
implementation_guidance: Measure service performance. Define metrics. Collect data. Analyze results. Report findings.

title: Indicators
implementation_guidance: Define and monitor KPIs. Align with objectives. Track performance. Enable insights. Drive improvement.

title: Information Right
implementation_guidance: Provide accurate complete information about products/services. Disclose prices terms conditions. Use clear language. Provide in Arabic. Enable informed decisions.

title: Consumer Rights
implementation_guidance: Ensure consumer right to safety information choice fair treatment compensation. Respect consumer rights. Handle complaints fairly. Provide redress. Educate consumers.

title: Customer Experience
implementation_guidance: Manage customer experience. Gather feedback. Measure satisfaction. Address concerns. Improve experience.

title: Improvement Register
implementation_guidance: Maintain improvement register. Log opportunities. Track initiatives. Measure benefits. Close improvements.

title: Licenses
implementation_guidance: Manage software licenses. Track usage. Ensure compliance. Avoid violations. Optimize licensing.

title: Software Management
implementation_guidance: Manage software assets. Control licenses. Track deployments. Ensure compliance. Optimize costs.

title: Development
implementation_guidance: Develop applications effectively. Follow methodologies. Ensure quality. Test thoroughly. Document code.

title: Platform Management
implementation_guidance: Manage technology platforms. Maintain availability. Apply patches. Monitor performance. Ensure security.

title: Shipping
implementation_guidance: Ship products safely. Use appropriate packaging. Insure shipments. Track shipment. Handle damaged deliveries.

title: Payment Security
implementation_guidance: Implement payment security measures. Encrypt payment data. Comply with PCI-DSS. Tokenize card data. Monitor transactions.

title: Privacy
implementation_guidance: Protect consumer personal data per PDPL. Obtain consent for data use. Secure consumer information. Don't share without permission. Enable data rights.

title: Halal
implementation_guidance: Ensure food products are Halal. Obtain Halal certification. Source Halal ingredients. Prevent contamination. Label Halal products.

title: Age-Restricted Products
implementation_guidance: Control sale of age-restricted products. Verify age before sale. Don't sell to minors. Train staff. Comply with restrictions.

title: Loyalty Programs
implementation_guidance: Manage loyalty programs fairly. Explain terms clearly. Honor points and rewards. Don't impose unfair restrictions. Communicate changes.

title: Warnings
implementation_guidance: Provide safety warnings for hazardous products. Warn of risks. Include usage instructions. Provide in Arabic. Make prominent.

title: Returns
implementation_guidance: Establish clear return policy. Allow returns for defective products. Specify return period. Facilitate returns. Communicate policy clearly.

title: Complaints
implementation_guidance: Establish consumer complaint system. Provide multiple channels. Acknowledge complaints promptly. Investigate fairly. Resolve quickly.

title: Contracts
implementation_guidance: Provide written contracts for significant transactions. Use clear language. Include all terms. Provide in Arabic. Give consumer copy.

title: Responsibilities after termination or change
description: Information security responsibilities shall remain valid after termination
description_ar: يجب أن تظل مسؤوليات أمن المعلومات سارية بعد انتهاء العمل
implementation_guidance: Include post-termination confidentiality obligations. Enforce through NDAs and contracts. Monitor compliance.

title: Logging
description: Logs that record activities shall be produced and kept
description_ar: يجب إنتاج وحفظ السجلات التي تسجل الأنشطة
implementation_guidance: Log security events: authentication access changes errors. Include timestamp user action. Retain logs.

title: Information security awareness education and training
description: Personnel shall receive appropriate awareness education and training
description_ar: يجب أن يحصل الموظفون على توعية وتعليم وتدريب مناسب
implementation_guidance: Provide security awareness training. Cover policies threats best practices. Train regularly. Track completion.

title: Compliance
implementation_guidance: Monitor HIPAA compliance. Conduct internal audits. Address deficiencies. Report to leadership. Cooperate with OCR.

title: Accountability
implementation_guidance: Demonstrate compliance with GDPR principles. Maintain records. Conduct DPIAs. Implement measures. Enable demonstration.

title: Risk Management
implementation_guidance: Manage service risks. Identify risks. Assess impact. Define mitigation. Monitor risks.

title: Advertising
implementation_guidance: Ensure advertising is truthful accurate. Avoid misleading claims. Substantiate advertising. Don't exaggerate. Comply with advertising standards.

title: Claims
implementation_guidance: Verify all product/service claims. Substantiate with evidence. Avoid unproven claims. Test before claiming. Document verification.

title: Pricing
implementation_guidance: Price fairly and transparently. Display prices clearly. Include all charges. No hidden fees. Explain price components.

title: Personal Data
implementation_guidance: Safeguard consumer personal data. Limit collection. Use for stated purpose only. Retain securely. Delete when no longer needed.

title: Delivery
implementation_guidance: Deliver products within promised timeframe. Communicate delivery schedule. Update on delays. Compensate for significant delays. Track deliveries.

title: Payment Methods
implementation_guidance: Offer secure payment options. Accept multiple payment methods. Protect payment information. Use secure gateways. Prevent fraud.

title: Cancellation
implementation_guidance: Allow consumers to cancel orders. Specify cancellation period. Process cancellations promptly. Refund cancelled orders. Communicate cancellation policy.

title: Cancellation Policy
implementation_guidance: Publish clear cancellation policy. Specify timeframes. Explain process. State refund terms. Provide in Arabic.

title: Rewards
implementation_guidance: Provide promised rewards. Allow point redemption. Set fair expiration. Don't devalue without notice. Track points accurately.

title: Halal Certification
implementation_guidance: Obtain Halal certification from approved bodies. Display certification. Maintain Halal status. Renew certification. Verify suppliers.

title: Age Verification
implementation_guidance: Verify customer age for restricted products. Check identification. Implement age gates online. Document verification. Refuse sales to minors.

title: Promotions
implementation_guidance: Run honest promotions. Clearly state terms and conditions. Honor promotional prices. Don't bait and switch. Provide advertised products.

title: Confidentiality or non-disclosure agreements
description: Requirements for confidentiality shall be identified
implementation_guidance: Require NDAs from employees contractors third parties. Cover confidential information. Obtain signatures.

title: Electronic Transactions
implementation_guidance: Secure online transactions. Protect payment data. Provide transaction confirmation. Enable order tracking. Support electronic communication.

title: Recall Procedures
implementation_guidance: Establish recall procedures. Identify affected products. Trace distribution. Execute recall quickly. Document recall.

title: Price Display
implementation_guidance: Display prices prominently. Show price per unit. Include VAT. Use Arabic numerals. Update prices promptly.

title: Labeling
implementation_guidance: Label products with required information: name ingredients quantity expiry manufacturer contact. Provide in Arabic. Ensure legibility. Comply with standards.

title: Quality
implementation_guidance: Provide quality products meeting Saudi standards. Test products. Control quality. Maintain consistency. Meet specifications.

title: Conformity
implementation_guidance: Ensure products conform to standards. Obtain conformity certificates. Test for compliance. Document conformity. Address non-conformances.

title: Warranty
implementation_guidance: Provide product warranties. Specify warranty terms. Honor warranty obligations. Repair or replace defective products. Provide in Arabic.

title: E-Commerce
implementation_guidance: Comply with e-commerce regulations. Register e-commerce activity. Provide company information online. Secure payment methods. Enable online returns.

title: After-Sales Service
implementation_guidance: Provide after-sales service. Maintain service centers. Supply spare parts. Offer repairs. Support product lifecycle.

title: Terms
implementation_guidance: Ensure contract terms are fair and balanced. Avoid unfair clauses. Don't abuse superior position. Allow negotiation. Explain terms.

title: Refunds
implementation_guidance: Refund for defective non-conforming products. Process refunds promptly. Refund purchase price. Provide in original payment method. Document refunds.

title: Complaint Handling
implementation_guidance: Handle complaints professionally. Listen to consumers. Address concerns. Provide solutions. Follow up. Document resolution.

title: Product Recall
implementation_guidance: Recall products posing safety risks. Notify MOCI and consumers. Remove from market. Offer refund or replacement. Investigate cause.

title: Data Validation
implementation_guidance: Validate data entry. Implement input validation. Check data consistency. Detect data corruption. Maintain referential integrity.

title: Data Integrity
implementation_guidance: Protect ePHI from improper alteration or destruction. Implement integrity controls. Validate data accuracy. Detect unauthorized changes. Maintain data completeness.

title: Audit Logs
implementation_guidance: Maintain comprehensive audit trails. Log access attempts (successful and failed). Track administrative actions. Monitor for anomalies. Investigate suspicious activity.

title: Access Auditing
implementation_guidance: Log all ePHI access and activity. Include user ID timestamp action. Retain audit logs for 6 years. Protect logs from modification. Review regularly.

title: Multi-Factor Authentication
implementation_guidance: Require MFA for remote access to ePHI. Use two independent factors. Implement for all external connections. Monitor MFA failures.

title: Unique User IDs
implementation_guidance: Assign unique user ID to each person. Prohibit shared accounts. Track access by individual. Disable terminated accounts. Monitor ID usage.

title: Access Control
implementation_guidance: Control ePHI access. Use unique user IDs. Implement role-based access. Enable emergency access. Enforce automatic logoff.

title: Media Disposal
implementation_guidance: Shred paper containing ePHI. Destroy electronic media. Use certified destruction services. Document disposal. Prevent ePHI recovery.

title: Privacy Training
implementation_guidance: Train all workforce on HIPAA Privacy Rule. Train within 30 days of hire. Provide annual updates. Document training. Test understanding.

title: Sanctions
implementation_guidance: Apply sanctions for policy violations. Define disciplinary actions. Document sanctions. Ensure consistent application. Prevent retaliation.

title: Vendor Access
implementation_guidance: Limit vendor access to minimum necessary. Use separate vendor accounts. Monitor vendor activity. Terminate vendor access when complete. Audit vendor access.

title: Disclosure Prevention
implementation_guidance: Implement DLP for email. Scan outbound messages. Block unsecured ePHI transmission. Alert on policy violations. Log incidents.

title: Cloud Providers
implementation_guidance: Assess cloud provider security. Verify HIPAA compliance. Review provider certifications. Monitor provider performance. Conduct provider audits.

title: Lost Devices
implementation_guidance: Report lost/stolen devices immediately. Remote wipe ePHI. Assess breach risk. Notify affected individuals if required. Document incident.

title: Disciplinary process
description: Formal disciplinary process shall be in place for personnel who have committed security violations
description_ar: يجب أن تكون هناك عملية تأديبية رسمية للموظفين الذين ارتكبوا انتهاكات أمنية
implementation_guidance: Define disciplinary procedures for security violations. Communicate consequences. Enforce consistently. Document.

title: Evaluation
implementation_guidance: Conduct periodic technical and non-technical evaluations. Test security effectiveness. Review access controls. Assess compliance. Document findings.

title: Asset Inventory
implementation_guidance: Maintain inventory of all hardware and software containing ePHI. Track asset location. Document asset ownership. Update inventory regularly.

title: Breach Response
implementation_guidance: Contain breach immediately. Investigate root cause. Mitigate harm. Prevent recurrence. Document response. Report to authorities.

title: Breach Assessment
implementation_guidance: Assess all ePHI incidents. Determine if breach occurred. Evaluate risk of harm. Document assessment. Apply exceptions appropriately.

title: Breach Notification
implementation_guidance: Notify affected individuals within 60 days of breach. Notify HHS and media for large breaches. Provide breach details. Offer mitigation. Document notification.

title: Malware Protection
implementation_guidance: Deploy anti-malware on all systems. Update signatures daily. Scan continuously. Block malware. Quarantine infected systems.

title: Network Security
implementation_guidance: Implement firewalls. Segment networks. Use intrusion detection. Monitor network traffic. Protect against cyber threats.

title: Transmission Security
implementation_guidance: Encrypt all ePHI transmissions. Use VPN for remote access. Implement TLS for web applications. Secure email transmission. Prevent eavesdropping.

title: Encryption
implementation_guidance: Encrypt ePHI at rest using AES-256. Encrypt ePHI in transit using TLS 1.2+. Encrypt email containing ePHI. Secure encryption keys. Document encryption.

title: Password Management
implementation_guidance: Enforce password complexity (8+ characters mixed case numbers symbols). Change passwords every 90 days. Prevent password reuse. Secure password storage.

title: Business Associate Agreements
implementation_guidance: Include security safeguard requirements. Specify permissible uses. Require breach notification. Include termination rights. Obtain BA signature.

title: Privacy Officer
implementation_guidance: Designate Privacy Officer. Grant authority and resources. Develop privacy policies. Handle complaints. Report to leadership.

title: Complaints
implementation_guidance: Establish complaint process. Accept complaints. Investigate promptly. Document complaints. Take corrective action. No retaliation.

title: Risk Assessment
implementation_guidance: Assess security risks to ePHI. Identify threats and vulnerabilities. Evaluate current safeguards. Determine risk level. Document assessment.

title: Internal Audit
implementation_guidance: Audit HIPAA compliance annually. Review policies and practices. Test security controls. Identify gaps. Implement corrective actions.

title: Risk Management
implementation_guidance: Implement security measures to reduce risks. Prioritize by risk level. Apply administrative physical technical safeguards. Document implementation.

title: Security Officer
implementation_guidance: Designate Security Officer. Grant authority and resources. Implement security program. Monitor compliance. Report security issues.

title: Workforce Security
implementation_guidance: Authorize workforce access. Verify identity. Provide unique user IDs. Terminate access promptly. Monitor workforce access.

title: Access Termination
implementation_guidance: Disable access immediately upon termination. Retrieve devices and credentials. Remove system access. Document termination. Ensure complete removal.

title: Facility Access Controls
implementation_guidance: Control physical access to facilities with ePHI. Use badge systems cameras guards. Log facility access. Escort visitors. Monitor entry points.

title: Workstation Security
implementation_guidance: Implement workstation security. Auto-lock after inactivity. Position screens for privacy. Use privacy screens. Control physical access to workstations.

title: Device and Media
implementation_guidance: Control devices containing ePHI. Track device inventory. Encrypt portable devices. Securely dispose media. Maintain accountability.

title: Security Policies
implementation_guidance: Develop HIPAA Security Rule policies and procedures. Cover all required standards. Review annually. Update as needed. Communicate to workforce.

title: Business Associates
implementation_guidance: Identify all business associates. Execute BAAs with all BAs. Include required provisions. Monitor BA compliance. Address BA breaches.

title: Information Review
implementation_guidance: Review systems for HIPAA compliance regularly. Modify as needed. Document reviews. Address changes in risk. Update security measures.

title: Data Backup
implementation_guidance: Backup ePHI daily. Test restoration procedures. Store backups securely offsite. Encrypt backups. Document backup process.

title: Employment Terms
implementation_guidance: Specify employment terms clearly: duties responsibilities compensation leave. Define termination conditions. Include confidentiality clauses. Comply with Labor Law.

title: Employment Contracts
implementation_guidance: Execute written employment contracts with all employees. Include job title salary working hours benefits. Specify probation period. Register contracts with HRSD.

title: Ongoing Training
implementation_guidance: Provide continuous security education. Share security tips. Communicate incidents (sanitized). Recognize good security practices. Build security culture.

title: Security Awareness
implementation_guidance: Conduct security awareness training. Cover HIPAA Security Rule. Provide examples. Test knowledge. Update on new threats. Reinforce regularly.

title: Incident Analysis
implementation_guidance: Analyze all security incidents. Identify attack vectors. Determine impact. Extract lessons learned. Prevent recurrence. Share intelligence.

title: Incident Response
implementation_guidance: Develop incident response plan. Identify security incidents. Contain incidents. Investigate root causes. Remediate and recover. Document incidents.

title: Phishing
implementation_guidance: Deploy anti-phishing solutions. Filter phishing emails. Block malicious links. Simulate phishing attacks. Test user awareness.

title: Social Engineering
implementation_guidance: Train workforce on social engineering attacks. Recognize phishing attempts. Verify caller identity. Protect credentials. Report suspicious contacts.

title: Remote Work
implementation_guidance: Secure home office environments. Provide secure devices. Train on remote work security. Monitor remote compliance. Address remote incidents.

title: Remote Access
implementation_guidance: Require VPN for remote ePHI access. Implement MFA for remote users. Encrypt remote sessions. Monitor remote access. Control remote access devices.

title: Vendors
implementation_guidance: Assess vendor security before engagement. Include security in contracts. Monitor vendor access to ePHI. Conduct vendor audits. Address vendor incidents.

title: Email Security
implementation_guidance: Encrypt email containing ePHI. Use secure email solutions. Train staff on email security. Prevent accidental disclosure. Monitor email usage.

title: Cloud Computing
implementation_guidance: Execute BAA with cloud providers. Ensure cloud security. Encrypt ePHI in cloud. Control cloud access. Audit cloud activity.

title: Testing
implementation_guidance: Test security controls regularly. Conduct vulnerability scans. Perform penetration testing. Validate safeguards. Address weaknesses.

title: Asset Maintenance
implementation_guidance: Maintain systems containing ePHI. Patch regularly. Update software. Replace aging equipment. Document maintenance.

title: Emergency Access
implementation_guidance: Enable emergency access procedures. Provide break-glass accounts. Log all emergency access. Review emergency access usage. Prevent abuse.

title: Contingency Planning
implementation_guidance: Develop contingency plan. Create data backup plan. Establish disaster recovery procedures. Maintain emergency operations. Test plans annually.

title: Automatic Logoff
implementation_guidance: Automatically log off inactive sessions after 15 minutes. Require re-authentication. Lock workstations. Clear session data.

title: Session Management
implementation_guidance: Control session duration. Implement session timeouts. Secure session tokens. Prevent session hijacking. Terminate on logout.

title: Retention
implementation_guidance: Retain HIPAA documentation for 6 years from creation or last effective date. Include policies actions assessments. Store securely. Enable retrieval.

title: Monitoring
implementation_guidance: Monitor for new security threats. Track vulnerabilities. Review security advisories. Assess impact on ePHI. Take preventive action.

title: Authentication
implementation_guidance: Verify user identity before granting access. Use strong authentication methods. Implement MFA for high-risk access. Monitor authentication failures.

title: Wages
implementation_guidance: Pay salaries by end of month. Use Wage Protection System (WPS). Provide salary statements. Maintain wage records. Prohibit wage deductions without consent.

title: Permitted Uses
implementation_guidance: Allow PHI use for treatment payment operations. Require authorization for other uses. Obtain patient consent. Document uses. Prohibit marketing without authorization.

title: Automated Decisions
description: Right not to be subject to automated decisions
implementation_guidance: Don't make significant decisions solely by automated means. Include human intervention. Explain logic. Enable contestation. Apply safeguards.

title: Right to Data Portability
implementation_guidance: Enable data portability. Provide data in structured commonly used machine-readable format. Enable direct transfer. Respond to requests.

title: Notification Obligation
implementation_guidance: Notify recipients of rectification erasure restriction. Inform all recipients. Provide information. Enable transparency.

title: Right to Restriction
implementation_guidance: Enable processing restriction when: accuracy disputed unlawful objected needed for claims. Restrict processing. Inform before lifting. Notify recipients.

title: Right to Erasure
implementation_guidance: Enable data erasure when: consent withdrawn purpose achieved objected unlawfully processed. Erase without delay. Notify recipients. Document erasure.

title: Right to Rectification
implementation_guidance: Enable data rectification. Correct inaccurate data. Complete incomplete data. Respond promptly. Notify recipients.

title: Right of Access
implementation_guidance: Enable data subject access. Provide copy of data. Confirm processing. Disclose purposes recipients retention. Respond within month.

title: Indirect Notice
implementation_guidance: Inform data subjects when obtaining data indirectly. Provide information within reasonable period. Include source. Inform of processing.

title: Collection Notice
implementation_guidance: Provide information when collecting data: identity purposes legal basis recipients retention rights. Inform at collection.

title: Transparency
implementation_guidance: Provide concise transparent intelligible accessible information. Use clear language. Make available. Use layered approach. Enable understanding.

title: Sensitive Data
implementation_guidance: Prohibit processing sensitive data (race ethnicity politics religion health sex life). Apply exceptions carefully. Obtain explicit consent. Implement safeguards.

title: Documentation
implementation_guidance: Document all HIPAA policies and procedures. Maintain current documentation. Make available to workforce. Retain for 6 years. Review annually.

title: Updates
implementation_guidance: Update security measures based on environmental/operational changes. Address new threats. Implement security patches. Modify controls. Document updates.

title: Mobile Devices
implementation_guidance: Encrypt mobile devices with ePHI. Implement MDM. Enable remote wipe. Require device passwords. Control app installation.

title: Authorizations
implementation_guidance: Require authorization for non-TPO uses. Use valid authorization form. Allow revocation. Specify expiration. Document authorizations.

title: Controller Responsibility
implementation_guidance: Implement appropriate technical and organizational measures. Consider state of art costs risks. Demonstrate compliance. Review regularly.

title: Right to Object
implementation_guidance: Enable objection to processing based on legitimate interest public task. Stop unless compelling grounds. Inform of right. Respect objections.

title: Children's Data
implementation_guidance: Obtain parental consent for children under 16. Verify age. Obtain parental authorization. Protect child data. Use appropriate safeguards.

title: Withdraw Consent
implementation_guidance: Enable easy consent withdrawal. Make as easy as giving. Inform about right. Process withdrawal. Stop processing.

title: Consent
implementation_guidance: Obtain freely given specific informed unambiguous consent. Use clear language. Separate from other terms. Enable withdrawal. Document consent.

title: Legal Basis
implementation_guidance: Establish legal basis for processing: consent contract legal obligation vital interest public task legitimate interest. Document basis.

title: Interest Charges
implementation_guidance: Pay interest on late WHT payments. Interest compounds monthly. Calculate from due date. Pay with principal. Minimize interest.

title: Advance Rulings
implementation_guidance: Request advance ruling from GAZT for complex transactions. Submit detailed facts. Receive GAZT determination. Rely on ruling. Document ruling.

title: Clarifications
implementation_guidance: Seek GAZT clarification on WHT treatment when uncertain. Submit inquiry. Await GAZT response. Apply guidance. Document clarification.

title: WHT Audit
implementation_guidance: Prepare for GAZT WHT audits. Organize documentation. Provide payment details. Show WHT calculations. Demonstrate compliance.

title: Examination
implementation_guidance: Cooperate with GAZT examination. Provide requested records. Explain WHT positions. Address findings. Implement corrections.

title: WHT Systems
implementation_guidance: Implement systems to track non-resident payments. Calculate WHT automatically. Generate returns. Track payments to GAZT. Maintain records.

title: Privacy by Design
implementation_guidance: Implement data protection by design and default. Integrate from outset. Implement minimization. Use pseudonymization. Enable privacy.

title: Automation
implementation_guidance: Automate WHT calculations and withholding. Integrate with accounts payable. Flag non-resident payments. Calculate rates. Generate reports.

title: Purpose Limitation
implementation_guidance: Collect data for specified explicit legitimate purposes. Define purposes clearly. Don't process for incompatible purposes. Document purposes.

title: Data Minimisation
implementation_guidance: Process only adequate relevant necessary data. Avoid excessive collection. Limit data scope. Review necessity. Document minimization.

title: Accuracy
implementation_guidance: Keep personal data accurate and up to date. Correct inaccuracies. Enable updates. Review accuracy. Document corrections.

title: Storage Limitation
implementation_guidance: Retain data only as long as necessary. Define retention periods. Delete when no longer needed. Archive appropriately. Document retention.

title: Integrity and Confidentiality
implementation_guidance: Process data securely. Protect against unauthorized access. Prevent unlawful processing. Guard against loss damage. Implement security measures.

title: Lawfulness
implementation_guidance: Process personal data lawfully fairly and transparently. Establish legal basis. Ensure fairness. Be transparent. Document lawfulness.

title: Penalty Determination
implementation_guidance: Understand penalty factors: nature gravity negligence duration number affected damage category measures cooperation. Mitigate factors. Document mitigation.

title: General Conditions
implementation_guidance: Avoid administrative fines up to €20 million or 4% of turnover. Comply with GDPR. Implement measures. Cooperate with authority. Document compliance.

title: Compensation
implementation_guidance: Compensate for damage caused by GDPR violation. Assess damage. Determine liability. Provide compensation. Document claims.

title: Remedy Against Controller
implementation_guidance: Enable remedy against controller or processor. Respond to legal claims. Participate in proceedings. Comply with judgments. Compensate damage.

title: Judicial Remedy
implementation_guidance: Enable judicial remedy against supervisory authority. Inform of rights. Don't obstruct. Respond to proceedings. Comply with judgments.

title: Right to Complain
implementation_guidance: Enable complaints to supervisory authority. Provide authority contact. Don't hinder complaints. Respond to authority. Address complaints.

title: Authority Tasks
implementation_guidance: Enable authority tasks: monitor enforce advise investigate. Provide access. Respond to inquiries. Support investigations.

title: Competence
implementation_guidance: Determine competent supervisory authority. Identify lead authority for cross-border. Cooperate with authority. Follow jurisdiction. Document authority.

title: Subject Notification
implementation_guidance: Notify data subjects of high-risk breaches. Use clear language. Describe consequences measures. Communicate without delay. Document notification.

title: Prior Consultation
implementation_guidance: Consult supervisory authority before processing if DPIA shows high risk. Provide information. Await advice. Follow recommendations. Document consultation.

title: DPO Position
implementation_guidance: Ensure DPO independence. Provide resources and access. No instructions on tasks. No dismissal for performance. Involve appropriately.

title: DPO Tasks
implementation_guidance: DPO tasks: inform advise monitor DPIA cooperation contact point. Enable task performance. Support DPO. Provide information.

title: Transfer Safeguards
implementation_guidance: Use appropriate safeguards: standard contractual clauses binding corporate rules approved codes certifications. Implement safeguards. Document usage.

title: Transfer Derogations
implementation_guidance: Use derogations only in specific situations: consent performance legal public interest vital. Apply exceptionally. Document derogation.

title: Supervisory Authority
implementation_guidance: Cooperate with supervisory authority. Respond to requests. Provide information. Enable inspections. Follow orders.

title: Independence
implementation_guidance: Respect supervisory authority independence. Don't influence. Provide resources. Enable tasks. Support authority.

title: Wage Protection System
implementation_guidance: Register with WPS. Upload salary files monthly. Pay through approved banks. Ensure timely payment. Monitor WPS compliance.

title: Overtime
implementation_guidance: Obtain employee consent for overtime. Limit overtime hours. Pay overtime premium. Track overtime. Provide compensatory time off.

title: Working Hours
implementation_guidance: Limit working hours to 8 hours/day 48 hours/week. Provide breaks. Compensate overtime at 150%. Track working time. Allow reduced hours in Ramadan.

title: Supply Chain
implementation_guidance: Ensure supply chain resilience. Identify critical suppliers. Assess supplier BC. Develop alternatives. Include in contracts. Monitor supplier BC.

title: Privacy Notice
implementation_guidance: Provide NPP to all patients. Explain PHI uses and patient rights. Obtain acknowledgment. Post prominently. Update when practices change.

title: Processor
implementation_guidance: Use only processors providing sufficient guarantees. Execute written contracts. Define scope duration purpose. Ensure processor obligations. Monitor compliance.

title: Security of Processing
implementation_guidance: Implement appropriate security measures: pseudonymization encryption confidentiality integrity availability resilience. Test regularly. Restore availability.

title: Minimum Necessary
implementation_guidance: Limit PHI use and disclosure to minimum necessary. Define minimum necessary for roles. Review disclosures. Apply to non-routine disclosures. Document rationale.

title: Accounting of Disclosures
implementation_guidance: Track all PHI disclosures for 6 years. Provide accounting within 60 days. Include disclosure details. Exclude treatment/payment/operations. Document requests.

title: Record Amendment
implementation_guidance: Allow patients to request amendments. Review amendment requests. Accept or deny with rationale. Append amendments. Notify relevant parties.

title: Access to Information
implementation_guidance: Provide PHI within 30 days of request. Allow inspection and copying. Charge reasonable fees. Provide in requested format. Document access requests.

title: Patient Rights
implementation_guidance: Provide patients access to their PHI. Enable amendment requests. Provide accounting of disclosures. Honor restrictions. Obtain authorizations.

title: Public Sector
implementation_guidance: Understand public authority penalties. Apply proportionate sanctions. Comply with requirements. Implement measures. Document compliance.

title: Other Penalties
implementation_guidance: Avoid additional penalties under national law. Comply with local requirements. Monitor regulations. Implement measures. Document compliance.

title: Powers
implementation_guidance: Respect authority powers: investigate order warn ban suspend fine. Comply with orders. Pay fines. Implement corrections.

title: Lead Authority
implementation_guidance: Work with lead supervisory authority for cross-border processing. Coordinate compliance. Respond to lead. Enable cooperation. Follow decisions.

title: Breach Notification
implementation_guidance: Notify supervisory authority of breach within 72 hours. Describe nature consequences measures. Document breaches. Delay only if justified.

title: Data Protection Impact Assessment
implementation_guidance: Conduct DPIA for high-risk processing. Assess necessity proportionality. Identify risks. Define mitigation. Consult DPO. Document assessment.

title: Data Protection Officer
implementation_guidance: Appoint DPO for: public authorities core monitoring large-scale sensitive. Ensure expertise independence. Provide resources. Report to highest level.

title: Records of Processing
implementation_guidance: Maintain records of processing activities. Document: purposes categories recipients retention measures. Make available to authority.

title: Adequacy Decisions
implementation_guidance: Rely on EC adequacy decisions. Verify adequate protection. Transfer to approved countries. Monitor adequacy status. Document reliance.

title: Binding Corporate Rules
implementation_guidance: Implement BCRs for intra-group transfers. Obtain approval. Include required content. Enforce rules. Make legally binding.

title: Data Transfer
implementation_guidance: Transfer data internationally only with adequate protection. Use adequacy decisions SCCs BCRs. Implement safeguards. Document transfers.

title: Disaster Recovery
implementation_guidance: Enable emergency access to ePHI during disaster. Restore critical systems within 24-48 hours. Maintain business continuity. Test DR plan. Document procedures.

title: Segregation of duties
description: Conflicting duties and areas of responsibility shall be segregated
implementation_guidance: Identify conflicting duties. Implement compensating controls where separation not possible. Monitor compliance.

title: Information security roles and responsibilities
description: Information security responsibilities shall be defined and allocated
description_ar: يجب تحديد وتخصيص مسؤوليات أمن المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Define security roles and responsibilities. Create RACI matrix. Assign to personnel. Document in job descriptions.

title: Site Access
implementation_guidance: Enable site access during disruptions. Plan for denial of access. Identify alternatives. Arrange permissions. Maintain access lists. Document procedures.

title: Critical Suppliers
implementation_guidance: Manage critical supplier relationships. Assess criticality. Review supplier BC. Include requirements in contracts. Monitor performance. Develop alternatives.

title: Recovery Procedures
implementation_guidance: Establish recovery procedures. Define recovery steps. Specify resource requirements. Enable activity resumption. Return to normal operations. Document recovery.

title: Monitoring and Measurement
implementation_guidance: Monitor measure analyze evaluate BCMS. Determine what when how. Retain evidence. Analyze results. Report performance.

title: Infrastructure
implementation_guidance: Ensure IT infrastructure continuity. Identify critical systems. Implement redundancy. Enable backup. Plan recovery. Test arrangements.

title: Continual Improvement
implementation_guidance: Continually improve BCMS suitability adequacy effectiveness. Consider improvement opportunities. Implement improvements. Monitor effectiveness. Document improvements.

title: Contact with special interest groups
description: Appropriate contacts with special interest groups shall be maintained
description_ar: يجب الحفاظ على اتصالات مع مجموعات المصالح الخاصة
implementation_guidance: Join industry forums and security groups. Participate in information sharing. Monitor threat intelligence.

title: Terms and conditions of employment
description: Employment agreements shall state personnel and organization responsibilities
description_ar: يجب أن تنص اتفاقيات التوظيف على مسؤوليات الموظف والمنظمة
implementation_guidance: Include security responsibilities in employment contracts. Cover confidentiality acceptable use. Obtain signatures.

title: Screening
description: Background screening shall be carried out on all candidates
description_ar: يجب إجراء فحص الخلفية لجميع المرشحين
implementation_guidance: Conduct background checks. Verify employment education criminal record. Document results. Repeat for sensitive roles.

title: Documented operating procedures
description: Operating procedures shall be documented and made available
implementation_guidance: Document IT operations procedures. Cover backups monitoring change management. Make accessible to personnel.

title: Compliance with policies rules and standards
description: Compliance with policies rules and standards shall be regularly reviewed
description_ar: يجب مراجعة الامتثال للسياسات والقواعد والمعايير بانتظام
implementation_guidance: Review compliance with internal policies and external standards. Document gaps. Implement corrections.

title: Independent review of information security
description: Organization's approach to information security management shall be reviewed independently
description_ar: يجب مراجعة نهج المنظمة لإدارة أمن المعلومات بشكل مستقل
implementation_guidance: Conduct independent audits. Use internal audit or third party. Review controls. Report findings to management.

title: Privacy and protection of personal information
description: Requirements for privacy and protection of personal information shall be identified and met
description_ar: يجب تحديد وتلبية متطلبات الخصوصية وحماية المعلومات الشخصية
implementation_guidance: Comply with data protection laws. Implement privacy controls. Obtain consent. Respond to data subject rights.

title: Protection of records
description: Records shall be protected from loss destruction
description_ar: يجب حماية السجلات من الفقدان والتدمير
implementation_guidance: Implement records management. Define retention periods. Protect from unauthorized access. Enable retrieval.

title: Intellectual property rights
description: Intellectual property rights shall be protected
implementation_guidance: Use licensed software. Maintain license inventory. Prohibit unauthorized copying. Audit compliance.

title: Legal statutory regulatory and contractual requirements
description: Relevant information security requirements shall be identified
description_ar: يجب تحديد متطلبات أمن المعلومات ذات الصلة
implementation_guidance: Identify applicable legal regulatory contractual requirements. Maintain compliance register. Monitor changes.

title: Information security during disruption
description: Organization shall plan to maintain information security
description_ar: يجب أن تخطط للحفاظ على أمن المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Include information security in business continuity plans. Define security requirements during disruption.

title: Policies for information security
description: A set of information security policies shall be defined documented and communicated
description_ar: يجب تحديد وتوثيق ونشر مجموعة من السياسات لأمن المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Develop information security policy framework. Obtain management approval. Communicate to all personnel. Review annually.

title: Media Relations
implementation_guidance: Manage media during crises. Designate spokespersons. Prepare statements. Monitor media. Respond appropriately. Document communications.

title: Security
implementation_guidance: Maintain security during disruptions. Protect assets. Control access. Monitor threats. Respond to incidents. Document security.

title: Health and Safety
implementation_guidance: Ensure health and safety during disruptions. Assess risks. Implement controls. Protect personnel. Comply with regulations. Document H&S.

title: Human Resources
implementation_guidance: Manage HR during disruptions. Support staff wellbeing. Enable flexible working. Maintain communications. Address concerns. Document HR procedures.

title: Legal Aspects
implementation_guidance: Address legal and regulatory requirements. Identify obligations. Ensure compliance. Maintain records. Enable legal operations. Document requirements.

title: Financial Aspects
implementation_guidance: Manage financial aspects of BC. Ensure funding. Maintain reserves. Enable financial recovery. Protect assets. Document finances.

title: Insurance
implementation_guidance: Maintain adequate insurance coverage. Assess insurance needs. Obtain coverage. Review regularly. Maintain policies. Document insurance.

title: Sensitive Documents
implementation_guidance: Protect sensitive documents. Secure storage. Control access. Enable recovery. Maintain backups. Document protection.

title: Vital Information
implementation_guidance: Protect vital records and information. Identify critical information. Ensure availability. Implement protection. Enable retrieval. Maintain copies.

title: Key Personnel
implementation_guidance: Identify and protect key personnel. Define succession. Cross-train staff. Maintain contact information. Ensure availability. Document roles.

title: System Recovery
implementation_guidance: Enable IT system recovery. Define RTO/RPO. Implement recovery capabilities. Test recovery. Document procedures. Maintain readiness.

title: Exercises and Tests
implementation_guidance: Exercise and test BC arrangements. Plan exercises. Conduct tests. Evaluate results. Identify improvements. Document exercises.

title: Evaluate BC Procedures
implementation_guidance: Evaluate BC procedure effectiveness. Review test results. Assess capabilities. Identify gaps. Determine improvements.

title: Internal Audit
implementation_guidance: Conduct BCMS internal audits. Plan audit program. Conduct audits. Report findings. Take corrective actions. Document audits.

title: Management Review
implementation_guidance: Conduct management review of BCMS. Review inputs. Evaluate performance. Make decisions. Document review. Communicate results.

title: Contact with authorities
description: Appropriate contacts with relevant authorities shall be maintained
description_ar: يجب الحفاظ على اتصالات مناسبة مع السلطات المختصة
implementation_guidance: Identify relevant authorities (cybersecurity regulatory data protection). Establish contact points. Maintain relationships.

title: Nonconformity
implementation_guidance: Address nonconformities. React to nonconformity. Evaluate need for action. Implement corrections. Review effectiveness. Update BCMS.

title: Crisis Communication
implementation_guidance: Establish crisis communication procedures. Define spokespersons. Prepare key messages. Enable media management. Coordinate with stakeholders. Document communications.

title: Alternative Facilities
implementation_guidance: Identify alternative work locations. Assess suitability. Arrange access. Equip facilities. Test readiness. Document arrangements.

title: Remote Working
implementation_guidance: Enable remote working capabilities. Provide technology. Ensure connectivity. Support staff. Maintain security. Document procedures.

title: Backup
implementation_guidance: Implement data backup procedures. Define backup frequency. Store offsite. Test restoration. Protect backups. Document procedures.

title: BC Plans
implementation_guidance: Develop BC plans for priority activities. Include recovery strategies procedures resources. Define activation criteria. Enable plan execution. Maintain plans.

title: Information security in project management
description: Information security shall be integrated in project management
description_ar: يجب دمج أمن المعلومات في إدارة المشاريع
implementation_guidance: Include security in project lifecycle. Conduct security reviews at gates. Allocate security resources.

title: Management responsibilities
description: Management shall require all personnel and contractors to apply information security
description_ar: يجب أن تطلب الإدارة من جميع الموظفين والمقاولين تطبيق أمن المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Communicate security expectations from management. Include in performance reviews. Enforce compliance.

title: Workers Committee
implementation_guidance: Establish workers committee for companies 100+ employees. Allow worker representation. Facilitate communication. Address worker concerns. Meet regularly.

title: Minor Protection
implementation_guidance: Ensure safe working conditions for minors. Prohibit night work. Limit working hours to 6/day. Provide breaks. Monitor minor welfare.

title: Disciplinary Actions
implementation_guidance: Issue warnings for misconduct. Suspend for serious violations. Terminate for grave offenses. Document all actions. Allow employee defense.

title: Performance Management
implementation_guidance: Conduct regular performance evaluations. Set clear objectives. Provide feedback. Address performance issues. Recognize high performers.

title: Training
implementation_guidance: Offer job-related training. Support skill development. Provide safety training. Enable professional development. Track training completion.

title: Select Strategy
implementation_guidance: Select strategies for: relocation alternative premises work area recovery dispersed working mutual aid. Evaluate options. Choose appropriate. Document selection.

title: Flexibility
implementation_guidance: Offer flexible working arrangements. Enable work-life balance. Accommodate employee needs. Maintain business requirements. Document arrangements.

title: Business Impact Analysis
implementation_guidance: Conduct business impact analysis. Identify critical activities. Determine impacts of disruption. Define recovery priorities. Establish recovery time objectives.

title: Risks and Opportunities
implementation_guidance: Determine risks and opportunities. Plan actions to address. Integrate into BCMS. Evaluate effectiveness. Document planning.

title: BC Strategy
implementation_guidance: Determine BC strategies to protect critical activities. Consider various scenarios. Define response options. Select appropriate strategies. Document strategy.

title: Policy
implementation_guidance: Establish BC policy appropriate to organization. Commit to requirements. Provide framework. Support improvement. Communicate policy.

title: Roles and Responsibilities
implementation_guidance: Assign BC roles responsibilities authorities. Define BCMS responsibilities. Assign process owners. Enable accountability. Communicate assignments.

title: Temporary Work
implementation_guidance: Regulate temporary employment. Define contract duration. Limit renewals. Provide appropriate benefits. Convert to permanent when applicable.

title: Permanent Conversion
implementation_guidance: Convert temp to permanent after period/renewals. Recognize prior service. Adjust benefits. Update records. Notify employee.

title: Payroll Processing
implementation_guidance: Calculate salaries accurately. Apply deductions correctly. Process on time. Maintain payroll records. Ensure confidentiality.

title: Deductions
implementation_guidance: Limit deductions to legal amounts. Obtain employee consent. Deduct GOSI contributions. Process loan repayments. Document all deductions.

title: Collection of evidence
description: Organization shall establish procedures for collection of evidence
description_ar: يجب أن تضع المنظمة إجراءات لجمع الأدلة
implementation_guidance: Define forensic procedures. Maintain chain of custody. Use forensic tools. Preserve evidence integrity.

title: Learning from information security incidents
description: Knowledge from information security incidents shall be used
description_ar: يجب استخدام المعرفة من حوادث أمن المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Conduct post-incident reviews. Identify lessons learned. Implement improvements. Update procedures.

title: Response to information security incidents
description: Information security incidents shall be responded to
implementation_guidance: Activate incident response. Contain incidents. Eradicate threats. Recover systems. Document actions.

title: Assessment and decision on information security events
title_ar: تقييم والقرار بشأن أحداث أمن المعلومات
description: Organization shall assess information security events
description_ar: يجب أن تقيم المنظمة أحداث أمن المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Monitor for security events. Assess and classify events. Determine if incidents. Escalate appropriately.

title: Information security incident management planning and preparation
title_ar: تخطيط وإعداد إدارة حوادث أمن المعلومات
description: Organization shall plan and prepare for managing information security incidents
description_ar: يجب أن تخطط المنظمة وتعد لإدارة حوادث أمن المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Develop incident response plan. Define procedures roles responsibilities. Establish incident response team.

title: Information security for use of cloud services
description: Processes for acquisition use management and exit from cloud services shall be established
description_ar: يجب إنشاء عمليات الحصول والاستخدام والإدارة والخروج من الخدمات السحابية
implementation_guidance: Define cloud security requirements. Assess cloud provider security. Implement cloud controls. Plan exit strategy.

title: Inventory of assets
description: Assets shall be identified and an inventory shall be drawn up
implementation_guidance: Maintain comprehensive asset inventory. Include hardware software data services. Assign owners. Update regularly.

title: Return of assets
description: Personnel and contractors shall return all organization assets
description_ar: يجب على الموظفين والمقاولين إرجاع جميع الأصول
implementation_guidance: Include asset return in termination process. Track assets issued to personnel. Verify return. Document.

title: Classification of information
description: Information shall be classified according to security needs
description_ar: يجب تصنيف المعلومات حسب احتياجات الأمن
implementation_guidance: Define classification scheme. Classify information assets. Apply labels. Train users on classification.

title: Labelling of information
description: An appropriate set of procedures for information labelling shall be developed
description_ar: يجب وضع مجموعة مناسبة من الإجراءات لوسم المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Develop labelling procedures. Apply labels to documents files systems. Use headers footers metadata.

title: Information transfer
description: Rules for information transfer shall be in place
implementation_guidance: Define information transfer rules. Cover encryption transmission methods approvals. Protect data in transit.

title: Threat intelligence
description: Information relating to information security threats shall be collected and analyzed
description_ar: يجب جمع وتحليل المعلومات المتعلقة بتهديدات أمن المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Subscribe to threat intelligence feeds. Monitor security advisories. Analyze threats. Share relevant information.

title: Access control
description: Rules to control physical and logical access shall be established
description_ar: يجب وضع قواعد للتحكم في الوصول الفيزيائي والمنطقي
implementation_guidance: Develop access control policy. Define access principles. Cover authentication authorization. Communicate policy.

title: Authentication information
description: Allocation and use of authentication information shall be managed
description_ar: يجب إدارة تخصيص واستخدام معلومات المصادقة
implementation_guidance: Manage passwords tokens certificates. Enforce complexity. Protect storage. Enable MFA where appropriate.

title: Access rights
