implementation_guidance: Grant access based on need-to-know. Require approvals. Review regularly. Revoke promptly upon termination.

title: Information security in supplier relationships
description: Processes shall be defined and agreed to manage information security
description_ar: يجب تحديد وتوافق العمليات لإدارة أمن المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Define supplier security requirements. Include in contracts. Assess supplier security. Monitor compliance.

title: Managing information security in ICT supply chain
title_ar: إدارة أمن المعلومات في سلسلة التوريد
description: Processes and procedures shall be managed for information security
description_ar: يجب إدارة العمليات والإجراءات لإدارة أمن المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Assess ICT supply chain risks. Evaluate vendor security. Monitor third-party access. Manage vulnerabilities.

title: Monitoring review and change management of supplier services
title_ar: مراقبة ومراجعة وإدارة التغيير لخدمات الموردين
description: Regular monitoring review and management of change shall be performed
description_ar: يجب مراقبة ومراجعة وإدارة التغييرات بانتظام
implementation_guidance: Monitor supplier performance. Review SLAs. Manage service changes. Conduct periodic audits.

title: Identity management
description: The full lifecycle of identities shall be managed
description_ar: يجب إدارة دورة حياة الهويات الكاملة
implementation_guidance: Manage identity lifecycle: provisioning modification deactivation. Link to HR processes. Review regularly.

title: Incident Response
implementation_guidance: Establish incident response procedures. Define detection reporting assessment. Enable immediate response. Protect people assets. Document response.

title: BC Resources
implementation_guidance: Determine resources needed for BC strategies. Include people facilities technology information supplies partners. Arrange resources. Document requirements.

title: Domestic Worker Rights
implementation_guidance: Define working hours and duties. Provide adequate food and lodging. Allow communication with family. Prohibit abuse. Provide medical care.

title: Domestic Workers
implementation_guidance: Execute domestic worker contracts per regulations. Provide suitable accommodation. Ensure rest periods. Pay wages on time. Respect worker rights.

title: Juvenile Workers
implementation_guidance: Prohibit employment under age 15. Restrict hazardous work for ages 15-18. Limit working hours for minors. Obtain parental consent. Provide education time.

title: Discipline
implementation_guidance: Establish disciplinary procedures. Apply progressive discipline. Document violations. Ensure fair treatment. Follow Labor Law requirements.

title: Annual Appraisal
implementation_guidance: Evaluate employees annually. Document performance. Discuss development needs. Link to compensation. Maintain appraisal records.

title: Development
implementation_guidance: Identify training needs. Create development plans. Provide learning opportunities. Support career advancement. Measure training effectiveness.

title: Equal Opportunity
implementation_guidance: Provide equal hiring promotion opportunities. Use merit-based decisions. Eliminate bias in recruitment. Train hiring managers. Monitor diversity metrics.

title: Non-Discrimination
implementation_guidance: Prohibit discrimination based on race gender religion nationality. Ensure equal opportunities. Address discrimination complaints. Train on diversity. Promote inclusion.

title: Safe Environment
description: Provide safe work environment for women
implementation_guidance: Prevent harassment and discrimination. Provide safe transportation. Ensure proper facilities. Implement anti-harassment policies. Train on workplace respect.

title: Women's Rights
implementation_guidance: Provide equal pay for equal work. Prevent discrimination. Ensure workplace safety for women. Provide separate facilities where required. Support work-life balance.

title: Data Privacy
implementation_guidance: Protect employee personal data. Limit access to HR data. Encrypt sensitive information. Obtain consent for data use. Comply with PDPL.

title: Employee Records
implementation_guidance: Maintain employee files with contracts certificates licenses. Keep records for 10 years after termination. Ensure confidentiality. Enable audit access.

title: Leave
implementation_guidance: Grant 21 days annual leave (30 days after 5 years). Provide sick leave. Allow Hajj leave. Grant maternity leave (10 weeks). Document leave.

title: BC Procedures
implementation_guidance: Establish and implement BC procedures. Define response structure. Assign responsibilities. Provide step-by-step actions. Enable activation. Document procedures.

title: Termination
implementation_guidance: Provide notice period (30-90 days based on service). Calculate end-of-service benefits. Issue service certificate. Clear final settlement. Register termination with HRSD.

title: BC Objectives
implementation_guidance: Establish BC objectives. Align with policy. Make measurable. Consider requirements. Monitor progress. Document objectives.

title: End of Service Benefits
implementation_guidance: Calculate based on last salary and service years. Pay half month per year (first 5 years) full month after. Pay within week of termination. Document calculation.

title: Health and Safety
implementation_guidance: Provide safe working environment. Conduct safety training. Provide PPE. Report work injuries. Maintain first aid facilities.

title: Work Injuries
implementation_guidance: Report work injuries to GOSI within 24 hours. Provide medical treatment. Cover medical costs. Maintain injury records. Investigate incidents.

title: Social Dialogue
implementation_guidance: Enable employer-employee dialogue. Discuss working conditions. Address grievances. Seek consensus. Maintain positive relations.

title: Social Insurance
implementation_guidance: Register all Saudi employees with GOSI. Pay monthly contributions (21.5% employer 10.5% employee). Submit on time. Maintain insurance records. Ensure compliance.

title: Saudization
implementation_guidance: Meet Nitaqat quotas for Saudi employees. Report to HRSD monthly. Maintain required Saudi percentage. Provide training for Saudis. Support Saudization targets.

title: Nitaqat
implementation_guidance: Monitor Nitaqat classification (Platinum Green Yellow Red). Improve classification level. Maintain green status minimum. Report Saudi employee data. Avoid red zone.

title: Expatriate Workers
implementation_guidance: Obtain work visas for expats. Maintain valid iqamas. Ensure labor authorization. Sponsor properly. Comply with expat regulations.

title: Sponsorship Transfer
implementation_guidance: Process sponsorship transfer requests per regulations. Provide NOC when applicable. Clear exit reentry. Transfer within legal framework. Document transfers.

title: Labor Disputes
implementation_guidance: Address employee complaints promptly. Attempt amicable settlement. Use labor office mediation. Prepare for labor courts. Document dispute resolution.

title: Complaints
implementation_guidance: Provide complaint mechanism. Investigate complaints fairly. Protect whistleblowers. Take corrective action. Prevent retaliation.

title: Medical Insurance
implementation_guidance: Provide medical insurance for all employees and dependents. Use CCHI-approved insurers. Cover minimum benefits. Maintain valid policies. Pay premiums on time.

title: Remote Work
implementation_guidance: Develop remote work policy. Define eligibility criteria. Provide necessary equipment. Ensure productivity. Maintain communication.

title: Maternity Leave
implementation_guidance: Grant 10 weeks maternity leave (4 weeks before birth). Pay full salary. Prohibit termination during maternity. Allow nursing breaks. Protect employment.

title: Part-Time Work
implementation_guidance: Define part-time employment clearly. Prorate benefits accordingly. Ensure compliance. Document arrangements. Provide equal treatment.

title: Planning Changes
implementation_guidance: Plan BCMS changes. Consider purpose consequences. Maintain integrity. Allocate resources. Communicate changes.

title: Resources
implementation_guidance: Determine and provide resources for BCMS. Include people infrastructure technology. Allocate budget. Maintain capabilities. Enable operations.

title: Competence
implementation_guidance: Ensure competence of BC personnel. Determine required competence. Provide training. Assess effectiveness. Maintain records.

title: Awareness
implementation_guidance: Ensure awareness of BC policy objectives roles contributions. Conduct awareness programs. Communicate regularly. Measure awareness.

title: Communication
implementation_guidance: Determine BC communication needs. Define what when who how. Establish channels. Enable crisis communication. Document communications.

title: Documented Information
implementation_guidance: Maintain documented information required by standard. Control documents. Ensure availability. Protect information. Enable retrieval.

title: Operational Planning
implementation_guidance: Plan implement control processes to meet requirements. Establish criteria. Implement controls. Document processes. Control changes.

title: Identify Activities
implementation_guidance: Identify activities that support products and services. Assess criticality. Determine dependencies. Prioritize activities. Document analysis.

title: Assess Impact
implementation_guidance: Assess impact of disruptions over time. Consider financial operational reputational regulatory impacts. Define timeframes. Document impacts.

title: Recovery Objectives
implementation_guidance: Establish recovery time objectives (RTO) and recovery point objectives (RPO). Consider impact timeframes. Define maximum tolerable periods. Document objectives.

title: Risk Assessment
implementation_guidance: Conduct BC risk assessment. Identify threats vulnerabilities. Analyze likelihood impact. Evaluate risks. Document assessment.

title: Privileged Accounts
implementation_guidance: Implement Privileged Access Management (PAM). Require approval for privileged access. Record sessions. Rotate credentials.

title: Access Reviews
implementation_guidance: Conduct quarterly access reviews. Require manager approval to retain access. Remove orphaned accounts. Document review outcomes.

title: Data Backup
description: Perform regular backups of critical data
description_ar: إجراء نسخ احتياطي منتظم للبيانات الحرجة
implementation_guidance: Backup critical data daily. Test restore quarterly. Store backups offsite or in cloud. Encrypt backup media.

title: Mobile Devices
implementation_guidance: Deploy Mobile Device Management (MDM). Enforce encryption. Require passcode. Enable remote wipe. Separate personal/corporate data.

title: Redundant Systems
description: Implement redundant systems for critical infrastructure
implementation_guidance: Deploy high-availability configurations. Use load balancing. Implement failover mechanisms. Test failover quarterly.

title: Business Continuity Plan
description: Develop and test business continuity plan
implementation_guidance: Identify critical business processes. Define RTOs and RPOs. Document recovery procedures. Test annually.

title: Regulatory Incident Reporting
description: Report critical incidents to regulatory authorities
description_ar: الإبلاغ عن الحوادث الحرجة للجهات التنظيمية
implementation_guidance: Notify NCA within 72 hours for material incidents. Follow NCA incident reporting template. Provide updates as required.

title: Time Synchronization
implementation_guidance: Configure all systems to sync with trusted NTP servers. Monitor time drift. Essential for log correlation.

title: Secure Configurations
description: Apply secure configurations to all systems
implementation_guidance: Use CIS benchmarks or vendor hardening guides. Remove unnecessary services. Disable default accounts. Document baselines.

title: Wireless Access
implementation_guidance: Use WPA3 encryption. Implement 802.1X authentication. Separate guest and corporate networks. Disable WPS. Change default SSID.

title: Secure Email
implementation_guidance: Implement email gateway with anti-spam and anti-phishing. Use SPF DKIM and DMARC. Encrypt sensitive emails.

title: Risk Assessment
description: Conduct comprehensive cybersecurity risk assessment regularly
description_ar: إجراء تقييم شامل للمخاطر السيبرانية بشكل منتظم
implementation_guidance: Perform annual enterprise-wide risk assessments using recognized methodology (ISO 27005 or NIST RMF). Document risks treatment plans and residuals.

title: Risk Treatment
description: Develop and implement risk treatment plans for identified risks
description_ar: تطوير وتنفيذ خطط لمعالجة المخاطر المحددة
implementation_guidance: For each identified risk document treatment approach (accept transfer mitigate avoid). Implement controls and monitor effectiveness.

title: Asset Return
description: Ensure return of all assets upon employment termination
description_ar: ضمان إرجاع جميع الأصول عند إنهاء العمل
implementation_guidance: Implement asset checkout/checkin process. Include in offboarding checklist. Verify return and wipe devices before reassignment.

title: Benefits
implementation_guidance: Offer competitive benefits package. Provide medical insurance. Grant leave entitlements. Include allowances. Communicate benefits clearly.

title: Allowances
implementation_guidance: Provide housing allowance. Grant transportation allowance. Calculate based on policy. Pay regularly. Include in salary calculation.

title: Part-Time Rights
implementation_guidance: Provide proportional benefits. Ensure fair treatment. Apply Labor Law protections. Calculate leave proportionally. Maintain equality.

title: Qiwa Platform
implementation_guidance: Register on Qiwa platform. Update employee information. Process work permits. Submit reports electronically. Respond to HRSD requests.

title: Understand Organization
implementation_guidance: Determine internal and external issues relevant to business continuity. Identify stakeholders. Assess environment. Define scope. Document context.

title: Stakeholder Needs
implementation_guidance: Identify stakeholders and their requirements. Determine legal regulatory requirements. Assess expectations. Document requirements.

title: BCMS Scope
implementation_guidance: Define BCMS scope and boundaries. Consider issues requirements. Identify exclusions. Document scope. Communicate boundaries.

title: BCMS System
implementation_guidance: Establish implement maintain improve BCMS. Define processes. Implement requirements. Document system. Enable continual improvement.

title: Leadership and Commitment
implementation_guidance: Ensure top management demonstrates leadership and commitment. Take accountability. Integrate BCMS. Provide resources. Communicate importance.

title: Reporting
implementation_guidance: Submit required reports to HRSD. Report via Qiwa platform. Update employee data monthly. Notify of changes. Maintain compliance.

title: Contract Termination
description: Apply security procedures upon vendor contract termination
description_ar: تطبيق إجراءات أمنية عند إنهاء التعاقد مع الموردين
implementation_guidance: Retrieve or destroy data. Revoke access. Retrieve assets. Document completion. Include termination clause in contracts.

title: Data Retention
description: Implement data retention and disposal policy
implementation_guidance: Define retention periods by data type. Securely delete data after retention period. Document disposal. Use certified destruction.

title: Remote Access
description_ar: تأمين الوصول عن بعد إلى الأنظمة
implementation_guidance: Use VPN with strong encryption. Require MFA. Limit access to necessary systems. Monitor remote access sessions.

title: Disaster Recovery Plan
description: Develop and test disaster recovery plan
description_ar: تطوير واختبار خطة التعافي من الكوارث
implementation_guidance: Document system recovery procedures. Maintain offsite backups. Test DR plan annually. Update based on test results.

title: Log Management
implementation_guidance: Enable logging on all critical systems. Centralize logs in SIEM. Retain for minimum 1 year. Protect log integrity.

title: Incident Analysis
implementation_guidance: Investigate root cause. Determine impact and scope. Document findings. Identify lessons learned. Update defenses.

title: Project Management
description: Apply cybersecurity requirements in all project phases
description_ar: تطبيق متطلبات الأمن السيبراني في جميع مراحل المشاريع
implementation_guidance: Include security requirements in project initiation. Conduct security reviews at key milestones. Require security acceptance before go-live.

title: Environment Segregation
description: Segregate development testing and production environments
description_ar: الفصل بين بيئات التطوير والاختبار والإنتاج
implementation_guidance: Maintain logically/physically separated environments. Restrict production access. Prohibit development/testing using production data.

title: Application Security
implementation_guidance: Follow OWASP ASVS guidelines. Conduct security code reviews. Perform SAST/DAST testing. Fix vulnerabilities before deployment.

title: Patch Management
description: Apply security patches in timely manner
description_ar: تطبيق التصحيحات الأمنية في الوقت المناسب
implementation_guidance: Scan for missing patches monthly. Apply critical patches within 30 days others within 90 days. Test patches before deployment.

title: Vulnerability Management
description: Identify and remediate security vulnerabilities regularly
description_ar: تحديد ومعالجة الثغرات الأمنية بشكل منتظم
implementation_guidance: Perform quarterly vulnerability scans. Prioritize by severity. Remediate critical within 30 days high within 60 days medium within 90 days.

title: Security Awareness & Training
description: Provide periodic cybersecurity awareness training to all personnel
description_ar: توفير تدريب دوري للتوعية بالأمن السيبراني لجميع الموظفين
implementation_guidance: Conduct mandatory annual security awareness training. Cover phishing social engineering data protection. Track completion rates.

title: Specialized Training
description: Provide specialized training for cybersecurity personnel
description_ar: توفير تدريب متخصص للعاملين في مجال الأمن السيبراني
implementation_guidance: Identify training needs. Provide role-based training (e.g. SOC CISO IR). Support certifications (CISSP CEH CISM etc).

title: Awareness Assessment
description: Assess effectiveness of security awareness programs
implementation_guidance: Conduct phishing simulations quarterly. Measure click rates and reporting rates. Track improvement over time. Provide remedial training.

title: Security Responsibilities
description: Include security responsibilities in employment contracts
description_ar: تضمين المسؤوليات الأمنية في عقود العمل
implementation_guidance: Define security responsibilities in job descriptions. Include in employment contracts. Cover in onboarding. Obtain signed acknowledgments.

title: Disciplinary Process
description: Apply disciplinary measures for security violations
implementation_guidance: Define violation categories and corresponding consequences. Document incidents and actions taken. Include in HR policies.

title: Employment Termination
description: Apply security procedures upon employment termination
description_ar: تطبيق إجراءات أمنية عند إنهاء الخدمة
implementation_guidance: Disable access immediately upon termination. Retrieve assets. Conduct exit interview covering confidentiality. Document completion.

title: Confidentiality Agreements
description: Obtain confidentiality agreements from employees and contractors
description_ar: الحصول على اتفاقيات سرية من الموظفين والمقاولين
implementation_guidance: Require signed NDAs before access to sensitive information. Renew for contractors annually. Include in onboarding package.

title: Web Applications
implementation_guidance: Follow OWASP Top 10. Conduct security testing. Deploy Web Application Firewall (WAF). Fix vulnerabilities before production.

title: AML Policy
description_ar: وضع سياسة شاملة لمكافحة غسل الأموال
implementation_guidance: Develop AML/CFT policy for capital market activities. Cover customer due diligence transaction monitoring reporting. Obtain board approval.

title: Priorities for Mission Functions
description: Priorities for organizational mission and functions established
description_ar: تحديد الأولويات لوظائف وموارد المهمة الحرجة
implementation_guidance: Identify critical business functions. Conduct BIA. Define RTOs and RPOs. Establish recovery priorities.

title: Resource Prioritization
description: Resources prioritized based on classification criticality and business value
description_ar: ترتيب أولويات الموارد حسب تصنيفها والقيمة للأعمال
implementation_guidance: Classify and prioritize assets. Rank by business criticality. Define protection requirements per classification.

title: Supplier Agreements
description: Include security requirements in supplier agreements
description_ar: تضمين متطلبات الأمن في اتفاقيات الموردين
implementation_guidance: Include security clauses: confidentiality access controls incident notification audit rights breach liability.

title: Incident Assessment
description: Assess and classify information security incidents
implementation_guidance: Classify incidents by severity and impact. Prioritize response. Escalate critical incidents. Document assessment.

title: Evidence Collection
implementation_guidance: Implement forensic procedures. Maintain chain of custody. Use forensic tools. Preserve evidence integrity.

title: External Reporting
implementation_guidance: Report incidents to NCA SDAIA law enforcement as required. Notify affected parties. Follow legal requirements.
